example_2: sac'āyaṃ, bhikkhave, puggalo pañhaṃ puṭṭho samāno aññen'aññaṃ paṭicarati, bahiddhā kathaṃ apanāmeti, kopañ'ca dosañ'ca appaccayañ'ca pātukaroti, evaṃ sant'āyaṃ, bhikkhave, puggalo akaccho hoti.
idha, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo yam'enaṃ hatthidammasārathi kāraṇaṃ kāreti, yadi vā katapubbaṃ yadi vā akatapubbaṃ, taṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā ohitasoto suṇāti.

akataṃ dukkaṭaṃ seyyo, pacchā tappati dukkaṭaṃ,
katañ'ca sukataṃ seyyo, yaṃ katvā n'ānutappati.
tassa hi pathavito yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā nīl'ādiārammaṇaṃ samosarantaṃ paripuṇṇabhāvaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti
ayaṃ vuccati ariyasāvako akaraṇīyo mārassa akaraṇīyo pāpimato'ti
samphappalāpī hoti akālavādī abhūtavādī anatthavādī adhammavādī avinayavādī, anidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti akālena anapadesaṃ apariyantavatiṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ.
evaṃ vadeyya, ahaṃ, bhante, pāpakammaṃ akāsiṃ gārayhaṃ mosallaṃ, yena me āyasmanto attamanā honti taṃ karomī'ti.
so kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, yo c'āyaṃ kāmavitakko yo ca byāpādavitakko yo ca vihiṃsāvitakko, imaṃ ekaṃ bhāgam'akāsiṃ
adāsi me akāsi me, ñātimittā sakhā ca me. petānaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ dajjā, pubbe katam'anussaraṃ.
ye'pi te, bhikkhave, ahesuṃ ukkalā vassabhaññā ahetukavādā akiriyavādā natthikavādā

pāṇimhi ce vaṇo n'āssa, hareyya pāṇinā visaṃ,
n'ābbaṇaṃ visam'anveti, n'atthi pāpaṃ akubbato.
tayo'me, bhikkhave, akusalavitakkā, kāmavitakko, byāpādavitakko, vihiṃsāvitakko.
appamattako so, bhikkhave, kaṭaggaho yaṃ so akkhadhutto paṭhamen'eva kaṭaggahena mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ adhigaccheyya.
utu-akkhānañ'ca, bhikkhugaṇanā'ca, bhikkhunīnam'ovādo cā'ti.
ambil'aggehi'pi, tittak'aggehi'pi, kaṭuk'aggehi'pi, madhur'aggehi'pi, khārikehi'pi, akhārikehi'pi, loṇikehi'pi, aloṇikehi'pi.
taṃ kiṃ maññasi, soṇa, kusalo tvaṃ pubbe agāriyabhūto vīṇāya tantissare'ti?

paṇītaṃ yadi vā lūkhaṃ, appaṃ vā yadi vā bahuṃ.
yāpan'atthaṃ abhuñjiṃsu, agiddhā n'ādhimucchitā.
aggassa dātā medhāvī, aggadhammasamāhito. devabhūto manusso vā, aggappatto pamodatī'ti.
dukkhaṃ dukkhasamuppādaṃ, dukkhassa ca atikkamaṃ, ariyañ'c'aṭṭha-aṅgikaṃ maggaṃ, dukkh'ūpasamagāminaṃ.
ukkhittakhaggamatihatthasudāruṇan'taṃ, dhāvan'tiyojanapatha-aṅgulimālavantaṃ. iddhī'bhisaṅkhatamano jitavā mun'indo.

seyyathā'pi rañño paccantime nagare esikā hoti gambhīranemā sunikhātā acalā asampavedhī abbhantarānaṃ guttiyā bāhirānaṃ paṭighātāya. evam'evaṃ kho ariyasāvako saddho hoti, saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṃ
ahaṃ kho, āvuso, navo acirapabbajito adhun'āgato imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ. na t'āhaṃ sakkomi vitthārena ācikkhituṃ.
kiṃ nu kho bhoto gotamassa sāvakā bhotā gotamena evaṃ ovadīyamānā evaṃ anusāsīyamānā sabbe accantaṃ niṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ ārādhenti udāhu ekacce n'ārādhentī'ti?
taggha taṃ, bhikkhu, accayo accagamā yathābālaṃ yathāmūḷhaṃ yathāakusalaṃ, yo tvaṃ sāriputtaṃ asatā tucchā musā abhūtena abbhācikkhi.

yo imaṃ samuddaṃ sagāhaṃ sarakkhasaṃ,
saūmiṃ sāvaṭṭaṃ sabhayaṃ duttaraṃ accatari.
yo vo, ānanda, mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto, so vo mam'accayena satthā.
accayo maṃ, bhante, accagamā yathābālaṃ yathāmūḷhaṃ yathāakusalaṃ, yo'haṃ bhagavantaṃ āvusovādena samudācaritabbaṃ amaññissaṃ.
ye te bhikkhū tiracchānakathikā kāyadaḷhibahulā viharanti tesam'pi ekajjhaṃ sen'āsanaṃ paññapeti, im'āyap'ime āyasmanto ratiyā acchissantī'ti.

aṭṭhapadakatā kesā, nettā añjanamakkhitā.
alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.
eso hi, bhikkhu, brahmā mahābrahmā abhibhū anabhibhūto añña'd'atthudaso vasavattī issaro kattā nimmātā seṭṭho sajitā vasī pitā bhūtabhabyānaṃ.
saddh'indriyaṃ, viriy'indriyaṃ, sat'indriyaṃ, samādh'indriyaṃ, paññ'indriyaṃ, anaññātañ'ñassāmī't'indriyaṃ, aññ'indriyaṃ, aññātāv'indriyaṃ.
saddh'indriyaṃ, viriy'indriyaṃ, sat'indriyaṃ, samādh'indriyaṃ, paññ'indriyaṃ, anaññātañ'ñassāmī't'indriyaṃ, aññ'indriyaṃ, aññātāv'indriyaṃ.
dūrato'pi kho mayaṃ, āvuso, āgaccheyyāma āyasmato sāriputtassa santike etassa bhāsitassa attham'aññātuṃ
saddh'indriyaṃ, viriy'indriyaṃ, sat'indriyaṃ, samādh'indriyaṃ, paññ'indriyaṃ, anaññātañ'ñassāmī't'indriyaṃ, aññ'indriyaṃ, aññātāv'indriyaṃ.
tañ'ca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, kulaputtā upenti atthavasikā, atthavasaṃ paṭicca, n'eva rāj'ābhinītā, na cor'ābhinītā, na iṇ'aṭṭā, na bhaya-aṭṭā, na ājīvikāpakatā.
ahañ'c'eva kho pana jarādhammo samāno jaraṃ anatīto paraṃ jiṇṇaṃ disvā aṭṭīyeyyaṃ harāyeyyaṃ jiguccheyyaṃ na m'etaṃ assa patirūpan'ti.
aṭṭhikaṅkal'ūpamā kāmā appassāda-aṭṭhenā'ti passanto vikkhambhanato kāme parivajjeti
māso seso gimhānan'ti bhikkhunā vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesitabbaṃ, addhamāso seso gimhānan'ti katvā nivāsetabbaṃ.
buddho susuddho karuṇāmaha-aṇṇavo, yo'ccantasuddhabbarañāṇalocano, lokassa pāp'ūpakilesaghātako
yo taṃ rūpamayaṃ vegaṃ sahati, ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, atari cakkhusamuddaṃ saūmiṃ sāvaṭṭaṃ sagāhaṃ sarakkhasaṃ.

karaṇīyam'atthakusalena,
yantaṃ santaṃ padaṃ abhisamecca,
sakko ujū ca sūjū ca,
suvaco c'assa mudu anatimānī
iminā pakkhena, eko uposatho sampatto, eko uposathā atikkantā, cha uposathā avasiṭṭhā.
n'āhaṃ taṃ pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā rajjan'ādivasena uppajjituṃ dassāmī'ti evam'ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
ubhatobhāgavimutto idha ekacco puggalo ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā te kāyena phusitvā viharati paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
pāṇ'ātipātā veramaṇī, adinn'ādānā veramaṇī, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī, ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave sammākamm'anto.
taṃ kiṃ maññasi, gāmaṇi, idh'assa puriso pāṇa-atipātī adinn'ādāyī kāmesumicchācārī musāvādī pisuṇavāco pharusavāco samphappalāpī abhijjhālu byāpannacitto micchādiṭṭhiko.
atha kho tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi, atippago kho tāva sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya carituṃ. yaṃnūna mayaṃ yena aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ ārāmo ten'upasaṅkameyyāmā'ti.
yāvatikā ca bhikkhū kammappattā saṅgh'uposath'ārahā cattāro vā tato vā atirekā pakatattā pārājikaṃ anāpannā saṅghena vā anukkhittā.
sabbo pan'āyaṃ piṇḍapāto ajigucchanīyo, imaṃ pūtikāyaṃ patvā ativiya jigucchanīyo jāyati
yo c'āyaṃ attakilamatha-anuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasañhito.
yo c'āyaṃ attakilamath'ānuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasañhito.
kiñ'c'āpi te evaṃ vadeyyuṃ, piyo no attā'ti, atha kho tesaṃ appiyo attā. taṃ kissa hetu? yañ'hi appiyo appiyassa kareyya, taṃ te attanā'va attano karonti, tasmā tesaṃ appiyo attā.
atthi me attā'ti vā assa saccato thetato diṭṭhi uppajjati, n'atthi me attā'ti vā assa saccato thetato diṭṭhi uppajjati, attanā'va attānaṃ sañjānāmī'ti vā assa saccato thetato diṭṭhi uppajjati

attani ca, bhikkhave, attaniye ca saccato thetato anupalabbhamāne, yam'pi taṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ, so loko so attā, so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo, sassatisamaṃ tath'eva ṭhassāmī'ti, nan'āyaṃ, bhikkhave, kevalo paripūro bāladhammo'ti?
kām'upādānaṃ, diṭṭh'upādānaṃ, sīlabbat'upādānaṃ, attavād'upādānaṃ. idaṃ vuccati taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ.
assutavā kho puthujjano attanā jarādhammo samāno jaraṃ anatīto paraṃ jiṇṇaṃ disvā aṭṭīyati harāyati jigucchati attānaṃ'y'eva {na} atisitvā, aham'pi kho'mhi jarādhammo jaraṃ anatīto
rūpaṃ kho, āvuso, aniccaṃ. yad'aniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ dukkhaṃ taṃ niruddhaṃ tada-atthaṅ'gataṃ.

pāpaṃ sahāyaṃ parivajjayetha, anatthadassiṃ visame niviṭṭhaṃ.
sayaṃ na seve pasutaṃ pamattaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
māyāvissa purisapuggalassa amāyā hoti parinibbānāya. thaddhassa purisapuggalassa atthaddhiyaṃ hoti parinibbānāya.
tañ'ca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, kulaputtā upenti atthavasikā, atthavasaṃ paṭicca, n'eva rāj'ābhinītā, na cor'ābhinītā, na iṇ'aṭṭā, na bhay'aṭṭā, na ājīvikāpakatā.
para-atthaṃ vā hi bhikkhave sampassamānena alam'eva appamādena sampādetuṃ

idaṃ vadāmī'ti na tassa hoti,
dhammesu niccheyya samuggahītaṃ,
passañ'ca diṭṭhīsu anuggahāya,
ajjhattasantiṃ pacinaṃ adassaṃ.
sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā, pubb'eva somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅ'gamā, adukkham'asukhaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā, pubb'eva somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅ'gamā, adukkham'asukhaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.

yo sukhaṃ dukkhato adda, dukkham'addakkhi sallato.
adukkham'asukhaṃ santaṃ, addakkhi naṃ aniccato.
yatha'y'idaṃ brahmacariyaṃ addhaniyaṃ assa ciraṭṭhitikaṃ, tadassa bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lok'ānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ
bhikkhu yathā iṇaṃ yathā rogaṃ yathā bandhan'āgāraṃ yathā dāsabyaṃ yathā kantāra-addhānamaggaṃ, ime pañca nīvaraṇe appahīne attani samanupassati
atītam'p'āhaṃ addhānaṃ evam'eva rūpena khajjiṃ, seyyathā'pi eta'r'ahi paccuppannena rūpena khajjāmi.
samphappalāpī hoti akālavādī abhūtavādī anatthavādī adhammavādī avinayavādī, anidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti akālena anapadesaṃ apariyantavatiṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ.
yatva-adhikaraṇam'enaṃ cakkhu'ndriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ, tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjāhi.
cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahanto sikkheyya, saddhāya adhimuccanto sikkheyya, vīriyaṃ paggaṇhanto sikkheyya, satiṃ upaṭṭhapento sikkheyya
appaharite ṭhitena, adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. tato ce uttariṃ appaharite'pi ṭhito adhiṭṭhaheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tisso imā, bhikkhave, sikkhā yatth'etaṃ sabbaṃ samodhānaṃ gacchati. katamā tisso? adhisīlasikkhā, adhicittasikkhā, adhipaññāsikkhā.
atthi āsavā adhivāsanā pahātabbā – duruttānaṃ durāgatānaṃ vacanapathānaṃ, uppannānaṃ sārīrikānaṃ vedanānaṃ dukkhānaṃ tibbānaṃ
tañ'ce bhikkhu adhivāseti nappajahati na vinodeti na byantīkaroti na anabhāvaṃ gameti

tiṭṭhañ'caraṃ, nisinno vā, sayāno vā, yāvat'assa vigatamiddho,
etaṃ satiṃ adhiṭṭheyya, brahmam'etaṃ vihāraṃ idha'm'āhu.
tasmā't'iha, bhikkhave, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ adhunā-āgatavadhukāsamena cetasā viharissāmā'ti
seyyathā'pi puriso sappikumbhaṃ vā telakumbhaṃ vā gambhīraṃ udakarahadaṃ ogāhitvā bhindeyya. tatra yā assa sakkharā vā kaṭhalā vā sā adhogāmī assa
saddh'indriyaṃ, viriy'indriyaṃ, sat'indriyaṃ, samādh'indriyaṃ, paññ'indriyaṃ, anaññātañ'ñassāmī't'indriyaṃ, aññ'indriyaṃ, aññātāv'indriyaṃ.
saddh'indriyaṃ, viriy'indriyaṃ, sat'indriyaṃ, samādh'indriyaṃ, paññ'indriyaṃ, anaññātañ'ñassāmī't'indriyaṃ, aññ'indriyaṃ, aññātāv'indriyaṃ.

ye'pi hi keci, bhikkhave, anāgatam'addhānaṃ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā yaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ taṃ aniccato dakkhissanti dukkhato dakkhissanti anattato dakkhissanti rogato dakkhissanti bhayato dakkhissanti, te taṇhaṃ pajahissanti.
anattani, bhikkhave, attā'ti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso.

sabbe dhammā anattā'ti, yadā paññāya passati.
atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā.
samphappalāpī hoti akālavādī abhūtavādī anatthavādī adhammavādī avinayavādī, anidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti akālena anapadesaṃ apariyantavatiṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ.
imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā subhāsitā hoti, no dubbhāsitā, anavajjā ca ananuvajjā ca viññūnan'ti.

manopubbaṅ'gamā dhammā, manoseṭṭhā manomayā.
manasā ce pasannena, bhāsati vā karoti vā.
tato naṃ sukham'anveti, chāyā'va anapāyinī
asubhasaññā, maraṇasaññā, āhāre paṭikūlasaññā, sabbaloke anabhiratasaññā, aniccasaññā, anicce dukkhasaññā, dukkhe anattasaññā, pahānasaññā, virāgasaññā, nirodhasaññā
alābhā vata me, na vata me lābhā, dulladdhaṃ vata me, na vata me suladdhaṃ, yassa me anabhirati uppannā, rāgo cittaṃ anuddhaṃseti,
anavaññattipaṭisaṃyuttavitakkavaḍḍhananti, sabbaṃ taṃ takkavaḍḍhanaṃ.
idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ n'ādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti
kin'ti anāgatā ca pesalā sabrahmacārī āgaccheyyuṃ āgatā ca pesalā sabrahmacārī phāsuṃ vihareyyun'ti
yāvatikā ca bhikkhū kammappattā saṅgh'uposath'ārahā cattāro vā tato vā atirekā pakatattā pārājikaṃ anāpannā saṅghena vā anukkhittā.
katamā dasa? aniccasaññā, anattasaññā, asubhasaññā, ādīnavasaññā, pahānasaññā, virāgasaññā, nirodhasaññā, sabbaloke anabhiratasaññā, sabbasaṅkhāresu anicchāsaññā, ānāpānassati.
kaṅkhī vat'amhi vicikicchī aniṭṭhaṅ'gato saddhamme'ti. ime kho cattāro maraṇadhammā samānā bhāyanti, santāsaṃ āpajjanti maraṇassa.

ekam'pi ce pāṇam'aduṭṭhacitto, mettāyati kusalī tena hoti.
sabbe ca pāṇe manasa-anukampī, pahūtam'ariyo pakaroti puññaṃ.
yāvatikā ca bhikkhū kammappattā saṅgh'uposath'ārahā cattāro vā tato vā atirekā pakatattā pārājikaṃ anāpannā saṅghena vā anukkhittā.
kiṃ pan'imehi khudda-anukhuddakehi sikkhāpadehi uddiṭṭhehi, yāva'd'eva kukkuccāya vihesāya vilekhāya saṃvattantī'ti
amarāvitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ para-anudayatāpaṭisaṃyuttavitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ lābhasakkārasilokapaṭisaṃyuttavitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ
sabbe te adukkhā anupaghātā anupāyāsā apariḷāhā sammāpaṭipannā'ti, iti vadaṃ itth'eke ussādeti.

ettha ca te, āvuso yamaka, diṭṭh'eva dhamme saccato thetato tathāgate anupalabbhamāne, kallaṃ nu te taṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ
upādinn'upādāniyā dhammā. anupādinn'upādāniyā dhammā. anupādinn'ānupādāniyā dhammā.
sabbe te adukkhā anupaghātā anupāyāsā apariḷāhā sammāpaṭipannā'ti, iti vadaṃ itth'eke ussādeti.
sukhavinicchayaṃ jaññā, sukhavinicchayaṃ ñatvā ajjhattaṃ sukham'anuyuñjeyya.

pamādam'anuyuñjanti, bālā dummedhino janā,
appamādañ'ca medhāvī, dhanaṃ seṭṭhaṃ'va rakkhati.

seyyathā'pi dovāriko hoti paṇḍito byatto medhāvī aññātānaṃ nivāretā ñātānaṃ pavesetā, evam'evaṃ kho ariyasāvako satimā hoti paramena satinepakkena samannāgato cirakatam'pi cirabhāsitam'pi saritā anussaritā.
tāvatiṃsānaṃ devānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā yāmā devā saddam'anussāvesum
idān'eva kho ahaṃ ājānāmi, ayam'pi kira dhammo, sutt'āgato suttapariyāpanno, anuaddhamāsaṃ uddesaṃ āgacchatī'ti
idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye kāy'ānupassī viharati

kaṇhaṃ dhammaṃ vippahāya, sukkaṃ bhāvetha paṇḍito,
okā anokam'āgamma, viveke yattha dūramaṃ.
anottāpissa purisapuggalassa ottappaṃ hoti parinibbānāya. appassutassa purisapuggalassa bāhusaccaṃ hoti parinibbānāya.
sayaṃ samattaṃ karoti paripuṇṇaṃ karoti anomaṃ karoti aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ pāmokkhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaraṃ karoti.
evaṃ sante kho, uttara, andho bhāvit'indriyo bhavissati, badhiro bhāvit'indriyo bhavissati.
te'dha bhikkhū aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvā ohitasotā dhammaṃ suṇanti
sā aparena samayena saṃvāsam'anvāya vissāsam'anvāya sassum'pi sasuram'pi sāmikam'pi evam'āha, apetha, kiṃ pana tumhe jānāthā'ti!
tasmā't'iha, bhikkhave, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ, santuṭṭhā bhavissāma itar'ītarena cīvarena, itar'ītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyā ca vaṇṇavādino, na ca cīvarahetu anesanaṃ appatirūpaṃ āpajjissāma.
yo cakkhumā mohamal'āpakaṭṭho, sāmaṃ va buddho sugato vimutto, mārassa pāsā vinimocayanto, pāpesi khemaṃ janataṃ vineyyaṃ
indriyesu guttadvārā bhavissāma, bhojane mattaññuno, jāgariyaṁ anuyuttā, vipassakā kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ, pubbaratta-apararattaṁ bodhipakkhiyānaṁ dhammānaṁ, bhāvan'ānuyogam'anuyuttā viharissāmā’ti.
aluddho pan'āyaṃ, kālāmā, purisapuggalo lobhena anabhibhūto apariyādinnacitto n'eva pāṇaṃ hanati
ime bhikkhave dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṃvattanti.
kathañ'ca, bhikkhave, aparihānadhammo hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjanti pāpakā akusalā sarasaṅkappā saṃyojaniyā.
sabbe te adukkhā anupaghātā anupāyāsā apariḷāhā sammāpaṭipannā'ti, iti vadaṃ itth'eke ussādeti.
ācayāya saṃvattanti no apacayāya
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, puriso addhānamaggappaṭipanno. so passeyya mahantaṃ udak'aṇṇavaṃ … na c'assa nāvā santāraṇī uttarasetu vā apārā pāraṃ gamanāya.

yathā'pi mūle anupaddave daḷhe, chinno'pi rukkho punar'eva rūhati,
evam'pi taṇh'ānusaye anūhate, nibbattatī dukkham'idaṃ punappunaṃ.
sādhu no bhante bhagavā suciraparinibbuto'pi pacchimājanat'ānukampamānasā
jāti'pi dukkhā, jarā'pi dukkhā, maraṇam'pi dukkhaṃ, sokaparidevadukkhadomanass'upāyāsā'pi dukkhā
kathañ'ca, gahapati, apurakkharāno hoti? idha, gahapati, ekaccassa na evaṃ hoti, evaṃrūpo siyaṃ anāgatam'addhānaṃ
sace ākaṅkhati, paṭikūlañ'ca appaṭikūlañ'ca tad'ubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako vihareyyaṃ sato sampajāno'ti

chandajāto anakkhāte,
manasā ca phuṭo siyā,
kāmesu ca appaṭibaddhacitto,
uddhaṃsoto'ti vuccati.
etaṃ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin'ti.
atha khv'etaṃ, moghapurisa, appasannānañ'c'eva appasādāya, pasannānañ'ca ekaccānaṃ aññathattāyā'ti.

paṇītaṃ yadi vā lūkhaṃ, appaṃ vā yadi vā bahuṃ.
yāpanatthaṃ abhuñjiṃsu, agiddhā n'ādhimucchitā.

na muṇḍakena samaṇo, abbato alikaṃ bhaṇaṃ.
icchālobhasamāpanno, samaṇo kiṃ bhavissati.

saññaṃ pariññā vitareyya oghaṃ, pariggahesu muni nopalitto,
abbūḷhasallo caram'appamatto, n'āsīsatī lokam'imaṃ parañ'cā'ti.
itiha tena khaṇena tena muhuttena yāva brahmalokā saddo abbhuggacchi.
kusalā dhammā. akusalā dhammā. abyākatā dhammā
byāpādapadosaṃ pahāya abyāpannacitto viharati sabbapāṇabhūtahit'ānukampī, byāpādapadosā cittaṃ parisodheti

nīcā niviṭṭhā subharā, mudū atthaddhamānasā.
abyāsekā amukharā, atthacintā vas'ānugā.
abhāvitakāyo ca hoti abhāvitacitto ca? idha, aggivessana, assutavato puthujjanassa uppajjati sukhā vedanā. so sukhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno sukhasārāgī ca hoti sukhasārāgitañ'ca āpajjati.
ye ca kho te, bho bhāradvāja, bhikkhū abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā, tesaṃ taṃ dukkaraṃ hoti.
ye ca kho te, bho bhāradvāja, bhikkhū abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā, tesaṃ taṃ dukkaraṃ hoti.
ye ca kho te, bho bhāradvāja, bhikkhū abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā, tesaṃ taṃ dukkaraṃ hoti.
atha kho kokanadā pajjunnassa dhītā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ mahāvanaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā ten'upasaṅkami
yass'atthāya kulaputtā samma'd'eva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti tad'anuttaraṃ brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭh'eva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
jātaṃ bhūtaṃ samuppannaṃ, kataṃ saṅkhatam'addhuvaṃ. jarāmaraṇasaṅghāṭaṃ, roganīḷaṃ pabhaṅguraṃ. āhāranettippabhavaṃ, n'ālaṃ tada-abhinandituṃ.
so evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigat'ūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāya cittaṃ abhininnāmesiṃ.
yassa hi so, bhikkhave, atthāya usukāro tejanaṃ dvīsu alātesu ātāpeyya paritāpeyya ujuṃ kareyya kammaniyaṃ sv'āssa attho abhinipphanno hoti.
veditabbam'etaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā, abhibhūtam'etaṃ āyatanaṃ'. abhibh'āyatanañ'h'etaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā'ti

so'haṃ evaṃ viharanto, ñatvā dhammaṃ nirūpadhiṃ.
ārogye yobbanasmiñ'ca, jīvitasmiñ'ca ye madā.
sabbe made abhibho'smi, nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khemato
sac'āyaṃ, bhikkhave, puggalo pañhaṃ puṭṭho samāno abhiharati abhimaddati anupajagghati khalitaṃ gaṇhāti, evaṃ sant'āyaṃ, bhikkhave, puggalo akaccho hoti.
icc'evam'ek'antaabhipūjaneyyakaṃ vatthuttayaṃ vandayata-abhisaṅkhataṃ
ayaṃ paṭhamo puñña-abhisando kusala-abhisando sukhass'āhāro.
pañcatiṃsatime saṃvacchare vesākhapuṇṇamiyaṃ sammā sambodhiṃ abhisambujjhitvā
atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā ten'upasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekam'antaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
upanāhissa purisapuggalassa anupanāho hoti parinibbānāya. makkhissa purisapuggalassa amakkho hoti parinibbānāya.
ye vā pan'assa te honti atthakāmā hitakāmā phāsukakāmā yogakkhemakāmā mātā vā pitā vā bhātā vā bhaginī vā mittā vā amaccā vā ñātisālohitā vā
api c'āhaṃ imāni bhagavato vicitrāni pañhapaṭibhānāni sotu'kāmo, ev'āhaṃ bhagavantaṃ paccanīkaṃ kātabbaṃ amaññissaṃ
māyāvissa purisapuggalassa amāyā hoti parinibbānāya. thaddhassa purisapuggalassa atthaddhiyaṃ hoti parinibbānāya.

nīcā niviṭṭhā subharā, mudū atthaddhamānasā.
abyāsekā amukharā, atthacintā vas'ānugā.
amūḷhavinayo dātabbo, paṭiññāya kāretabbaṃ, yebhuyyasikā, tassapāpiyasikā, tiṇ'avatthārako'ti.
sace kho pana karoto na karīyati pāpaṃ, ath'āhaṃ ubhayen'eva visuddhaṃ attānaṃ samanupassāmī'ti, ayam'assa catuttho assāso adhigato hoti.
asmī'ti, bhikkhave, maññitam'etaṃ, ayam'aham'asmī'ti maññitam'etaṃ, bhavissan'ti maññitam'etaṃ, na bhavissan'ti maññitam'etaṃ, rūpī bhavissan'ti maññitam'etaṃ
varaṃ, bhikkhave, tiṇhena ayosaṅkunā ādittena sampajjalitena sajotibhūtena sot'indriyaṃ sampalimaṭṭhaṃ, na tv'eva sotaviññeyyesu saddesu anubyañjanaso nimittaggāho.
heṭṭhā kho pana tassa bhoto gotamassa pādatalesu cakkāni jātāni sahassa-arāni sanemikāni sanābhikāni sabb'ākāraparipūrāni
kathañ'ca bhikkhu ariyo hoti? ārak'āssa honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā, saṃkilesikā, ponobbhavikā, sadarā, dukkhavipākā, āyatiṃ, jātijarāmaraṇiyā.
pañca oram'bhāgiyāni saññojanāni, sakkāyadiṭṭhi, vicikicchā, sīlabbataparāmāso, kāmacchando, byāpādo. pañca uddham'bhāgiyāni saññojanāni, rūparāgo, arūparāgo, māno, uddhaccaṃ, avijjā.
atthi nu kho me uttarimanussadhammā alam'ariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato, so'haṃ pacchime kāle sabrahmacārīhi puṭṭho na maṅku bhavissāmī'ti
yassa hi so, bhikkhave, atthāya usukāro tejanaṃ dvīsu alātesu ātāpeyya paritāpeyya ujuṃ kareyya kammaniyaṃ sv'āssa attho abhinipphanno hoti.

na muṇḍakena samaṇo, abbato alikaṃ bhaṇaṃ.
icchālobhasamāpanno, samaṇo kiṃ bhavissati.
so alīnacitto samāno bhabbo sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ pahātuṃ vicikicchaṃ pahātuṃ sīlabbataparāmāsaṃ pahātuṃ.
ambil'aggehi'pi, tittak'aggehi'pi, kaṭuk'aggehi'pi, madhur'aggehi'pi, khārikehi'pi, akhārikehi'pi, loṇikehi'pi, aloṇikehi'pi.
atha kho so, bhikkhave, mudumūsi gocarāya pakkāmi. tam'enaṃ biḷāro gahetvā sahasā asaṅkhāditvā ajjhohari.
nāḷāgiriṃ gajavaraṃ atimattabhūtaṃ, dāv'aggicakkam'asanī'va, sudāruṇan'taṃ, mett'ambusekavidhinā jitavā mun'indo.
asantaṃ yo paggaṇhāti, asantaṃ c'ūpasevati, tam'eva ghāsaṃ kurute, byaggho sañjīvako yathā'ti.
so an'upārambhacitto samāno bhabbo muṭṭhassaccaṃ pahātuṃ asampajaññaṃ pahātuṃ cetaso vikkhepaṃ pahātuṃ.
sabbasaṅkhāresu ca me nibbidasaññā paccupaṭṭhitā bhavissati, seyyathā'pi ukkhitta-asike vadhake.
yāvakīvañ'ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhū asubhasaññaṃ bhāvessanti
ratanattay'ānubhāvena ratanattayatejasā, dukkharogabhayāverā sokā sattu c'upaddavā anekā antarāyā pi vinassantu asesato.
dīghato tiṃsayojanaṃ vitthārato pannarasayojanaṃ assamapadaṃ māpehī'ti āha
so pana vassāno utu sāvaṇapoṭṭhapādamāsā, assayujakattikamāsā sarado, māgasiraphussamāsā hemanto, māghaphaggunamāsā sisiro, cittavesākhamāsā vasanto, jeṭṭh'āsaḷhamāsā gimho utū'ti veditabbo.
yo pana bhikkhu, yāvatatiyaṃ anusāviyamāne, saramāno santiṃ āpattiṃ n'āvikareyya, sampajānamusāvāda-assa hoti.
kāmaṃ taco ca nahāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu, sarīre upasussatu maṃsalohitaṃ
tassa nissaraṇaṃ santaṃ, atakk'āvacaraṃ dhuvaṃ. ajātaṃ asamuppannaṃ, asokaṃ virajaṃ padaṃ. nirodho dukkhadhammānaṃ, saṅkhārūpasamo sukho'ti.
ajānam'evaṃ, āvuso, avacaṃ jānāmi', apassaṃ passāmi'. tucchaṃ musā vilapin'ti, aññatra adhimānā, ayam'pi pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso.

sabbattha ve sappurisā cajanti, na kāmakāmā lapayanti santo,
sukhena phuṭṭhā atha vā dukhena, na ucc'āvacaṃ paṇḍitā dassayanti.
idh'āvuso, dhammayogā bhikkhū jhāyī bhikkhū apasādenti, ime pana jhāyino'mhā, jhāyino'mhā'ti jhāyanti pajjhāyanti nijjhāyanti avajjhāyanti
evaṃ no ayaṃ amhākaṃ pabbajjā avaṅkatā avañjhā bhavissati saphalā saudrayā.
seyyathā'pi balavā saṅkhadhamo appakasiren'eva catuddisā viññāpeyya, evam'eva kho evaṃ bhāvitāya mettāya cetovimuttiyā yaṃ pamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ na taṃ tatr'āvasissati, na taṃ tatra-avatiṭṭhati.
yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ tiṇ'avatthārakena vūpasameyya, ṭhapetvā thullavajjaṃ, ṭhapetvā gihippaṭisaṃyuttan'ti.

taṃ kiṃ maññasi, aggivessana, vatteyya rañño khattiyassa muddhā-avasittassa sakasmiṃ vijite vaso, ghātetāyaṃ vā ghātetuṃ, jāpetāyaṃ vā jāpetuṃ, pabbājetāyaṃ vā pabbājetuṃ, seyyathā'pi rañño pasenadissa kosalassa
addhuvaṃ me jīvitaṃ, dhuvaṃ me maraṇaṃ, avassaṃ mayā maritabbaṃ, maraṇapariyosānaṃ me jīvitaṃ, jīvitaṃ me aniyataṃ , maraṇaṃ me niyataṃ
samphappalāpī hoti akālavādī abhūtavādī anatthavādī adhammavādī avinayavādī, anidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti akālena anapadesaṃ apariyantavatiṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ.
ettako ce'pi, bhikkhu, attabhāvapaṭilābho abhavissa nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo, na'y'idaṃ brahmacariyavāso paññāyetha sammā dukkhakkhayāya.

evam'eva kho, ye hi keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā kāyena c'eva cittena ca kāmehi avūpakaṭṭhā viharanti, yo ca n'esaṃ kāmesu kāmacchando kāmasneho kāmamucchā kāmapipāsā kāmapariḷāho so ca ajjhattaṃ na suppahīno hoti
avūpasantacittassa anuppannañ'c'eva uddhaccakukkuccaṃ uppajjati uppannañ'ca uddhaccakukkuccaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattatī'ti
aho vata re amhākaṃ paṇḍitaka, aho vata re amhākaṃ bahussutaka, aho vata re amhākaṃ tevijjaka
atha kiñ'carahi ty'āyaṃ, sāriputta, uḷārā āsabhī vācā bhāsitā, eka-aṃso gahito, sīhanādo nadito

tatiyam'pi kho āyasmā ānando abhikkantāya rattiyā, nikkhante pacchime yāme, uddhaste aruṇe, nandimukhiyā rattiyā uṭṭhāy'āsanā eka-aṃsaṃ uttar'āsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā ten'añjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etad'avoca
idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye kāy'ānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ
yāvakīvañ'ca bhikkhave bhikkhū paccattaññ'eva satiṃ upaṭṭhāpessanti, kin'ti anāgatā ca pesalā sabrahmacārī āgaccheyyuṃ āgatā ca pesalā sabrahmacārī phāsuṃ vihareyyun'ti
yāvakīvañ'ca bhikkhave bhikkhū paccattaññ'eva satiṃ upaṭṭhāpessanti, kin'ti anāgatā ca pesalā sabrahmacārī āgaccheyyuṃ āgatā ca pesalā sabrahmacārī phāsuṃ vihareyyun'ti
dissati, bhikkhave, imassa cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassa ācayo'pi apacayo'pi ādānam'pi nikkhepanam'pi.
evaṃ utu-ācikkhanaṃ. utūn'īdha pana sāsane hem'antagimhavassānānaṃ vasena tīṇi honti.

dullabho purisa-ājañño, na so sabbattha jāyati,
yattha so jāyati dhīro, taṃ kulaṃ sukham'edhati.
paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevāmi yāva'd'eva sītassa paṭighātāya uṇhassa paṭighātāya ḍaṃsamakasavāta-atapasiriṃsapasamphassānaṃ paṭighātāya yāva'd'eva hirikopīnapaṭicchādan'atthaṃ
kathañ'ca, gahapati, āturakāyo c'eva hoti, āturacitto ca? idha, gahapati, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido
kammassako'mhi kammadāya-ado kammayoni kammabandhu kammapaṭisaraṇo. yaṃ kammaṃ karissāmi kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā tassa dāy'ādo bhavissāmi.
seyyathā'pi ādittacelo vā ādittasīso vā, tass'eva celassa vā sīsassa vā nibbāpanāya adhimattaṃ chandañ'ca vāyāmañ'ca ussāhañ'ca ussoḷhiñ'ca appaṭivāniñ'ca satiñ'ca sampajaññañ'ca kareyya.

kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā, virūparūpena mathenti cittaṃ.
ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, tasmā ahaṃ pabbajito'mhi rāja.
devatā nu'si? gandhabbo? ādu sakko purindado?

yo ve kiñcikkhakamyatā, panthasmiṃ vajantaṃ janaṃ.
hantvā kiñcikkham'ādeti, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
tassa mukha-adhāne kāraṇaṃ kāriyamānassa honti y'eva visūkāyitāni visevitāni vipphanditāni kānici kānici, yathā taṃ akāritapubbaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāriyamānassa.
sati-ādhipateyyā sabbe dhammā, paññ'uttarā sabbe dhammā, vimuttisārā sabbe dhammā, amat'ogadhā sabbe dhammā, nibbānapariyosānā sabbe dhammā'ti.
ānāpānassati bhikkhave bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā

bhavatu sabbamaṅgalaṃ, rakkhantu sabbadevatā,
sabbadhamm'ānubhāvena, sadā sotthi bhavantu te

datvā ca bhutvā ca yatha-anubhāvaṃ,
anindito saggam'upeti ṭhānan'ti.
abhabbo'va tāva kālaṃ kātuṃ yāva na sota-apattiphalaṃ sacchikaroti.
kicchaṃ vat'āyaṃ loko āpanno, jāyati ca jīyati ca mīyati ca cavati ca upapajjati ca, atha ca pan'imassa dukkhassa nissaraṇaṃ nappajānāti jarāmaraṇassa
na ca tassa bhikkhuno aññāṇakena mutti atthi, yañ'ca tattha āpattiṃ āpanno tañ'ca yathādhammo kāretabbo, uttari c'assa moho āropetabbo
paṭhamena vayasā anikīḷitāvino kāmesu yāvajīvaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ caranti, addhānañ'ca āpādentī'ti?
rājā disampati bhavantaṃ jotipālaṃ māṇavaṃ āmantayati
vipariṇāmadhammato asārakato aghamūlato vadhakato vibhavato sāsavato saṅkhatato māra-amisato
kudāssu nām'āhaṃ tad'āyatanaṃ upasampajja viharissāmi yadariyā eta'r'ahi āyatanaṃ upasampajja viharantī'ti
upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ mahācundaṃ etad'avoca, āyām'āvuso cunda, yen'āyasmā channo ten'upasaṅkamissāma gilānapucchakā'ti.
seyyathā'pi allaṃ kaṭṭhaṃ sasnehaṃ, ārakā udakā thale nikkhittaṃ. atha puriso āgaccheyya uttar'āraṇiṃ ādāya aggiṃ abhinibbattessāmi, tejo pātukarissāmī'ti.
vīriya-arambhāya saṃvattanti, no kosajjāya, subharatāya saṃvattanti, no dubbharatāyā
rūpappaṭisaṃvedī'ti nīlapīt'ādibhedaṃ ārammaṇaṃ vavatthāpento rūpaṃ paṭisaṃviditaṃ karoti
catūhi mahādevarājūhi kata-aradhanaṃ paṭicca pañca mahāvilokane viloketvā
na kamm'ārāmatā, na bhass'ārāmatā, na nidd'ārāmatā, na saṅgaṇik'ārāmatā, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, asaṃsagg'ārāmatā, nippapañc'ārāmatā.
tassa taṃ ṭhānaṃ abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhato yo ārogye ārogyamado so sabbaso vā pahīyati tanu vā pana hoti. idaṃ kho, bhikkhave, atthavasaṃ paṭicca byādhidhammo'mhi, byādhiṃ anatīto'ti
imehi sakkārehi yath'ārahaṃ āropitehi abhipūjayāma
atha kho pesso ca hatth'ārohaputto kandarako ca paribbājako yena bhagavā ten'upasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā pesso hatth'ārohaputto bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekam'antaṃ nisīdi.
ālokasaññaṃ manasi kareyyāsi, divāsaññaṃ adhiṭṭhaheyyāsi – yathā divā tathā rattiṃ yathā rattiṃ tathā divā. iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sa'p'pabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveyyāsi
uddhaccakukkuccaṃ, bhikkhave, āvaraṇaṃ nīvaraṇaṃ cetaso ajjhāruhaṃ paññāya dubbalīkaraṇaṃ.

dhammo have rakkhati dhammacāriṃ,
dhammo suciṇṇo sukham'āvahati.
es'ānisaṃso dhamme suciṇṇe,
na duggatiṃ gacchati dhammacārī.

caturo samaṇā na pañcam'atthi,
te te āvikaromi sakkhipuṭṭho,
maggajino maggadesako ca,
magge jīvati yo ca maggadūsī.
bhikkhū ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa āvesanaṃ uttiṇam'akaṃsu.
pahīnā te ca ābādhā tiṇṇannam'pi mah'esinaṃ, magg'āhatakilesā va patt'ānuppattidhammataṃ.
yo pana bhikkhu adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āhareyya, aññatra udakadantaponā, pācittiyaṃ.
icc'evam'ek'antaabhipūjaneyyakaṃ vatthuttayaṃ vandayat'ābhisaṅkhataṃ
tassa hi pathavito yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā nīl'ādiārammaṇaṃ samosarantaṃ paripuṇṇabhāvaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti
tañ'ca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, kulaputtā upenti atthavasikā, atthavasaṃ paṭicca, n'eva rāj'ābhinītā, na cor'ābhinītā, na iṇ'aṭṭā, na bhay'aṭṭā, na ājīvikāpakatā.

sītavātaparittāṇaṃ, hirikopīnachādanaṃ.
matt'aṭṭhiyaṃ abhuñjiṃsu, santuṭṭhā itar'ītare.
supinak'ūpamā kāmā ittarapaccupaṭṭhān'aṭṭhenā'ti passanto vikkhambhanato kāme parivajjeti
iminā cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā itthan'nāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ cīvarena acchādessāmī'ti
phuṭṭho, bhikkhave, vedeti, phuṭṭho ceteti, phuṭṭho sañjānāti. itth'ete'pi dhammā calā c'eva byathā ca aniccā vipariṇāmino aññathābhāvino.
gāmakathaṃ nigamakathaṃ nagarakathaṃ janapadakathaṃ itthikathaṃ sūrakathaṃ visikhākathaṃ
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, yāni kānici kulāni bahuitthikāni appapurisāni tāni suppadhaṃsiyāni honti corehi kumbhatthenakehi.
saññā kho, poṭṭhapāda, paṭhamaṃ uppajjati, pacchā ñāṇaṃ, saññ'uppādā ca pana ñāṇ'uppādo hoti. so evaṃ pajānāti, idappaccayā
purimā, bhikkhave, koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya, ito pubbe avijjā n'āhosi, atha pacchā samabhavī'ti. evañ'c'etaṃ, bhikkhave, vuccati, atha ca pana paññāyati, idappaccayā avijjā'ti
tatrā'p'āsiṃ evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto evaṃvaṇṇo evam'āhāro evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī evam'āyupariyanto, so tato cuto idh'ūpapanno'ti.
bāhuṃ sahassam'abhinimmita sāvudhan'taṃ, grīmekhalaṃ uditaghorasasenamāraṃ, dān'ādidhammavidhinā jitavā muna-indo, tan'tejasā bhavatu te jayamaṅgalāni
iti imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti, imass'uppādā idaṃ uppajjati, imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hoti, imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhati
iminā'p'etaṃ, āvuso, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā na cakkhu rūpānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, na rūpā cakkhussa saṃyojanaṃ.
pisuṇaṃ vācaṃ pahāya pisuṇāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti, ito sutvā na amutra akkhātā imesaṃ bhedāya, amutra vā sutvā na imesaṃ akkhātā amūsaṃ bhedāya

tato pāsādikaṃ āsi, gataṃ bhuttaṃ nisevitaṃ.
siniddhā teladhārā'va, ahosi iriyāpatho.
ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṃ viharati isipatane migadāye. tatra kho bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū āmantesi
tasmā't'iha, bhikkhave, vīriyaṃ ārabhatha appattassa pattiyā, anadhigatassa adhigamāya, asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.

so puratthimena nagarassa navaṃ santh'āgāraṃ kārāpetvā kesamassuṃ ohāretvā khar'ājinaṃ nivāsetvā sappitelena kāyaṃ abbhañjitvā magavisāṇena piṭṭhiṃ kaṇḍuvamāno navaṃ santh'āgāraṃ pavisati, saddhiṃ mahā-īsiyā brāhmaṇena ca purohitena.
ukkoṭanavañcananikatisāciyogā paṭivirato hoti, chedanavadhabandhanaviparāmosaālopasahasākārā paṭivirato hoti
seyyathā'pi vā panānanda, rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ sūriye uggacchante, jāneyyāsi tvaṃ, ānanda, andhakāro antaradhāyissati, āloko pātubhavissatī'ti?
bhavissanti, bhikkhave, anāgatam'addhānaṃ licchavī sukhumālā mudutalunahatthapādā te mudukāsu seyyāsu tūlabimbohanāsu yāvasūriy'uggamanā seyyaṃ kappissanti.
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, cattāro āsīvisā uggatejā ghoravisā. atha puriso āgaccheyya jīvitu'kāmo amaritu'kāmo sukhakāmo dukkhappaṭikūlo.
api ca kho mātugāmassa ucchādanaparimaddananhāpanasambāhanaṃ sādiyati.
taṇ'ṭhānasammajjanañ'ca, tattha padīp'ujjalanañ'ca, āsanapaññapanañ'ca

etha, tumhe'pi, bhikkhave, ek'āsanabhojanaṃ bhuñjatha. ek'āsanabhojanaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tumhe'pi bhuñjamānā app'ābādhatañ'ca sañjānissatha app'ātaṅkatañ'ca laha-uṭṭhānañ'ca balañ'ca phāsuvihārañ'cā'ti.
utukkhānañ'ca, bhikkhugaṇanā'ca, bhikkhunīnam'ovādo cā'ti.
tam'enaṃ tathāgato uttariṃ vineti, ehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, indriyesu guttadvāro hohi, cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā mā nimittaggāhī hohi m'ānubyañjanaggāhī
evaṃ svākkhāto, bhikkhave, mayā dhammo uttāno vivaṭo pakāsito chinnapilotiko.

udar'āvadehakaṃ bhutvā, sayant'uttānaseyyakā.
kathaṃ vattenti paṭibuddhā, yā kathā satthugarahitā.

udar'āvadehakaṃ bhutvā, sayant'uttānaseyyakā.
kathaṃ vattenti paṭibuddhā, yā kathā satthugarahitā.
yāv'āhaṃ tesaṃ uddisitvā āgacchāmī'ti, udāhu vippalapan'tass'eva coraghātā sīsaṃ chindeyyun'ti?
saññācikāya pana bhikkhunā kuṭiṃ kārayamānena, assāmikaṃ att'uddesaṃ, pamāṇikā kāretabbā. tatr'idaṃ pamāṇaṃ, dīghaso dvādasa vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā, tiriyaṃ satt'antarā.
ajja't'agge te, āvuso, samaṇ'uddesa na c'eva so bhagavā satthā apadisitabbo
pañca oram'bhāgiyāni saññojanāni, sakkāyadiṭṭhi, vicikicchā, sīlabbataparāmāso, kāmacchando, byāpādo. pañca uddham'bhāgiyāni saññojanāni, rūparāgo, arūparāgo, māno, uddhaccaṃ, avijjā.
ayañ'ca kho dakkhiṇā dinnā, saṅghamhi supatiṭṭhitā. dīgharattaṃ hitāy'assa, ṭhānaso upakappati.
iminā puññakammena upajjhāyā guṇ'uttarā, ācariy'ūpakārā ca mātāpitā ca ñātakā, suriyo candimā rājā, guṇavantā narā'pi ca
manussā vā maṃ upakkameyyuṃ, amanussā vā maṃ upakkameyyuṃ, tena me assa kālakiriyā. so mama assa antarāyo'ti.

mātāpitu upaṭṭhānaṃ, puttadārassa saṅgaho.
anākulā ca kamm'antā, etaṃ maṅgalam'uttamaṃ.
aho vat'āhaṃ tad'antaraṃ jīveyyaṃ yad'antaraṃ upaḍḍhapiṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṃ manasi kareyyaṃ, bahu vata me kataṃ assā'ti.
puññaṃ mayā yaṃ mama sabb'upaddavā mā hontu ve tassa pabhāvasiddhiyā
tividh'āhaṃ kammānaṃ vipākaṃ vadāmi, diṭṭh'eva dhamme, upapajjaṃ vā, apare vā pariyāye. ayaṃ vuccati kammānaṃ vipāko.
bhagavā pana, bhante, arahaṃ sammāsambuddho pahoti tathā kātuṃ yathā sabbo loko kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjeyyā'ti?
attadīpānaṃ, bhikkhave, viharataṃ attasaraṇānaṃ anaññasaraṇānaṃ, dhammadīpānaṃ dhammasaraṇānaṃ anaññasaraṇānaṃ yoni upaparikkhitabbā.
rūpadhātuyā kho yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upay'upādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhān'ābhinives'ānusayā, tesaṃ khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā cittaṃ suvimuttan'ti vuccati.
paṭisaṅkhā yoniso piṇḍapātaṃ paṭisevāmi n'eva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya yāva'd'eva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā yāpanāya vihiṃs'ūparatiyā brahmacariy'ānuggahāya
yo pana bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā abhinisīdeyya vā abhinipajjeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
honti h'ete, sāriputta, channassa bhikkhuno mittakulāni suhajjakulāni upavajjakulāni.
honti h'ete, sāriputta, channassa bhikkhuno mittakulāni suhajjakulāni upavajjakulāni.

yo pāṇabhūtāni aheṭhayaṃ caraṃ,
par'ūpavādā na karonti pāpaṃ,
bhīruṃ pasaṃsanti na hi tattha sūraṃ,
bhayā hi santo na karonti pāpan'ti.
katamā ca, bhikkhave, aṭṭhārasa vedanā? cha somanass'ūpavicārā, cha domanass'ūpavicārā, cha upekkh'ūpavicārā

yath'indakhīlo pathaviṃ sito siyā, catubbhi vātehi asampakampiyo.
tath'ūpamaṃ sappurisaṃ vadāmi, yo ariyasaccāni avecca passati.
aṭṭhamaṃ adhiṭṭhānapārami, navamaṃ mettāpārami, dasamaṃ upekkhāpāramī'ti
evan'taṃ uposathakammaṃ imehi catūhi lakkhaṇehi saṅgahitaṃ pattakallaṃ nāma hoti, kātuṃ yuttarūpaṃ.
bhikkhugaṇanā nāma imasmiṃ uposath'agge uposath'atthāya sannipatitā bhikkhū ettakā'ti, bhikkhūnaṃ gaṇanā.
ayaṃ hem'anto'tu, asmiñ'ca utumhi aṭṭha uposathā, iminā pakkhena, eko uposatho sampatto, satta uposathā atikkantā, aṭṭha uposathā paripuṇṇā.
idha, bhante, koci'd'eva dhammo samuppādo uppajjeyya, ekato assa bhagavā ekato bhikkhusaṅgho ca.

yo ve uppatitaṃ kodhaṃ, rathaṃ bhantaṃ'va vāraye,
tam'ahaṃ sārathiṃ brūmi, rasmiggāho itaro jano.
asaṃvutaṃ hutvā osaramānaṃ kiles'uppattiyā kāraṇabhāvena sadosagamanena gacchatī'ti samuddan'aṭṭhena'pi samuddo.
jīvako … janaṃ ussāretvā tirokaraṇiyaṃ parikkhipitvā thambhe upanibandhitvā bhariyaṃ purato ṭhapetvā udaracchaviṃ uppāṭetvā antagaṇṭhiṃ nīharitvā bhariyāya dassesi
mataṃ me jīvitā seyyaṃ, tasmā araññaṃ pavisitvā ubbandhitvā marissāmī'ti araññaṃ gato maraṇabhayatajjito paṭinivatti.
ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo ubhatobhāgavimutto.
ubhay'atthaṃ vā hi bhikkhave sampassamānena alam'eva appamādena sampādetun'ti
tassa sā sukhā vedanā nirujjhati. sukhāya vedanāya nirodhā uppajjati dukkhā vedanā. so dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno socati kilamati paridevati urattāḷiṃ kandati sammohaṃ āpajjati.
tena kho pana samayena indasālaguhā visamā santī samā sampādi, sambādhā santī urundā sampādi, andhakāro guhāyaṃ antaradhāyi, āloko udapādi yathā taṃ devānaṃ dev'ānubhāvena.
no ce'taṃ chando jāyetha, na'y'idaṃ ussaheyya, no ce'te dhammā nijjhānaṃ khameyyuṃ, na'y'idaṃ chando jāyetha.
seyyathā'pi ādittacelo vā ādittasīso vā, tass'eva celassa vā sīsassa vā nibbāpanāya adhimattaṃ chandañ'ca vāyāmañ'ca ussāhañ'ca ussoḷhiñ'ca appaṭivāniñ'ca satiñ'ca sampajaññañ'ca kareyya.

jīvitānaṃ parikkhāre, bhesajje atha paccaye.
na bāḷhaṃ ussukā āsuṃ, yathā te āsavakkhaye

chinda sotaṃ parakkamma, kāme panūda brāhmaṇa.
nappahāya munī kāme, n'ekattam'upapajjati.
so anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarāmi, seyyath'idaṃ, ekam'pi jātiṃ dve'pi jātiyo tisso'pi jātiyo catasso'pi jātiyo pañca'pi jātiyo dasa'pi jātiyo vīsam'pi jātiyo tiṃsam'pi jātiyo

evaṃ vihāriṃ ātāpiṃ,
ahorattam'atanditaṃ.
taṃ ve bhadda-ekaratto'ti,
santo ācikkhate munī'ti.
atthi bhikkhave pañho ek'aṃsabyākaraṇīyo, atthi pañho vibhajjabyākaraṇīyo, atthi pañho paṭipucchābyākaraṇīyo, atthi pañho ṭhapanīyo.

mātā yathā niyaṃ puttaṃ, āyusā ekaputtam'anurakkhe,
evam'pi sabbabhūtesu, mānasam'bhāvaye aparimāṇaṃ.
ayaṃ vasabhasaṃvacchare hem'antautu. asmiṃ utumhi māghamāsassa kāḷapakkhe ekādasamaṃ, candavāram'idan'ti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

etha, tumhe'pi, bhikkhave, ek'āsanabhojanaṃ bhuñjatha. ek'āsanabhojanaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tumhe'pi bhuñjamānā app'ābādhatañ'ca sañjānissatha app'ātaṅkatañ'ca lah'uṭṭhānañ'ca balañ'ca phāsuvihārañ'cā'ti.
ek'āsanik'aṅgaṃ pattapiṇḍik'aṅgaṃ khalupacchābhattik'aṅgaṃ āraññik'aṅgaṃ rukkhamūlik'aṅgaṃ abbhokāsik'aṅgaṃ sosānik'aṅgaṃ
ambho purisa, na tvaṃ addasa manussesu itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā ek'āhamataṃ vā dvī'hamataṃ vā tī'hamataṃ vā uddhumātakaṃ vinīlakaṃ vipubbakajātan'ti?
ekissā'pi, bhante, sattiyā haññamāno tatonidānaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvediyetha, ko pana vādo tīhi sattisatehi haññamāno'ti!
ek'ūnatiṃsatime saṃvacchare mah'ābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā, chabbassāni mahāpadānaṃ padahitvā
idāni kho pana dvesahassapañcasata-ekūnapaññāsā saṃvaccharāni c'eva, navamāsāni ca, catuvīsatidivasāni atikkantāni.
mā, brāhmaṇa, paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ pamādo, paṭhame jhāne cittaṃ saṇṭhapehi, paṭhame jhāne cittaṃ ekodiṃ karohi, paṭhame jhāne cittaṃ samādahā'ti.
akuppā cetovimutti etad'attham'idaṃ brāhmaṇa brahmacariyaṃ
evaṃsampadam'idaṃ āyasmantānaṃ satthari sammukhībhūte, taṃ bhagavantaṃ atisitvā, amhe etam'atthaṃ paṭipucchitabbaṃ maññatha.
yato kho te bhikkhū n'āsakkhiṃsu āyasmantaṃ yamakaṃ etasmā pāpakā diṭṭhigatā vivecetuṃ

ye kho te bhikkhū sekkhā apattamānasā anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ
patthayamānā viharanti tesu me ayaṃ evarūpī anusāsanī hoti.
ayañ'ca kho āyasmā evaṃkārī evaṃsamācāro asucigāmakaṇṭako'ti. taṃ kaṇṭako'ti iti viditvā saṃvaro ca asaṃvaro ca veditabbo.
evaṃ sante kho, uttara, andho bhāvitindriyo bhavissati, badhiro bhāvit'indriyo bhavissati.
mārā labhantu n'okāsaṃ kātuñ'ca viriyesu me.

satthā ca me lokam'imaṃ adhiṭṭhahi,
aniccato addhuvato asārato,
pakkhanda maṃ citta jinassa sāsane,
tārehi oghā mahatā suduttarā.
saddhassa, bhikkhave, sāvakassa satthusāsane pariyogāya vattato rumhaniyaṃ satthusāsanaṃ hoti ojavantaṃ.
seyyathā'pi rañño paccantime nagare anupariyāyapatho hoti ucco c'eva vitthato ca, evam'evaṃ kho, ariyasāvako ottappī hoti, ottappati kāyaduccaritena vacīduccaritena manoduccaritena
caram'pi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃbhūto ātāpī ottāpī satataṃ samitaṃ āraddhavīriyo pahit'atto'ti vuccati.
idha saddhājāto upasaṅkamati, upasaṅkamanto payirupāsati, payirupāsanto sotaṃ odahati, ohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇāti, sutvā dhammaṃ dhāreti, dhatānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthaṃ upaparikkhati,
cha, bhikkhave, ānisaṃse sampassamānena alam'eva bhikkhunā sabbadhammesu anodhiṃ karitvā anattasaññaṃ upaṭṭhāpetuṃ.
namo omak'ātītassa tassa vatthuttayassa'pi. namokārappabhāvena vigacchantu upaddavā.
na oramattakena vises'ādhigamena antarāvosānaṃ āpajjissanti
suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho. ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kattukāmo assāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ. so saṅghaṃ kuṭivatthuolokanaṃ yācati.
sakkatvā dhammaratanaṃ, osadhaṃ uttamaṃ varaṃ, pariḷāh'ūpasamanaṃ. dhammatejena sotthinā nassant'upaddavā sabbe, bhayā vūpasamentu te.
yo so, bhante, bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇ'āsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano samma'd'aññāvimutto, so cha ṭhānāni adhimutto hoti
tam'enaṃ dakkho goghātako vā goghātak'antevāsī vā aṭṭhikaṅkalaṃ sunikkantaṃ nikkantaṃ nimmaṃsaṃ lohitamakkhitaṃ upacchubheyya.
sakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggahessāmī'ti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
dvayanissito khv'āyaṃ, kaccāna, loko yebhuyyena, atthitañ'c'eva natthitañ'ca.
dussīlo, bhikkhave, sīlakathāya kacchamānāya abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyati kopañ'ca dosañ'ca appaccayañ'ca pātukaroti.
appamattako so, bhikkhave, kaṭaggaho yaṃ so akkhadhutto paṭhamen'eva kaṭaggahena mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ adhigaccheyya.

dhanañ'ca puttaṃ bhariyañ'ca, chaḍḍayitvāna niggatā.
kaṭacchubhikkhahetū'pi, akicchāni nisevare.
ūru'ṭṭhikaṃ, kaṭi'ṭṭhikaṃ, phāsuk'aṭṭhikaṃ, piṭṭhi'ṭṭhikaṃ, khandh'aṭṭhikaṃ, gīv'aṭṭhikaṃ, hanuk'aṭṭhikaṃ, dant'aṭṭhikaṃ, aññena sīsakaṭāhaṃ.
amatamhi vijjamāne, kiṃ tava pañcakaṭukena pītena, sabbā hi kāmaratiyo, kaṭukatarā pañcakaṭukena.
seyyathā'pi puriso sappikumbhaṃ vā telakumbhaṃ vā gambhīraṃ udakarahadaṃ ogāhitvā bhindeyya. tatra yā assa sakkharā vā kaṭhalā vā sā adhogāmī assa

yathā kaṇṭakaṭṭhānamhi, careyya anupāhano.
satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāna, evaṃ gāme munī care.

kaṇhaṃ dhammaṃ vippahāya, sukkaṃ bhāvetha paṇḍito,
okā anokam'āgamma, viveke yattha dūramaṃ.
iti sakaraṇ'okāsānaṃ pubbakiccānaṃ katattā, nikkaraṇ'okāsānaṃ pubbakiccānaṃ pakatiyā pariniṭṭhitattā, evan'taṃ navavidhaṃ pubbakiccaṃ pariniṭṭhitaṃ hoti.
iti sakaraṇ'okāsānaṃ pubbakiccānaṃ katattā, nikkaraṇ'okāsānaṃ pubbakiccānaṃ pakatiyā pariniṭṭhitattā, evan'taṃ navavidhaṃ pubbakiccaṃ pariniṭṭhitaṃ hoti.
yaṃ kho, bhikkhave, satthārā karaṇīyaṃ sāvakānaṃ hit'esinā anukampakena anukampaṃ upādāya, kataṃ vo taṃ mayā.
etāni pañca kammāni, chand'āharaṇ'ādīni pātimokkh'uddesato paṭhamaṃ kattabbatā, uposathassa uposathakammassa pubbakiccan'ti vuccati.
sa kho so, gahapati, ariyasāvako uṭṭhānavīriy'ādhigatehi bhogehi bāhābalaparicitehi sed'āvakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi imāni cattāri pattakammāni kattā hoti.
so pana vassāno utu sāvaṇapoṭṭhapādamāsā, assayujakattikamāsā sarado, māgasiraphussamāsā hemanto, māghaphaggunamāsā sisiro, cittavesākhamāsā vasanto, jeṭṭh'āsaḷhamāsā gimho utū'ti veditabbo.
sace tvaṃ, rāhula, paccavekkhamāno evaṃ jāneyyāsi, yaṃ kho ahaṃ idaṃ kāyena kammaṃ kattu'kāmo idaṃ me kāyakammaṃ attabyābādhāya'pi saṃvatteyya

sabbakārukasippāni, cittiṃ katvāna sikkhare.
avūpasantā ajjhattaṃ, sāmaññ'attho'ti acchati .
idha, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo yam'enaṃ hatthidammasārathi kāraṇaṃ kāreti, yadi vā katapubbaṃ yadi vā akatapubbaṃ, taṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā ohitasoto suṇāti.

okaṃ pahāya aniketasārī, gāme akubbaṃ muni santhavāni,
kāmehi ritto apurekkharāno, kathaṃ na viggayha janena kayirā.
ku'icc'etassa kad hoti sare pare. kucchitaṃ annaṃ kadannaṃ, kucchitaṃ asanaṃ kadassanaṃ

pathavisamo no virujjhati, indakhīl'ūpamo tādi subbato,
rahado'va apetakaddamo, saṃsārā na bhavanti tādino.
bhikkhu yathā iṇaṃ yathā rogaṃ yathā bandhan'āgāraṃ yathā dāsabyaṃ yathā kantār'addhānamaggaṃ, ime pañca nīvaraṇe appahīne attani samanupassati
asu hi, bhante, gaṅgāya nadiyā mahā udakakkhandho so amunā loṇakapallena loṇo na assa apeyyo
atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā ten'upasaṅkami
yāvatikā ca bhikkhū kammappattā saṅgh'uposath'ārahā cattāro vā tato vā atirekā pakatattā pārājikaṃ anāpannā saṅghena vā anukkhittā.
evaṃ me sutaṃ ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā pāvāyaṃ viharati cundassa kammāraputtassa ambavane
na kamm'ārāmatā, na bhass'ārāmatā, na nidd'ārāmatā, na saṅgaṇik'ārāmatā, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, asaṃsagg'ārāmatā, nippapañc'ārāmatā.

gabbham'eke uppajjanti, nirayaṃ pāpakammino,
saggaṃ sugatino yanti, parinibbanti anāsavā.
okāsa! sammajjanī, sammajjanakaraṇaṃ kataṃ kiṃ?
tassa dāpetvā vā adāpetvā vā uyyojeyya, gacch'āvuso, na me tayā saddhiṃ kathā vā nisajjā vā phāsu hoti, ekakassa me kathā vā nisajjā vā phāsu hotī'ti. etad'eva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ, pācittiyaṃ.

kiṃ kayirā udapānena,
āpā ce sabbadā siyuṃ,
taṇhāya mūlato chetvā,
kissa pariyesanaṃ care'ti.
seyyathā'pi udapatto āvilo luḷito kalalībhūto andhakāre nikkhitto. tattha cakkhumā puriso sakaṃ mukhanimittaṃ paccavekkhamāno yathābhūtaṃ na jāneyya na passeyya.

ārāmacetyā vanacetyā, pokkharañño sunimmitā.
manussarāmaṇeyyassa, kalaṃ n'āgghanti soḷasiṃ.
imesaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, samaṇamalānaṃ samaṇadosānaṃ samaṇakasaṭānaṃ āpāyikānaṃ ṭhānānaṃ duggativedaniyānaṃ pahānā samaṇasāmīcippaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno'ti vadāmi.

yo ca vantakasāvassa, sīlesu susamāhito.
upeto damasaccena, sa ve kāsāvam'arahati.
sace pan'āyaṃ kulaputto mah'āyo samāno kasiraṃ jīvikaṃ kappeti, tassa bhavanti vattāro, ajaddhumārikaṃ v'āyaṃ kulaputto marissatī'ti
yato kho ariyasāvako imehi sattahi saddhammehi samannāgato hoti, imesañ'ca catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ ābhicetasikānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṃ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
kassapassa vinayasmiṃ pabbajjaṃ.
atha kho so bhikkhu vihāraṃ pavisissāmī'ti kavāṭaṃ paṇāmento addasa sabbaṃ vihāraṃ ahinā puṇṇaṃ, vātapānehi bhoge nikkhante, disvāna bhīto vissaram'akāsi.
dūteyyapahiṇagamanaanuyogā paṭivirato hoti, kayavikkayā paṭivirato hoti, tulākūṭakaṃsakūṭamānakūṭā paṭivirato hoti
uposathakaraṇato pubbe navavidhaṃ pubbakiccaṃ kātabbaṃ hoti

kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā, virūparūpena mathenti cittaṃ.
ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, tasmā ahaṃ pabbajito'mhi rāja.

evam'eva kho, ye hi keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā kāyena c'eva cittena ca kāmehi avūpakaṭṭhā viharanti, yo ca n'esaṃ kāmesu kāmacchando kāmasneho kāmamucchā kāmapipāsā kāmapariḷāho so ca ajjhattaṃ na suppahīno hoti

evam'eva kho, ye hi keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā kāyena c'eva cittena ca kāmehi avūpakaṭṭhā viharanti, yo ca n'esaṃ kāmesu kāmacchando kāmasneho kāmamucchā kāmapipāsā kāmapariḷāho so ca ajjhattaṃ na suppahīno hoti
evam'eva kho, ye hi keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā kāyena c'eva cittena ca kāmehi avūpakaṭṭhā viharanti, yo ca n'esaṃ kāmesu kāmacchando kāmasneho kāmamucchā kāmapipāsā kāmapariḷāho

idaṃ pure cittam'acāri cārikaṃ,
yen'icchakaṃ yatthakāmaṃ yathāsukhaṃ,
tadajj'ahaṃ niggahessāmi yoniso,
hatthippabhinnaṃ viya aṅkusaggaho.

okaṃ pahāya aniketasārī,
gāme akubbaṃ muni santhavāni,
kāmehi ritto apurekkharāno,
kathaṃ na viggayha janena kayirā.
tattha katame avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā? puññ'ābhisaṅkhāro, apuññ'ābhisaṅkhāro, āneñj'ābhisaṅkhāro, kāyasaṅkhāro, vacīsaṅkhāro, cittasaṅkhāro.

gahakāraka diṭṭho'si, puna gehaṃ na kāhasi,
sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhataṃ,
visaṅkhāragataṃ cittaṃ, taṇhānaṃ khayam'ajjhagā.
na avagaṇḍakārakaṃ bhuñjissāmī'ti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
asaṃvutaṃ hutvā osaramānaṃ kiles'uppattiyā kāraṇabhāvena sadosagamanena gacchatī'ti samuddan'aṭṭhena'pi samuddo.
dassanam'p'āhaṃ, bhikkhave, tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahukāraṃ vadāmi

anekajātisaṃsāraṃ, sandhāvissaṃ anibbisaṃ,
gahakāraṃ gavesanto, dukkhā jāti punappunaṃ.
tena hi tvaṃ mahante mahante sāṇipasibbake kārāpetvā hiraññasuvaṇṇassa pūrāpetvā sakaṭehi nibbāhāpetvā majjhe gaṅgāya sote osādehi.
na ca tassa bhikkhuno aññāṇakena mutti atthi, yañ'ca tattha āpattiṃ āpanno tañ'ca yathādhammo kāretabbo, uttari c'assa moho āropetabbo
dutiyo musalo paripatitvā aññatarassa dārakassa matthake avatthāsi. so kālamakāsi.
tassā puriso sotena vuyhamāno kāse ce'pi gaṇheyya, te palujjeyyuṃ. so tatonidānaṃ anayabyasanaṃ āpajjeyya.
tam'enaṃ dve balavanto purisā nānābāhāsu gahetvā taṃ aṅgārakāsuṃ upakaḍḍheyyuṃ. atha kho tassa purisassa ārakā'v'assa cetanā ārakā patthanā ārakā paṇidhi.

kikī'va aṇḍaṃ, camarī'va vāladhiṃ. piyaṃ'va puttaṃ,
nayanaṃ'va ekakaṃ. tath'eva sīlaṃ, anurakkhamānā.

yaṃ kiñci vittaṃ idha vā huraṃ vā,
saggesu vā yaṃ ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ.
na no samaṃ atthi tathāgatena
aggasmiṃ dānaṃ dadataṃ, aggaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati. aggaṃ āyu ca vaṇṇo ca, yaso kitti sukhaṃ balaṃ.
buddho kira loke uppanno'ti. tāva'd'eva ca pana bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamitu'kāmo hoti.
ten'ānanda, bhikkhunā kismiñci'd'eva pasādanīye nimitte cittaṃ paṇidahitabbaṃ.
paṇḍitā h'āvuso, manussā vīmaṃsakā, kismiṃ pan'āyasmantānaṃ chandarāgavinay'akkhāyī satthā'ti? rūpe … vedanāya … saññāya … sankhāresu … viññāṇe chandarāgavinay'akkhāyī satthā'ti.

kiṃ kayirā udapānena,
āpā ce sabbadā siyuṃ,
taṇhāya mūlato chetvā,
kissa pariyesanaṃ care'ti.
bhante nāgasena, kiṃlakkhaṇaṃ viññāṇan'ti? vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ, mahārāja, viññāṇan'ti.

kiṃ kayirā udapānena,
āpā ce sabbadā siyuṃ,
taṇhāya mūlato chetvā,
kissa pariyesanaṃ care'ti.
amatamhi vijjamāne, kiṃ tava pañcakaṭukena pītena, sabbā hi kāmaratiyo, kaṭukatarā pañcakaṭukena.
yāvakīvañ'ca bhikkhave bhikkhū abhiṇhaṃ sannipātā bhavissanti sannipātabahulā, vuddhiy'eva pāṭikaṅkhā no parihāni
api ca kho yāni'ssa tāni pubbe mātugāmena saddhiṃ hasitalapitakīḷitāni tāni anussarati

ime kho, bhikkhave, dve sukkā dhammā lokaṃ na pāleyyuṃ, na'y'idha paññāyetha mātā'ti vā mātucchā'ti vā mātulānī'ti vā ācariyabhariyā'ti vā garūnaṃ dārā'ti vā. sambhedaṃ loko agamissa, yathā ajeḷakā kukkuṭasūkarā soṇasiṅgālā.
aj'eḷakapaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hoti, kukkuṭasūkarapaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hoti
kiñ'c'āpi tassā kukkuṭiyā evaṃ icchā uppajjeyya, aho, vata me kukkuṭapotakā pādanakhasikhāya vā mukhatuṇḍakena vā aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā sotthinā abhinibbhijjeyyun'ti
suddhodanamahārājānaṃ nissāya mahāmāyādeviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā, dasamās'accayena mātu kucchito nikkhamitvā
āvuso, āgantuka kuṭumbikassa te gehe bhattaṃ bhuñjanato varataraṃ mīḷhaṃ khādituṃ
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, gāvī niccammā kuḍḍañ'ce nissāya tiṭṭheyya. ye kuṭṭanissitā pāṇā te naṃ khādeyyuṃ.

passa cittakataṃ rūpaṃ, maṇinā kuṇḍalena ca.
aṭṭhiṃ tacena onaddhaṃ, saha vatthehi sobhati.
atha kho, bhikkhave, bandhumā rājā vipassissa kumārassa tayo pāsāde kārāpesi, ekaṃ vassikaṃ ekaṃ hem'antikaṃ ekaṃ gimhikaṃ, pañca kāmaguṇāni upaṭṭhāpesi
tassa kho pāpakā samācārā dissanti c'eva suyyanti ca kulāni ca tena duṭṭhāni dissanti c'eva suyyanti ca
tassa purisassa uttiṇṇassa pāraṅ'gatassa evam'assa – bahukāro kho me ayaṃ kullo, im'āhaṃ kullaṃ nissāya hatthehi ca pādehi ca vāyamamāno sotthinā pāraṃ uttiṇṇo.
yad'api, bhikkhave, alobho tad'api kusalamūlaṃ. yad'api aluddho abhisaṅkharoti kāyena vācāya manasā tad'api kusalaṃ.

kiṃ'sū asissāmi kuvaṃ vā asissaṃ,
dukkhaṃ vata settha kv'ajja sessaṃ,
ete vitakke paridevaneyye,
vinayetha sekho aniketacārī.
na'y'idaṃ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṃ vussati janakuhan'atthaṃ, na janalapan'atthaṃ, na lābhasakkārasilok'ānisaṃs'atthaṃ
dūteyyapahiṇagamanaanuyogā paṭivirato hoti, kayavikkayā paṭivirato hoti, tulākūṭakaṃsakūṭamānakūṭā paṭivirato hoti

ye kec'ime isayo manujā, (icc'āyasmā puṇṇako)
khattiyā brāhmaṇā devatānaṃ.

hirīnisedho puriso, koci lokasmi vijjati,
yo nindaṃ apabodheti, asso bhadro kasām'iva.
pharusavāco hoti. yā sā vācā aṇḍakā kakkasā parakaṭukā par'ābhisajjanī kodhasāmantā asamādhisaṃvattanikā, tathārūpiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti

sītavātaparittāṇaṃ, hirikopīnachādanaṃ.
matt'aṭṭhiyaṃ abhuñjiṃsu, santuṭṭhā itar'ītare.
mahallakaṃ pana bhikkhunā vihāraṃ kārayamānena yāva dvārakosā aggaḷaṭṭhapanāya ālokasandhiparikammāya dvatticchadanassa pariyāyaṃ
kesu na mānaṃ kayirātha, kesu c'assa sagāravo. ky'assa apacitā assu, ky'assu sādhu supūjitā'ti.
ukkhittakhaggamatihatthasudāruṇan'taṃ, dhāvan'tiyojanapath'aṅgulimālavantaṃ. iddhī'bhisaṅkhatamano jitavā mun'indo.
amhākaṃ pana sakiṃ katāni santhatāni pañca'pi cha'pi vassāni honti, yesaṃ no dārakā uhadanti'pi ummihanti'pi undūrehi'pi khajjanti.
seyyathā'pi, āvuso, balavā puriso daḷhena varattakkhaṇḍena sīse sīsaveṭhaṃ dadeyya, evam'eva kho, āvuso, adhimattā sīse sīsavedanā.

khantī ca sovacassatā, samaṇānañ'ca dassanaṃ.
kālena dhammasākacchā, etaṃ maṅgalam'uttamaṃ.
addhānakkhamo hoti, padhānakkhamo hoti, appābādho hoti, asitaṃ pītaṃ khāyitaṃ sāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchati, caṅkam'ādhigato samādhi ciraṭṭhitiko hoti.
ambil'aggehi'pi, tittak'aggehi'pi, kaṭuk'aggehi'pi, madhur'aggehi'pi, khārikehi'pi, akhārikehi'pi, loṇikehi'pi, aloṇikehi'pi.
varaṃ, bhikkhave, tiṇhena khurena ādittena sampajjalitena sajotibhūtena jivh'indriyaṃ sampalimaṭṭhaṃ, na tv'eva jivhāviññeyyesu rasesu anubyañjanaso nimittaggāho.
dhītā khemakasakkassa, nandā nāmāti vissutā.
siyā kho panaananda, tumhākaṃ evam'assa, atītasatthukaṃ pāvacanaṃ, n'atthi no satthā'ti.
nāḷāgiriṃ gajavaraṃ atimattabhūtaṃ, dāv'aggicakkam'asanī'va, sudāruṇan'taṃ, mett'ambusekavidhinā jitavā mun'indo.
yathārūpaṃ parisaṃ alaṃ yojanagaṇanāni'pi dassanāya gantuṃ api puṭ'aṃsenā'pi, tathārūpo ayaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhusaṅgho.

bhesajjesu yathā vejjā, kicc'ākicce yathā gihī.
gaṇikā'va vibhūsāyaṃ, issare khattiyā yathā.
jīvako … janaṃ ussāretvā tirokaraṇiyaṃ parikkhipitvā thambhe upanibandhitvā bhariyaṃ purato ṭhapetvā udaracchaviṃ uppāṭetvā antagaṇṭhiṃ nīharitvā bhariyāya dassesi
gaṇḍamūlan'ti kho, bhikkhave, taṇhāy'etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.

tato pāsādikaṃ āsi, gataṃ bhuttaṃ nisevitaṃ.
siniddhā teladhārā'va, ahosi iriyāpatho.

tāni ce sutte otāriyamānāni vinaye sandassiyamānāni na c'eva sutte otaranti na vinaye sandissanti, niṭṭham'ettha gantabbaṃ, addhā, idaṃ na c'eva tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa, imassa ca bhikkhuno duggahitan'ti.
aparikkhittaṃ hoti, yasmiṃ gabbhe cīvaraṃ nikkhittaṃ hoti tasmiṃ gabbhe vatthabbaṃ, hatthapāsā vā na vijahitabbaṃ.
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, puriso addhānamaggappaṭipanno. so passeyya mahantaṃ udak'aṇṇavaṃ … na c'assa nāvā santāraṇī uttarasetu vā apārā pāraṃ gamanāya.

ye ariyasaccāni vibhāvayanti, gambhīrapaññena sudesitāni.
kiñ'c'āpi te honti bhusaṃ pamattā, na te bhavaṃ aṭṭhamam'ādiyanti.
yo c'āyaṃ kāmesu kāmasukh'allik'ānuyogo hīno gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasañhito
yāvakīvañ'ca bhikkhave bhikkhū ye te bhikkhū therā rattaññū cirapabbajitā saṅghapitaro saṅghapariṇāyakā te sakkarissanti garuṃ karissanti mānessanti pūjessanti tesañ'ca sotabbaṃ maññissanti
hatthigav'assavaḷavapaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hoti, khettavatthupaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hoti
hatthigav'assavaḷavapaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hoti, khettavatthupaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hoti

idaṃ pure cittam'acāri cārikaṃ,
yen'icchakaṃ yatthakāmaṃ yathāsukhaṃ,
tadajj'ahaṃ niggahessāmi yoniso,
hatthippabhinnaṃ viya aṅkusaggaho.
gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā aññatarasmiṃ vā kule paccājāto.
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, puriso chappāṇake gahetvā nānāvisaye nānāgocare daḷhāya rajjuyā bandheyya.
asītivassasahass'āyukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu ayaṃ jambudīpo iddho c'eva bhavissati phīto ca, kukkuṭasampātikā gāmanigamarājadhāniyo.
ehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, indriyesu guttadvāro hohi, cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā mā nimittaggāhī hohi m'ānubyañjanaggāhī.
gacchatha, bho, imaṃ purisaṃ daḷhāya rajjuyā pacchābāhaṃ gāḷhabandhanaṃ bandhitvā khuramuṇḍaṃ karitvā
vanappagumbe yathā phussit'agge, gimhānamāse paṭhamasmiṃ gimhe. tath'ūpamaṃ dhammavaraṃ adesayi, nibbānagāmiṃ paramaṃ hitāya.
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, bāḷisiko āmisagataṃ baḷisaṃ gambhīre udakarahade pakkhipeyya. tam'enaṃ aññataro āmisacakkhu maccho gileyya.
iminā puññakammena upajjhāyā guṇ'uttarā, ācariy'ūpakārā ca mātāpitā ca ñātakā, suriyo candimā rājā, guṇavantā narā'pi ca
seyyathā'pi pabbatasaṅkhepe udakarahado accho vippasanno anāvilo. tattha cakkhumā puriso tīre ṭhito passeyya sippisambukam'pi sakkharakathalam'pi macchagumbam'pi, carantam'pi tiṭṭhantam'pi.
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, chav'ālātaṃ ubhatopadittaṃ majjhe gūthagataṃ, n'eva gāme kaṭṭh'atthaṃ pharati, n'āraññe kaṭṭh'atthaṃ pharati.
kathañ'ca bhikkhu vedagū hoti? vidit'āssa honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā, saṃkilesikā, ponobbhavikā, sadarā, dukkhavipākā, āyatiṃ, jātijarāmaraṇiyā
ekadā dhammarājā pi gelaññen'ābhipīḷito cundattherena taññ'eva bhaṇāpetvāna sādaraṃ sammoditvā ca ābādhā tamhā vuṭṭhāsi ṭhānaso.
āsītikaṃ vā nāvutikaṃ vā vassasatikaṃ vā jātiyā jiṇṇaṃ gopānasivaṅkaṃ bhoggaṃ daṇḍaparāyaṇaṃ pavedhamānaṃ gacchantaṃ
buddho susuddho karuṇāmah'aṇṇavo, yo'ccantasuddhabbarañāṇalocano, lokassa pāp'ūpakilesaghātako

yo sāsanaṃ arahataṃ, ariyānaṃ dhammajīvinaṃ,
paṭikkosati dummedho, diṭṭhiṃ nissāya pāpikaṃ,
phalāni kaṭṭhakass'eva, attaghātāya phallati.

kileseh'ābhibhūtā te, tena tena vidhāvitā.
narā kilesavatthūsu, sasaṅgāme'va ghosite.
so tvaṃ ārogyaṃ jāneyyāsi, nibbānaṃ passeyyāsi. tassa te saha cakkh'uppādā yo pañcas'upādānakkhandhesu chandarāgo so pahīyetha
cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī'ti, evam'evaṃ bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccan'ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
seyyathā'pi caṇḍālakumārako vā caṇḍālakumārikā vā kaḷopihattho nantakavāsī gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā pavisanto nīcacittaṃ'y'eva upaṭṭhapetvā pavisati.
tattha, sātthakasampajaññaṃ, sappāyasampajaññaṃ, gocarasampajaññaṃ, asammohasampajaññaṃ'ti catubbidhaṃ sampajaññaṃ.
atha kho ayam'eva tato mahantataro kaṭaggaho yaṃ so paṇḍito kāyena sucaritaṃ caritvā, vācāya sucaritaṃ caritvā, manasā sucaritaṃ caritvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.

na hi verena verāni,
sammant'īdha kudācanaṃ,
averena ca sammanti,
esa dhammo sanantano.
cātummahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā tāvatiṃsā devā saddam'anussāvesuṃ
pāṇ'ātipātā veramaṇī, adinn'ādānā veramaṇī, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī, ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave sammākamm'anto.

kiṃ'sū asissāmi kuvaṃ vā asissaṃ,
dukkhaṃ vata settha kv'ajja sessaṃ,
ete vitakke paridevaneyye,
vinayetha sekho aniketacārī.
alam'ettāvatā katam'ettāvatā, anuppatto no sāmaññ'attho, n'atthi no kiñ'ci uttariṃ karaṇīyan'ti tāvataken'eva tuṭṭhiṃ āpajjeyyātha.
ciṇṇamānatto bhikkhu yattha siyā vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho tattha so bhikkhu abbhetabbo.

kumbh'ūpamaṃ kāyam'imaṃ viditvā, nagar'ūpamaṃ cittam'idaṃ ṭhapetvā.
yodhetha māraṃ paññ'āvudhena, jitañ'ca rakkhe anivesano siyā.
anattani, bhikkhave, attā'ti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso.

añjanī'va navā cittā, pūtikāyo alaṅkato.
alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, rajako vā cittakārako vā rajanāya vā lākhāya vā haliddiyā vā nīliyā vā mañjiṭṭhāya vā
so pana vassāno utu sāvaṇapoṭṭhapādamāsā, assayujakattikamāsā sarado, māgasiraphussamāsā hemanto, māghaphaggunamāsā sisiro, cittavesākhamāsā vasanto, jeṭṭh'āsaḷhamāsā gimho utū'ti veditabbo.

nīcā niviṭṭhā subharā, mudū atthaddhamānasā.
abyāsekā amukharā, atthacintā vas'ānugā.
yāvakīvañ'ca bhikkhave bhikkhū ye te bhikkhū therā rattaññū cirapabbajitā saṅghapitaro saṅghapariṇāyakā te sakkarissanti garuṃ karissanti mānessanti pūjessanti tesañ'ca sotabbaṃ maññissanti
tatiyam'pi kho bāhiyo dārucīriyo bhagavantaṃ etad'avoca
puna caparaṃ bhikkhu seyyathā'pi passeyya sarīraṃ sivathikāya chaḍḍitaṃ aṭṭhikāni pūtīni cuṇṇakajātāni
idāni kho pana dvesahassapañcasatatesaṭṭhi saṃvaccharāni c'eva, navamāsāni ca, cuddasadivasāni atikkantāni.
idha cunda ekacco anabhijjhālu hoti. yaṃ taṃ parassa paravitt'ūpakaraṇaṃ taṃ anabhijjhitā hoti, aho vata yaṃ parassa taṃ mamassā'ti
evam'eva kho, mahārāja, idh'ekacco puggalo akusalaṃ kammaṃ cetanāya cetayitvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjeyya.

ye ca atītā sambuddhā, ye ca buddhā anāgatā.
yo c'eta'r'ahi sambuddho, bahunnaṃ sokanāsano.

no ce'taṃ chando jāyetha, na'y'idaṃ ussaheyya,
no c'ete dhammā nijjhānaṃ khameyyuṃ, na'y'idaṃ chando jāyetha.
atha kho brahmā sahampati bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkam'aññāya, seyyathā'pi nāma balavā puriso samiñjita vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya
ayaṃ c'ev'ettha attho, cattāro āsīvisā uggatejā ghoravisā'ti kho, bhikkhave, catunnetaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ adhivacanaṃ

māse māse sahassena, yo yajetha sataṃ samaṃ,
ekañ'ca bhāvit'attānaṃ, muhuttam'api pūjaye,
sā'y'eva pūjanā seyyo, yañ'ce vassasataṃ hutaṃ.
so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi āpattiyā codiyamāno aññen'āññaṃ paṭicarati, bahiddhā kathaṃ apanāmeti
codakena bhikkhunā paraṃ codetu'kāmena evaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ, parisuddhakāyasamācāro nu kho'mhi?' parisuddhavacīsamācāro nu kho'mhi?'
yāv'āhaṃ tesaṃ uddisitvā āgacchāmī'ti, udāhu vippalapan'tass'eva coraghātā sīsaṃ chindeyyun'ti?
sace kho pana agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajati, arahaṃ hoti sammāsambuddho loke vivaṭṭacchado.
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, chav'ālātaṃ ubhatopadittaṃ majjhe gūthagataṃ, n'eva gāme kaṭṭh'atthaṃ pharati, n'āraññe kaṭṭh'atthaṃ pharati.
rūp'āyatanaṃ sadd'āyatanaṃ gandh'āyatanaṃ ras'āyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabb'āyatanaṃ dhamm'āyatanaṃ, cha bāhirāni āyatanāni veditabbānī'ti

manopubbaṅ'gamā dhammā, manoseṭṭhā manomayā.
manasā ce pasannena, bhāsati vā karoti vā.
tato naṃ sukham'anveti, chāyā'va anapāyinī
seyyathā'pi puriso medakathālikaṃ parihareyya chidda-avachiddaṃ uggharantaṃ paggharantaṃ, evam'evaṃ kho ahaṃ imaṃ kāyaṃ pariharāmi

yo'dha kāme accatari,
saṅgaṃ loke duraccayaṃ,
na so socati n'ājjheti,
chinnasoto abandhano.
tatr'aññatarassa thalaṭṭhassa purisassa evam'assa, pāpakaṃ vata, bho, ayaṃ puriso kammaṃ akāsi gārayhaṃ sīsacchejjaṃ.
iminā puññakammena, iminā uddissena ca khipp'āhaṃ sulabhe c'eva taṇh'ūpādānachedanaṃ.
seyyathā'pi, māgaṇḍiya, jacc'andho puriso, so na passeyya kaṇhasukkāni rūpāni, na passeyya nīlakāni rūpāni, na passeyya pītakāni rūpāni, na passeyya lohitakāni rūpāni
katvāna kaṭṭham'udaraṃ iva gabbhinīyā, ciñcāya duṭṭhavacanaṃ janakāyamajjhe, santena somavidhinā jitavā mun'indo
vihiṃsāvitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ ñātivitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ janapadavitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, puriso jar'udapānaṃ vā olokeyya pabbatavisamaṃ vā nadīviduggaṃ vā, apakass'eva kāyaṃ, apakassa cittaṃ
yadā nu kho, āvuso, imaṃ kāyaṃ kati dhammā jahanti, ath'āyaṃ kāyo ujjhito avakkhitto seti, yathā kaṭṭhaṃ acetanan'ti?

āyu usmā ca viññāṇaṃ, yadā kāyaṃ jahant'imaṃ,
apaviddho tadā seti, parabhattaṃ acetanaṃ.
uccāsayanamahāsayanā paṭivirato hoti, jātarūparajatapaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hoti
dve jāyam'patikā taṃ ekaputtakaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ vadhitvā vallūrañ'ca soṇḍikañ'ca karitvā puttamaṃsāni khādantā
no ce'taṃ chando jāyetha, na'y'idaṃ ussaheyya, no ce'te dhammā nijjhānaṃ khameyyuṃ, na'y'idaṃ chando jāyetha.
appamattako so kaliggaho yaṃ so akkhadhutto paṭhamen'eva kaliggahena puttam'pi jīyetha, dāram'pi jīyetha, sabbaṃ sāpateyyam'pi jīyetha, uttari'pi adhibandhaṃ nigaccheyya.

lesakappe pariyāye, parikappe'nudhāvitā.
jīvik'atthā upāyena, saṅkaḍḍhanti bahuṃ dhanaṃ.
parapaṭibaddhā me jīvikā'ti, pabbajitena abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ.
tassa taṃ ṭhānaṃ abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhato yo jīvite jīvitamado so sabbaso vā pahīyati tanu vā pana hoti. idaṃ kho, bhikkhave, atthavasaṃ paṭicca maraṇadhammo'mhi, maraṇaṃ anatīto'ti
idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako micchāājīvaṃ pahāya sammāājīvena jīvitaṃ kappeti, ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave sammāājīvo.

uṭṭhānavato satīmato, sucikammassa nisammakārino,
saññatassa dhammajīvino, appamattassa yaso'bhivaḍḍhati.
sace te, kassapa, agaru, viharemu aj'juṇho aggisālamhī'ti
duggāhadiṭṭhibhujagena sudaṭṭhahatthaṃ, brahmaṃ visuddhijutim'iddhibak'ābhidhānaṃ, ñāṇāgadena vidhinā jitavā mun'indo
mātari pitari c'āpi, atho jeṭṭhamhi bhātari. ācariye catutthamhi, tesu na mānaṃ kayirātha.
ñātibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, bhogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, rogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, sīlabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, diṭṭhibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa
vihiṃsāvitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ ñātivitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ janapadavitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ
tatra bhikkhu vivekaninnena cittena vivekapoṇena vivekapabbhārena vivekaṭṭhena nekkhamm'ābhiratena añña'd'atthu uyyojanikapaṭisaṃyuttaṃy'eva kathaṃ kattā hoti
yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ tiṇ'avatthārakena vūpasameyya, ṭhapetvā thullavajjaṃ, ṭhapetvā gihippaṭisaṃyuttan'ti.
ṭhān'āṭhāne na saṇṭhātī'ti kāraṇ'ākāraṇe na saṇṭhāti. tatr'āyaṃ nayo, sassatavādī yuttena kāraṇena pahoti ucchedavādiṃ niggahetuṃ, ucchedavādī tena niggayhamāno, kiṃ pan'āhaṃ ucchedaṃ vadāmī'ti
tassa te āyasmanto avivaṭañ'c'eva vivaranti, anuttānīkatañ'ca uttānī karonti, anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhāṭhāniyesu dhammesu kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodenti.
te ca kho hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā ekasīmāyaṃ ṭhitā.
yatha'y'idaṃ brahmacariyaṃ addhaniyaṃ assa ciraṭṭhitikaṃ, tadassa bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lok'ānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ

sattiyā viya omaṭṭho,
ḍayhamāno'va matthake,
kāmarāgappahānāya,
sato bhikkhu paribbaje'ti.
yaṃ kho kāmayamāno tajjaṃ tajjaṃ attabhāvaṃ abhinibbatteti puññabhāgiyaṃ vā apuññabhāgiyaṃ vā, ayaṃ vuccati kāmānaṃ vipāko.
vuttam'idaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā sakkapañhe, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttā, te accantaniṭṭhā accantayogakkhemino accantabrahmacārino accantapariyosānā seṭṭhā devamanussānan'ti.

icc'evaṃ vippalapantiṃ, phandamānaṃ tato tato.
khipiṃsu niraye ghore, uddhapādaṃ avaṃsiraṃ
atha kho āyasmā rāhulo, ko n'ajja bhagavatā sammukhā ovādena ovadito gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisissatī'ti tato paṭinivattitvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi
tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamāno vā asamanuggāhīyamāno vā, āpanno visuddh'āpekkho evaṃ vadeyya
yo me ayaṃ attā vado vedeyyo tatra tatra kalyāṇapāpakānaṃ kammānaṃ vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti so kho pana me ayaṃ attā nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo sassatisamaṃ tath'eva ṭhassatī'ti.
yatha'y'idaṃ brahmacariyaṃ addhaniyaṃ assa ciraṭṭhitikaṃ, tad'assa bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lok'ānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ

idaṃ pure cittam'acāri cārikaṃ,
yen'icchakaṃ yatthakāmaṃ yathāsukhaṃ,
tadajj'ahaṃ niggahessāmi yoniso,
hatthippabhinnaṃ viya aṅkusaggaho.
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, ambapiṇḍiyā vaṇṭacchinnāya yāni tattha ambāni vaṇṭapaṭibandhāni sabbāni tāni tad'anvayāni bhavanti

idha tappati pecca tappati, pāpakārī ubhay'attha tappati.
pāpaṃ me katan'ti tappati, bhiyyo tappati duggatiṃ gato.

na vedagū diṭṭhiyā na mutiyā,
sa mānam'eti na hi tammayo so,
na kammunā no'pi sutena neyyo,
anūpanīto sa nivesanesu.
catur'āsītisahassadhammakkhandh'ānubhāvena piṭakattay'ānubhavena jinasāvak'ānubhāvena
sagge kāme ca rūpe, girisikharataṭe c'antalikkhe vimāne, dīpe raṭṭhe ca gāme, taruvanagahane, gehavatthumhi khette
taṃ kiṃ maññasi, sunakkhatta, api nu tassa purisassa tasmiṃ vante puna bhottu'kamyatā assā'ti?
tatra, sunakkhatta, yam'pi tathāgatassa evaṃ hoti, dhammaṃ nesaṃ desessan'ti tassa'pi hoti aññathattan'ti.
taṃ kut'ettha, ānanda, labbhā yaṃ taṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ palokadhammaṃ, taṃ vata mā palujjī'ti n'etaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati
tādisikāya āpattiyā ekaccaṃ pabbājenti ekaccaṃ na pabbājentī'ti, so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi evam'assa vacanīyo
handa mayaṃ tāyanagāthāyo bhaṇāmase
handa mayaṃ tāyanagāthāyo bhaṇāmase
tassa sā sukhā vedanā nirujjhati. sukhāya vedanāya nirodhā uppajjati dukkhā vedanā. so dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno socati kilamati paridevati urattāḷiṃ kandati sammohaṃ āpajjati.
āyasmā ānando tā bhikkhuniyo dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā uṭṭhāy'āsanā pakkāmi
appamattā viharissāma, tikkhaṃ maraṇassatiṃ bhāvayissāma āsavānaṃ khayāyā'ti.

tiṭṭhañ'caraṃ, nisinno vā, sayāno vā, yāvat'assa vigatamiddho,
etaṃ satiṃ adhiṭṭheyya, brahmam'etaṃ vihāraṃ idha'm'āhu.

rājā ca aññe ca bahū manussā, avītataṇhā maraṇaṃ upenti.
ūnā'va hutvāna jahanti dehaṃ, kāmehi lokamhi na h'atthi titti.
samatittikaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggahessāmī'ti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
so ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibbasārāgo byāpannacitto paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākatindriyo.
yo pana bhikkhu, bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno, sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā, methunaṃ dhammaṃ patiseveyya, antamaso tiracchānagatāya'pi, pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso.
so sace ākaṅkhati, anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhaveyyaṃ, eko'pi hutvā bahudhā assaṃ, bahudhā'pi hutvā eko assaṃ, āvibhāvaṃ tirobhāvaṃ
ambho purisa, na tvaṃ addasa manussesu itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā ek'āhamataṃ vā dvī'hamataṃ vā tī'hamataṃ vā uddhumātakaṃ vinīlakaṃ vipubbakajātan'ti?
yaṃ, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ, taṃ pajahatha. taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
mā kho tumhe, āyasmanto, eso ajesi.
atthaṃ upaparikkhato dhammā nijjhānaṃ khamanti, dhammanijjhānakkhantiyā sati chando jāyati, chandajāto ussahati, ussāhetvā tuleti, tulayitvā padahati,
vessantaraattabhāve nibbattitvā, pañcamahāpariccāge katvā, tusitapure nibbattitvā
evam'eva kho, ānanda, yassa kassaci evaṃsīghaṃ evaṃtuvaṭaṃ evaṃappakasirena uppannaṃ manāpaṃ uppannaṃ amanāpaṃ uppannaṃ manāp'āmanāpaṃ nirujjhati, upekkhā saṇṭhāti
es'ev'anto daṇḍ'ādānasatth'ādānakalahaviggahavivādatuvaṃtuvaṃpesuññamusāvādānaṃ. etth'ete pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantī'ti.

aṭṭha dhut'aṅgāni, āraññik'aṅgaṃ, piṇḍapātik'aṅgaṃ, paṃsukūlik'aṅgaṃ, tecīvarik'aṅgaṃ, sapadānacārik'aṅgaṃ, khalupacchābhattik'aṅgaṃ, nesajjik'aṅgaṃ, yathāsanthatik'aṅgaṃ, idaṃ vuccati vataṃ, na sīlaṃ.
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, cattāro āsīvisā uggatejā ghoravisā. atha puriso āgaccheyya jīvitu'kāmo amaritu'kāmo sukhakāmo dukkhappaṭikūlo.
puna caparaṃ bhikkhu imam'eva kāyaṃ yathāṭhitaṃ yathāpaṇihitaṃ dhātuso paccavekkhati, atthi imasmiṃ kāye pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātū'ti
tesañ'ca vikālabhojan'ādivasena vatthusabhāg'āpattiyo ce na vijjanti.
pānīyaparibhojanīyaupaṭṭhapanañ'ca, chand'ārahānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ chandaāharaṇañ'ca, tesaññ'eva akat'uposathānaṃ pārisuddhiyā'pi āharaṇañ'ca
aho vata re amhākaṃ paṇḍitaka, aho vata re amhākaṃ bahussutaka, aho vata re amhākaṃ tevijjaka
tesu na mānaṃ kayirātha, tesu assa sagāravo, ty'assa apacitā assu, ty'assu sādhu supūjitā.
n'eva kho ty'āhaṃ, brāhmaṇa, anumodāmi na paṭikkosāmi.
tatr'aññatarassa thalaṭṭhassa purisassa evam'assa, pāpakaṃ vata, bho, ayaṃ puriso kammaṃ akāsi gārayhaṃ sīsacchejjaṃ.
thinamiddhaṃ pahāya vigatathinamiddho viharati ālokasaññī sato sampajāno, thinamiddhā cittaṃ parisodheti
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, saradasamaye thullaphusitake deve vassante udake udakabubbuḷaṃ uppajjati c'eva nirujjhati ca.

aniccaṃ aniccato dakkhuṃ, dukkham'addakkhu dukkhato.
anattani anattā'ti, asubhaṃ asubhat'addasuṃ.
sammādiṭṭhisamādānā, sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ upaccagun'ti

so'haṃ evaṃ viharanto, ñatvā dhammaṃ nirūpadhiṃ.
ārogye yobbanasmiñ'ca, jīvitasmiñ'ca ye madā.
sabbe made abhibho'smi, nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khemato
es'ev'anto daṇḍ'ādānasatth'ādānakalahaviggahavivādatuvaṃtuvaṃpesuññamusāvādānaṃ. etth'ete pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantī'ti.
anekehi sambhārehi samāraddhā vadatī'ti. so taṃ vīṇaṃ dasadhā vā satadhā vā phāleyya, dasadhā vā satadhā vā taṃ phāletvā sakalikaṃ sakalikaṃ kareyya.
aṭṭhamaṃ adhiṭṭhānapārami, navamaṃ mettāpārami, dasamaṃ upekkhāpāramī'ti

khantī ca sovacassatā, samaṇānañ'ca dassanaṃ.
kālena dhammasākacchā, etaṃ maṅgalam'uttamaṃ.
yathārūpaṃ parisaṃ alaṃ yojanagaṇanāni'pi dassanāya gantuṃ api puṭ'aṃsenā'pi, tathārūpo ayaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhusaṅgho.
bhojane mattaññuno bhavissāma paṭisaṅkhā yoniso āhāraṃ āharissāma n'eva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya
āyudo balado dhīro, vaṇṇado paṭibhāṇado. sukhassa dātā medhāvī, sukhaṃ so adhigacchati. āyuṃ datvā balaṃ vaṇṇaṃ, sukhañ'ca paṭibhānakaṃ, dīgh'āyu yasavā hoti, yattha yatth'ūpapajjatī'ti.

mātāpitu upaṭṭhānaṃ, puttadārassa saṅgaho.
anākulā ca kamm'antā, etaṃ maṅgalam'uttamaṃ.
sace so, bhikkhave, dārukkhandho na orimaṃ tīraṃ upagacchati, na pārimaṃ tīraṃ upagacchati, na majjhe saṃsīdissati
tatiyam'pi kho bāhiyo dārucīriyo bhagavantaṃ etad'avoca
bhikkhu yathā iṇaṃ yathā rogaṃ yathā bandhan'āgāraṃ yathā dāsabyaṃ yathā kantār'addhānamaggaṃ, ime pañca nīvaraṇe appahīne attani samanupassati
itthikumārikapaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hoti, dāsidāsapaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hoti

ubhosu antesu vineyya chandaṃ, phassaṃ pariññāya anānugiddho,
yad'attagarahī tad'akubbamāno, na lippatī diṭṭhasutesu dhīro.
seyyathā'pi gāvī taruṇavacchā thambañ'ca ālumpati vacchakañ'ca apacinati. evam'eva kho dhammatā esā diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa
seyyathā'pi dakkho bhamakāro vā bhamakār'antevāsī vā dīghaṃ vā añchanto dīghaṃ añchāmī'ti pajānāti, rassaṃ vā añchanto rassaṃ añchāmī'ti pajānāti
amhākaṃ kho pana bhagavā dīpaṅ'karapādamūlato paṭṭhāya
asītivassasahass'āyukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu ayaṃ jambudīpo avīci maññe phuṭo bhavissati manussehi, seyyathā'pi naḷavanaṃ vā saravanaṃ vā.
vedanāpaccayā taṇhā, taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ, upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanass'upāyāsā sambhavanti.
ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā'ti yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ
idaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccan'ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.

yathā'pi mūle anupaddave daḷhe, chinno'pi rukkho punar'eva rūhati,
evam'pi taṇh'ānusaye anūhate, nibbattatī dukkham'idaṃ punappunaṃ.
asubhasaññā, maraṇasaññā, āhāre paṭikūlasaññā, sabbaloke anabhiratasaññā, aniccasaññā, anicce dukkhasaññā, dukkhe anattasaññā, pahānasaññā, virāgasaññā, nirodhasaññā
taṃ kho pan'idaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pahātabban'ti
yaṃ pan'āniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ, etaṃ mama, eso'ham'asmi, eso me attā'ti? no h'etaṃ, bhante.
n'eva tasmiṃ samaye dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti, na adukkham'asukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti
sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā, pubb'eva somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅ'gamā, adukkham'asukhaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
aññataro bhikkhu heṭṭhā hutvā silaṃ uccāresi. uparimena bhikkhunā duggahitā silā heṭṭhimassa bhikkhuno matthake avatthāsi. so bhikkhu kālamakāsi

yo imaṃ samuddaṃ sagāhaṃ sarakkhasaṃ,
saūmiṃ sāvaṭṭaṃ sabhayaṃ duttaraṃ accatari.
kāmacchando, bhikkhave, āvaraṇo nīvaraṇo cetaso ajjhāruho paññāya dubbalīkaraṇo. byāpādo, bhikkhave, āvaraṇo nīvaraṇo cetaso ajjhāruho paññāya dubbalīkaraṇo.
vīriy'ārambhāya saṃvattanti, no kosajjāya, subharatāya saṃvattanti, no dubbharatāyā'
atthi āsavā adhivāsanā pahātabbā – duruttānaṃ durāgatānaṃ vacanapathānaṃ, uppannānaṃ sārīrikānaṃ vedanānaṃ dukkhānaṃ tibbānaṃ
atthi āsavā adhivāsanā pahātabbā – duruttānaṃ durāgatānaṃ vacanapathānaṃ, uppannānaṃ sārīrikānaṃ vedanānaṃ dukkhānaṃ tibbānaṃ
dūteyyapahiṇagamanaanuyogā paṭivirato hoti, kayavikkayā paṭivirato hoti, tulākūṭakaṃsakūṭamānakūṭā paṭivirato hoti
yathā vā pan'eke bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saddhādeyyāni bhojanāni bhuñjitvā te evarūpaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ anuyuttā viharanti.
kathañ'ca, bhikkhave, ussādanā ca hoti apasādanā ca, no ca dhammadesanā?
pubbakaraṇapubbakiccāni samāpetvā desit'āpattikassa samaggassa bhikkhusaṅghassa anumatiyā pātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ ārādhanaṃ karomi. sādhu! sādhu! sādhu!
na me dessā ubho puttā, maddī devī na dessiyā.
tena kho pana samayena indasālaguhā visamā santī samā sampādi, sambādhā santī urundā sampādi, andhakāro guhāyaṃ antaradhāyi, āloko udapādi yathā taṃ devānaṃ dev'ānubhāvena.
dvattiṃs'ākārapaccavekkhaṇa
idha, brāhmaṇa, ekacco samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā sammā brahmacārī paṭijānamāno na h'eva kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ dvayaṃdvayasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati
ayaṃ vasabhasaṃvacchare hem'antautu. asmiṃ utumhi māghamāsassa kāḷapakkhe dvādasamaṃ, candavāram'idan'ti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
ambho purisa, na tvaṃ addasa manussesu itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā ek'āhamataṃ vā dvī'hamataṃ vā tī'hamataṃ vā uddhumātakaṃ vinīlakaṃ vipubbakajātan'ti?

dhammo have rakkhati dhammacāriṃ,
dhammo suciṇṇo sukham'āvahati.
es'ānisaṃso dhamme suciṇṇe,
na duggatiṃ gacchati dhammacārī.

khantī ca sovacassatā, samaṇānañ'ca dassanaṃ.
kālena dhammasākacchā, etaṃ maṅgalam'uttamaṃ.
abrahmacariyaṃ pahāya brahmacārī hoti ārācārī virato methunā gāmadhammā.
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, cattāro daḷhadhammā dhanuggahā susikkhitā katahatthā kat'ūpāsanā catuddisā ṭhitā assu.
atidhāto'smī'ti kammaṃ na karoti. tassa evaṃ kicc'āpadesabahulassa viharato anuppannā c'eva bhogā n'uppajjanti, uppannā ca bhogā parikkhayaṃ gacchanti.
saññādhātuyā kho yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upay'upādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhān'ābhinives'ānusayā, tesaṃ khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā cittaṃ suvimuttan'ti vuccati.
nāhaṃ aññaṃ ekadhammam'pi samanupassāmi yena anuppannaṃ vā thinamiddhaṃ n'uppajjati uppannaṃ vā thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati yatha'y'idaṃ ārambhadhātu nikkamadhātu parakkamadhātu.
kusāvatiyā, ānanda, rājadhāniyā catunnaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ dvārāni ahesuṃ. ekaṃ dvāraṃ sovaṇṇamayaṃ, ekaṃ rūpiyamayaṃ, ekaṃ veḷuriyamayaṃ, ekaṃ phalikamayaṃ.
samiñjite pasārite sampajānakārī, saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇe sampajānakārī, asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajānakārī

yo ve uppatitaṃ kodhaṃ,
rathaṃ bhantaṃ'va dhāraye,
tam'ahaṃ sārathiṃ brūmi,
rasmiggāho itaro jano.

tato pāsādikaṃ āsi, gataṃ bhuttaṃ nisevitaṃ.
siniddhā teladhārā'va, ahosi iriyāpatho.
upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato etam'atthaṃ ārocessāma. yathā no bhagavā byākarissati tathā naṃ dhāressāmā'ti.
anekehi sambhārehi samāraddhā vadatī'ti. so taṃ vīṇaṃ dasadhā vā satadhā vā phāleyya, dasadhā vā satadhā vā taṃ phāletvā sakalikaṃ sakalikaṃ kareyya.

aṭṭha dhut'aṅgāni, āraññik'aṅgaṃ, piṇḍapātik'aṅgaṃ, paṃsukūlik'aṅgaṃ, tecīvarik'aṅgaṃ, sapadānacārik'aṅgaṃ, khalupacchābhattik'aṅgaṃ, nesajjik'aṅgaṃ, yathāsanthatik'aṅgaṃ, idaṃ vuccati vataṃ, na sīlaṃ.
ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dhūtā sallekhavuttino samaṇo pana gotamo bāhulliko bāhullāya cetetīti.
naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā paṭivirato hoti, mālāgandhavilepanadhāraṇamaṇḍanavibhūsanaṭṭhānā paṭivirato hoti

na tāvatā dhammadharo, yāvatā bahu bhāsati,
yo ca appam'pi sutvāna, dhammaṃ kāyena passati,
sa ve dhammadharo hoti, yo dhammaṃ nappamajjati.
handa mayaṃ buddhassa bhagavato pubbabhāganamakāraṃ karomase
na'y'idaṃ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṃ vussati janakuhan'atthaṃ, na janalapan'atthaṃ, na lābhasakkārasilok'ānisaṃs'atthaṃ, na itivāda-ppamokkha-ānisaṃs'atthaṃ, na iti maṃ jano jānātū'ti
ratanavaggo navamo.

yesaṃ kho sataṃ piyāni, sataṃ tesaṃ dukkhāni,
yesaṃ navuti piyāni, navuti tesaṃ dukkhāni,
yesaṃ asīti piyāni, asīti tesaṃ dukkhāni
asītivassasahass'āyukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu ayaṃ jambudīpo avīci maññe phuṭo bhavissati manussehi, seyyathā'pi naḷavanaṃ vā saravanaṃ vā.
bhummā c'āyantu devā jalathalavisame yakkhagandhabbanāgā tiṭṭhantā santike, yaṃ munivaravacanaṃ sādhavo me suṇantu
yā evarūpā upekkhā, rūpaṃ sā n'ātivattati. tasmā sā upekkhā gehasitā'ti vuccati.
atha kiñ'carahi ty'āyaṃ, sāriputta, uḷārā āsabhī vācā bhāsitā, ek'aṃso gahito, sīhanādo nadito

evam'etaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya disvā y'āyaṃ upekkhā nānattā nānattasitā taṃ abhinivajjetvā, y'āyaṃ upekkhā ekattā ekattasitā yattha sabbaso lok'āmis'ūpādānā aparisesā nirujjhanti tam'ev'ūpekkhaṃ bhāveti.
tam'enaṃ dve balavanto purisā nānābāhāsu gahetvā taṃ aṅgārakāsuṃ upakaḍḍheyyuṃ. atha kho tassa purisassa ārakā'v'assa cetanā ārakā patthanā ārakā paṇidhi.

appamāṇo buddho, appamāṇo dhammo.
appamāṇo saṅgho, pamāṇavantāni siriṃsapāni
ahivicchikā satapadī, uṇṇanābhī sarabū mūsikā.
seyyath'idaṃ, kaṇṇacchiddaṃ nāsacchiddaṃ mukhadvāraṃ, yena ca asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ ajjhoharati
atha kho so bhikkhu vihāraṃ pavisissāmī'ti kavāṭaṃ paṇāmento addasa sabbaṃ vihāraṃ ahinā puṇṇaṃ, vātapānehi bhoge nikkhante, disvāna bhīto vissaram'akāsi.
idha bhikkhu divase nikkhante rattiyā patihitāya iti paṭisañcikkhati, bahukā kho me paccayā maraṇassa:
kharassarena paṇavena rathikāya rathikaṃ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṃ parinetvā dakkhiṇena dvārena nikkhāmetvā dakkhiṇato nagarassa sīsaṃ chindathā'ti.
na vo ahaṃ, ānanda, tathā parakkamissāmi yathā kumbhakāro āmake āmakamatte. niggayha niggayh'āhaṃ, ānanda, vakkhāmi.
yaṃ yad'eva hi sā, bhikkhave, gāvī niccammā nissāya tiṭṭheyya, ye tan'nissitā pāṇā te naṃ khādeyyuṃ.
idh'āvuso, dhammayogā bhikkhū jhāyī bhikkhū apasādenti, ime pana jhāyino'mhā, jhāyino'mhā'ti jhāyanti pajjhāyanti nijjhāyanti avajjhāyanti
puttamaṃsāni khādantā evaṃ taṃ kantār'āvasesaṃ nitthareyyāma, mā sabb'eva tayo vinassimhā'ti.
sāvatthinidānaṃ. ekam'antaṃ ṭhitā kho sā devatā bhagavato santike imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.
ek'āyano ayaṃ maggo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā, sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāya, dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅ'gamāya, ñāyassa adhigamāya, nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya, yad'idaṃ cattāro satipaṭṭhānā.
