yañ'ca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vuccati cittaṃ iti'pi, mano iti'pi, viññāṇaṃ iti'pi, tatr'āssutavā puthujjano n'ālaṃ nibbindituṃ n'ālaṃ virajjituṃ n'ālaṃ vimuccituṃ.
ehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, indriyesu guttadvāro hohi, cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā mā nimittaggāhī hohi m'ānubyañjanaggāhī.
bhikkhu y'āyaṃ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharati sabrahmacārīsu āvi c'eva raho ca
saṅkhāya lokasmiṃ paro'parāni, yass'iñjitaṃ n'atthi kuhiñci loke. santo vidhūmo anīgho nirāso, atāri so jātijaran'ti brūmī'ti

vītataṇho anādāno, niruttipadakovido,
akkharānaṃ sannipātaṃ, jaññā pubb'āparāni ca,
sa ve antimasārīro mahāpañño, mahāpuriso'ti vuccati.
katamo ca, bhikkhave, āsavanirodho? avijjānirodho, bhikkhave, āsavanirodho. ayam'eva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo āsavanirodhagāminī paṭipadā
yāvakīvañ'ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhū nirodhasaññaṃ bhāvessanti
so ca kho attabyābādhāya'pi saṃvattati, parabyābādhāya'pi saṃvattati, ubhayabyābādhāya'pi saṃvattati, paññānirodhiko vighātapakkhiko anibbānasaṃvattaniko
yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho paṭicchanne āsane, alaṃkammaniye, nisajjaṃ kappeyya

dhanañ'ca puttaṃ bhariyañ'ca, chaḍḍayitvāna niggatā.
kaṭacchubhikkhahetū'pi, akicchāni nisevare.
yaṃ yad'eva hi sā, bhikkhave, gāvī niccammā nissāya tiṭṭheyya, ye tan'nissitā pāṇā te naṃ khādeyyuṃ.

seyyathā'pi dovāriko hoti paṇḍito byatto medhāvī aññātānaṃ nivāretā ñātānaṃ pavesetā, evam'evaṃ kho ariyasāvako satimā hoti paramena satinepakkena samannāgato cirakatam'pi cirabhāsitam'pi saritā anussaritā.
so evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigat'ūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte pubbenivāsa-anussatiñāṇāya cittaṃ abhininnāmeti.
yo ca kho mātāpitaro maccharī cāgasampadāya samādapeti niveseti patiṭṭhāpeti, .. ettāvatā kho mātāpitūnaṃ katañ'ca hoti paṭikatañ'ca

na paro paraṃ nikubbetha,
n'ātimaññetha katthaci naṃ kañci,
byārosanā paṭighasaññā,
n'āññam'aññassa dukkham'iccheyya.

ye suppayuttā manasā daḷhena,
nikkāmino gotamasāsanamhi,
te pattipattā amataṃ vigayha
yāni kho pana tāni gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭisāyanīyāni bhesajjāni, seyyath'idaṃ, sappi, navanītaṃ, telaṃ, madhu, phāṇitaṃ
navaṃ pana bhikkhunā cīvaralābhena tiṇṇaṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṃ aññataraṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ ādātabbaṃ, nīlaṃ vā kaddamaṃ vā kāḷasāmaṃ vā.
jātaṃ bhūtaṃ samuppannaṃ, kataṃ saṅkhatam'addhuvaṃ. jarāmaraṇasaṅghāṭaṃ, roganīḷaṃ pabhaṅguraṃ. āhāranettippabhavaṃ, n'ālaṃ tad'abhinandituṃ.

seyyathā'pi dovāriko hoti paṇḍito byatto medhāvī aññātānaṃ nivāretā ñātānaṃ pavesetā, evam'evaṃ kho ariyasāvako satimā hoti paramena satinepakkena samannāgato cirakatam'pi cirabhāsitam'pi saritā anussaritā.

seyyathā'pi rañño paccantime nagare esikā hoti gambhīranemā sunikhātā acalā asampavedhī abbhantarānaṃ guttiyā bāhirānaṃ paṭighātāya. evam'evaṃ kho ariyasāvako saddho hoti, saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṃ
sabbaṃ rūpaṃ, n'etaṃ mama, n'eso'ham'asmi, na m'eso attā'ti evam'etaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
yāni ca kho imāni, bhikkhave, nissāya dve āyatanāni, n'evasaññānāsaññ'āyatanasamāpatti ca saññāvedayitanirodho ca
api ca kho mātugāmassa ucchādanaparimaddananhāpanasambāhanaṃ sādiyati.
yāvatikā ca bhikkhū kammappattā saṅgh'uposath'ārahā cattāro vā tato vā atirekā pakatattā pārājikaṃ anāpannā saṅghena vā anukkhittā.
puññāni pakatāni me sukhañ'ca tividhaṃ dentu. khippaṃ pāpetha vo'mataṃ.
yo dhammaṃ desesi ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ, kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāsesi.
na bhuñjamānā sabbahatthaṃ mukhe pakkhipissāmī'ti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
handa mayaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammapāṭhaṃ bhaṇāmase
uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati
ime kho, ambho purisa, pañca vadhakā paccatthikā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhā, yatth'eva naṃ passissāma tatth'eva jīvitā voropessāmā'ti.
purimā, bhikkhave, koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya, ito pubbe avijjā n'āhosi, atha pacchā samabhavī'ti. evañ'c'etaṃ, bhikkhave, vuccati, atha ca pana paññāyati, idappaccayā avijjā'ti
yadā ca buddhā lokasmiṃ, uppajjanti pabhaṅ'karā. te imaṃ dhammaṃ pakāsenti, dukkh'ūpasamagāminaṃ. tesaṃ sutvāna sappaññā, sacittaṃ paccaladdhā te.
supinak'ūpamā kāmā ittarapaccupaṭṭhān'aṭṭhenā'ti passanto vikkhambhanato kāme parivajjeti
idha bhikkhave bhikkhuno mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi c'eva raho ca
yathā kho pana pacceka'puṭṭhassa veyyākaraṇaṃ hoti, evam'evaṃ evarūpāya parisāya yāvatatiyaṃ anusāvitaṃ hoti.
sādhu no bhante bhagavā suciraparinibbuto'pi pacchimājanat'ānukampamānasā
ekam'antaṃ ṭhitā kho sā mahāpajāpatī gotamī bhagavantaṃ etad'avoca

ākāse'va padaṃ n'atthi, samaṇo n'atthi bāhire,
papañc'ābhiratā pajā, nippapañcā tathāgatā.
so ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe
tiṭṭhanti kho pana, bhikkhave, tatth'eva pañc'indriyāni. ath'ettha sutavato ariyasāvakassa avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjati.
paññāvimutto – idha ekacco puggalo ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā te na kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya c'assa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
sādh'āvuso'ti kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko āyasmato sāriputtassa bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ uttariṃ pañhaṃ apucchi.
yato ca kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu, accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikarosi, taṃ te mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma.
tass'etaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ, anāpanno vā pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ na āpajjissati, āpanno vā pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ yathādhammaṃ paṭikarissati.

katā me rakkhā katā me parittā, paṭikkamantu bhūtāni.
so'haṃ namo bhagavato, namo sattannaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ
paṭisaṅkhā yoniso gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ paṭisevāmi yāva'd'eva uppannānaṃ veyyābādhikānaṃ vedanānaṃ paṭighātāya abyāpajjhaparamatāyā
yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevāmi yāva'd'eva sītassa paṭighātāya uṇhassa paṭighātāya ḍaṃsamakasavāt'ātapasiriṃsapasamphassānaṃ paṭighātāya yāva'd'eva hirikopīnapaṭicchādan'atthaṃ
idha ekacco dussīlo hoti pāpadhammo asucisaṅkassarasamācāro paṭicchannakamm'anto assamaṇo samaṇapaṭiñño abrahmacārī brahmacāripaṭiñño antopūti avassuto kasambujāto – antopūtibhāvo'ti.

chandajāto anakkhāte, manasā ca phuṭo siyā,
kāmesu ca appaṭibaddhacitto, uddhaṃsoto'ti vuccati.
parapaṭibaddhā me jīvikā'ti, pabbajitena abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ.
pubbe vā paṭiladdhapubbaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vipariṇataṃ samanussarato uppajjati somanassaṃ. yaṃ evarūpaṃ somanassaṃ idaṃ vuccati gehasitaṃ somanassaṃ.
ehi tvaṃ bhikkhu bhojane mattaññū hohi. paṭisaṅkhā yoniso āhāraṃ āhāreyyāsi
upakaṭṭhāya pavāraṇāya sabb'eva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu
paṭisaṅkhā yoniso gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ paṭisevāmi yāva'd'eva uppannānaṃ veyyābādhikānaṃ vedanānaṃ paṭighātāya abyāpajjhaparamatāyā

na so rajjati dhammesu, dhammaṃ ñatvā paṭissato.
virattacitto vedeti, tañ'ca nājjhosa tiṭṭhati.
yam'pi, bhikkhave, daliddo assako anāḷhiko iṇaṃ ādiyitvā vaḍḍhiṃ paṭissuṇāti, vaḍḍhi'pi, bhikkhave, dukkhā lokasmiṃ kāmabhogino'ti?
kāmasaññānaṃ pariññā akkhātā, kāmapipāsānaṃ paṭivinayo akkhāto, kāmavitakkānaṃ samugghāto akkhāto, kāmapariḷāhānaṃ vūpasamo akkhāto?
iti kho, bhikkhave, yāvatā saññāsamāpatti tāvatā aññāpaṭivedho
etāni pañca kammāni, chand'āharaṇ'ādīni pātimokkh'uddesato paṭhamaṃ kattabbatā, uposathassa uposathakammassa pubbakiccan'ti vuccati.
yo pana bhikkhu paṭhaviṃ khaṇeyya vā khaṇāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
api ca kho aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ carati imin'āhaṃ sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi dev'aññataro vā'ti.
puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imam'eva kāyaṃ yathāṭhitaṃ yathāpaṇihitaṃ dhātuso paccavekkhati atthi imasmiṃ kāye pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātū'ti

paṇḍupalāso'va dāni'si, yamapurisā'pi ca te upaṭṭhitā,
uyyogamukhe ca tiṭṭhasi, pātheyyam'pi ca te na vijjati.
niṭṭhite ca pubbakicce, sace so divaso cātuddasīpaṇṇarasīsāmaggīnam'aññataro, yath'ājja uposatho paṇṇaraso.
ime sakkāre duggatapaṇṇ'ākārabhūte paṭiggaṇhātu amhākaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya
yo ca kho mātāpitaro maccharī cāgasampadāya samādapeti niveseti patiṭṭhāpeti, .. ettāvatā kho mātāpitūnaṃ katañ'ca hoti paṭikatañ'ca
gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā aññatarasmiṃ vā kule paccājāto.
idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevati, yāva'd'eva sītassa paṭighātāya, uṇhassa paṭighātāya
ñātaṃ ye pattidānam'me anumodantu te sayaṃ, ye c'imaṃ nappajānanti devā tesaṃ nivedayuṃ

tasmā hi te sukhino vītasokā, yesaṃ piyaṃ n'atthi kuhiñci loke.
tasmā asokaṃ virajaṃ patthayāno, piyaṃ na kayirātha kuhiñci loke'ti.
icchitaṃ patthitaṃ tumhaṃ khippam'eva samijjhatu, sabbe pūrentu saṅkappā, cando paṇṇaraso yathā, maṇi jotiraso yathā
sabbo pan'āyaṃ piṇḍapāto ajigucchanīyo, imaṃ pūtikāyaṃ patvā ativiya jigucchanīyo jāyati

pathavisamo no virujjhati, indakhīl'ūpamo tādi subbato,
rahado'va apetakaddamo, saṃsārā na bhavanti tādino.

tato pāsādikaṃ āsi, gataṃ bhuttaṃ nisevitaṃ.
siniddhā teladhārā'va, ahosi iriyāpatho.
ajja't'agge'ti ajjataṃ ādiṃ katvā, ajja'd'agge'ti vā pāṭho, dakāro padasandhikaro, ajja aggaṃ katvā'ti vuttaṃ hoti.
ek'ūnatiṃsatime saṃvacchare mah'ābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā, chabbassāni mahāpadānaṃ padahitvā
tassa na tādiso vaṇṇo hoti seyyathā'pi gunnaṃ, na tādiso saro hoti seyyathā'pi gunnaṃ, na tādisaṃ padaṃ hoti seyyathā'pi gunnaṃ.
taṇ'ṭhānasammajjanañ'ca, tattha padīp'ujjalanañ'ca, āsanapaññapanañ'ca
tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tad'ah'uposathe pannarase pavāraṇāya puṇṇāya puṇṇamāya rattiyā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto abbhokāse nisinno hoti.

papañ'ca udapānañ'ca, ye dadanti upassayaṃ.
tesaṃ divā ca ratto ca, sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati.
dhammaṭṭhā sīlasampannā, te janā saggagāmino'ti.

kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā, virūparūpena mathenti cittaṃ.
ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, tasmā ahaṃ pabbajito'mhi rāja.
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, uparipabbate thullaphusitake deve vassante taṃ udakaṃ yathāninnaṃ pavattamānaṃ pabbatakandarapadarasākhā paripūreti.
aham'etaṃ dassukhīlaṃ vadhena vā bandhena vā jāniyā vā garahāya vā pabbājanāya vā samūhanissāmī'ti
jātaṃ bhūtaṃ samuppannaṃ, kataṃ saṅkhatam'addhuvaṃ. jarāmaraṇasaṅghāṭaṃ, roganīḷaṃ pabhaṅguraṃ. āhāranettippabhavaṃ, n'ālaṃ tad'abhinandituṃ.
yadā ca buddhā lokasmiṃ, uppajjanti pabhaṅ'karā. te imaṃ dhammaṃ pakāsenti, dukkh'ūpasamagāminaṃ. tesaṃ sutvāna sappaññā, sacittaṃ paccaladdhā te.
mā, brāhmaṇa, paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ pamādo, paṭhame jhāne cittaṃ saṇṭhapehi, paṭhame jhāne cittaṃ ekodiṃ karohi, paṭhame jhāne cittaṃ samādahā'ti.

evaṃ nānappayātamhi, na dāni sukaraṃ tathā.
a'phusitaṃ vā phusituṃ, phusitaṃ v'ānurakkhituṃ.
yaṃ taṃ purisathāmena purisavīriyena purisaparakkamena pattabbaṃ na taṃ apāpuṇitvā vīriyassa saṇṭhānaṃ bhavissatī'ti

kayirā ce, kayirāth'enaṃ, daḷham'enaṃ parakkame.
sithilo hi paribbājo, bhiyyo ākirate rajaṃ.

lokassa antaṃ samitāvi ñatvā,
n'āsīsatī lokam'imaṃ parañ'cā'ti.
nimmānaratīnaṃ devānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā paranimmitavasavattī devā saddam'anussāvesum
dasa pāramiyo, dasa upapāramiyo, dasa param'atthapāramiyo'ti

araññe rukkhamūlesu, kandarāsu guhāsu ca.
vivekam'anubrūhantā, vihaṃsu tap'parāyanā

iti h'etaṃ vijānāma, navamo so parābhavo.
dutiyaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ.
sandiṭṭhiparāmāsiādhānaggāhiduppaṭinissaggissa purisapuggalassa asandiṭṭhiparāmāsianādhānaggāhisuppaṭinissaggitā hoti parinibbānāya.

tassa me ahu ussāho, nibbānaṃ abhipassato.
nā'haṃ bhabbo eta'r'ahi, kāmāni paṭisevituṃ.
anivatti bhavissāmi, brahmacariyaparāyaṇo'ti.

nekatikā vañcanikā, kūṭasakkhī apāṭukā.
bahūhi parikappehi, āmisaṃ paribhuñjare.
mamāyite'ti taṇhādiṭṭhimamattehi maman'ti pariggahite vatthusmiṃ.
etadaggaṃ, bhagini, pāricariyānaṃ yā mādisaṃ, sīlavantaṃ kalyāṇadhammaṃ brahmacāriṃ, etena dhammena paricareyyā'ti, methun'ūpasaṃhitena, saṅghādiseso.
vessantaraattabhāve nibbattitvā, pañcamahāpariccāge katvā, tusitapure nibbattitvā
pathaviṃ pathavito abhiññāya pathaviṃ mā maññi, pathaviyā mā maññi, pathavito mā maññi, pathaviṃ me'ti mā maññi, pathaviṃ m'ābhinandi. taṃ kissa hetu? pariññeyyaṃ tassā'ti vadāmi.
yāvakīvañ'ca bhikkhave bhikkhū ye te bhikkhū therā rattaññū cirapabbajitā saṅghapitaro saṅghapariṇāyakā te sakkarissanti garuṃ karissanti mānessanti pūjessanti tesañ'ca sotabbaṃ maññissanti
yassa hi so, bhikkhave, atthāya usukāro tejanaṃ dvīsu alātesu ātāpeyya paritāpeyya ujuṃ kareyya kammaniyaṃ sv'āssa attho abhinipphanno hoti.

ye keci sokā paridevitā vā, dukkhā ca lokasmim'anekarūpā.
piyaṃ paṭiccappabhavanti ete, piye asante na bhavanti ete.
samaṇabrāhmaṇā madappamādā paṭiviratā khantisoracce niviṭṭhā ekam'attānaṃ damenti, ekam'attānaṃ samenti, ekam'attānaṃ parinibbāpenti,
tassa hi pathavito yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā nīl'ādiārammaṇaṃ samosarantaṃ paripuṇṇabhāvaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti
na jānaṃ uddissakataṃ maṃsaṃ paribhuñjitabbaṃ. yo paribhuñjeyya āpatti dukkaṭassa. anujānāmi tikoṭiparisuddhaṃ macchamaṃsaṃ, adiṭṭhaṃ assutaṃ aparisaṅkitan'ti.
pānīyaparibhojanīy'ūpaṭṭhapanañ'ca, chand'ārahānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ chand'āharaṇañ'ca, tesaññ'eva akat'uposathānaṃ pārisuddhiyā'pi āharaṇañ'ca
ayaṃ kho so, bhikkhave, nibbedhikapariyāyo dhammapariyāyo'ti

lesakappe pariyāye, parikappe'nudhāvitā.
jīvik'atthā upāyena, saṅkaḍḍhanti bahuṃ dhanaṃ.
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, puriso sār'atthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṃ caramāno tiṇhaṃ kuṭhāriṃ ādāya vanaṃ paviseyya.
iminā tvaṃ dhammena diṭṭhena viditena akālikena pattena pariyogāḷhena atīt'ānāgate nayaṃ nehi
pānīyaparibhojanīyaupaṭṭhapanañ'ca, chand'ārahānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ chandaāharaṇañ'ca, tesaññ'eva akatauposathānaṃ pārisuddhiyā'pi āharaṇañ'ca

paṭisaṅkhā yoniso sen'āsanaṃ paṭisevāmi yāva'd'eva sītassa paṭighātāya uṇhassa paṭighātāya ḍaṃsamakasavāt'ātapasiriṃsapasamphassānaṃ paṭighātāya yāva'd'eva utuparissayavinodanaṃ paṭisallān'ārām'atthaṃ
atthi āsavā parivajjanā pahātabbā paṭisaṅkhā yoniso caṇḍaṃ hatthiṃ parivajjeti, caṇḍaṃ assaṃ parivajjeti, caṇḍaṃ goṇaṃ parivajjeti, caṇḍaṃ kukkuraṃ parivajjeti
parivutthaparivāsena bhikkhunā uttariṃ chārattaṃ bhikkhumānattāya paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
kathañ'ca, bhikkhave, parihānadhammo hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjanti pāpakā akusalā sarasaṅkappā saṃyojaniyā.
sace mayaṃ imaṃ bhikkhuṃ pasayha pasayha kāraṇaṃ karissāma, mā yam'pi'ssa taṃ saddhāmattakaṃ pemamattakaṃ tamhā'pi parihāyī'ti.
na ujjhānasaññī paresaṃ pattaṃ olokessāmī'ti sikkhā karaṇīyā.

pare ca na vijānanti, mayam'ettha yamāmase,
ye ca tattha vijānanti, tato sammanti medhagā.
musāvādā veramaṇī, pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī, pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī, samphappalāpā veramaṇī, ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave sammāvācā
upanāhassa samitattā santo, makkhassa samitattā santo, palāsassa samitattā santo
n'etaṃ, moghapurisa, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya, pasannānaṃ vā bhiyyobhāvāya.
ten'ānanda, bhikkhunā kismiñci'd'eva pasādanīye nimitte cittaṃ paṇidahitabbaṃ.
seyyathā'pi, ānanda, balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya.
tena hi tvaṃ mahante mahante sāṇipasibbake kārāpetvā hiraññasuvaṇṇassa pūrāpetvā sakaṭehi nibbāhāpetvā majjhe gaṅgāya sote osādehi.

sabbe sattā sabbe pāṇā, sabbe bhūtā ca kevalā.
sabbe bhadrāni passantu, mā kiñci pāpam'āgamā.
paṭibuddhena ca te, moggallāna, khippaññ'eva paccuṭṭhātabbaṃ na seyyasukhaṃ na passasukhaṃ na middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharissāmī'ti
kāyesu kāy'aññatar'āhaṃ, bhikkhave, evaṃ vadāmi yad'idaṃ, assāsapassāsā.
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, puriso addhānamaggappaṭipanno. so passeyya mahantaṃ udak'aṇṇavaṃ, orimaṃ tīraṃ sāsaṅkaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ, pārimaṃ tīraṃ khemaṃ appaṭibhayaṃ.
yo imaṃ lokaṃ sadevakaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ pajaṃ sadevamanussaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedesi.

seyyathā'pi dovāriko hoti paṇḍito byatto medhāvī aññātānaṃ nivāretā ñātānaṃ pavesetā, evam'evaṃ kho ariyasāvako satimā hoti paramena satinepakkena samannāgato cirakatam'pi cirabhāsitam'pi saritā anussaritā.
kathañ'ca, cunda, tividhaṃ kāyena asoceyyaṃ hoti? idha, cunda, ekacco pāṇ'ātipātī hoti luddo lohitapāṇi hatapahate niviṭṭho aday'āpanno sabbapāṇabhūtesu
yāvakīvañ'ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhū pahānasaññaṃ bhāvessanti
dūteyyapahiṇagamanaanuyogā paṭivirato hoti, kayavikkayā paṭivirato hoti, tulākūṭakaṃsakūṭamānakūṭā paṭivirato hoti
sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu, yam'ahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā ekā vūpakaṭṭhā appamattā ātāpinī pahit'attā vihareyyan'ti.
so sato'va assasati, sato'va passasati. dīghaṃ vā assasanto dīghaṃ assasāmī'ti pajānāti, dīghaṃ vā passasanto dīghaṃ passasāmī'ti pajānāti
so ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibbasārāgo byāpannacitto paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākat'indriyo.
so ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibbasārāgo byāpannacitto paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākat'indriyo.
kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ añña'd'atthu bhayapaṭikaṅkhī viharāmi? yaṃnūn'āhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ yathābhūtassa me taṃ bhayabheravaṃ āgacchati, tathābhūtaṃ tathābhūtova taṃ bhayabheravaṃ paṭivineyyan'ti
kathañ'c'ānanda, sekho hoti pāṭipado?
yadā kho te, bhikkhave, chappāṇakā jhattā assu kilantā, atha kho yo nesaṃ pāṇakānaṃ balavataro assa tassa te anuvatteyyuṃ, anuvidhāyeyyuṃ vasaṃ gaccheyyuṃ.
paṭisaṅkhā yoniso piṇḍapātaṃ paṭisevāmi n'eva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya yāva'd'eva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā yāpanāya vihiṃsūparatiyā brahmacariyānuggahāya
ayaṃ te, ambho purisa, chaṭṭho antaracaro vadhako ukkhitt'āsiko piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandho, yatth'eva naṃ passissāmi tatth'eva siro pātessāmī'ti.
na sammā vattati, na lomaṃ pāteti, na netthāraṃ vattati, yena saṅgho attamano hoti taṃ karomī'ti n'āha.
seyyath'īdaṃ, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā cattāro iddhipādā pañc'indriyāni pañca balāni satta bojjh'aṅgā ariyo aṭṭh'aṅgiko maggo.
hirīmā'yaṃ, bhikkhave, ottāpī appamatto hoti. so appamatto samāno bhabbo anādariyaṃ pahātuṃ dovacassataṃ pahātuṃ pāpamittataṃ pahātuṃ.
so tattha ṭhito āsavānaṃ khayaṃ pāpuṇāti

alattakakatā pādā, mukhaṃ cuṇṇakamakkhitaṃ.
alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.
brahmamārā ca indā ca lokapālā ca devatā, yamo, mittā manussā ca majjhattā verikā'pi ca, sabbe sattā sukhī hontu.

ime kho, bhikkhave, dve sukkā dhammā lokaṃ na pāleyyuṃ, na'y'idha paññāyetha mātā'ti vā mātucchā'ti vā mātulānī'ti vā ācariyabhariyā'ti vā garūnaṃ dārā'ti vā. sambhedaṃ loko agamissa, yathā ajeḷakā kukkuṭasūkarā soṇasiṅgālā.
upāsakā bhikkhunisaṅghassa cīvar'atthāya chandakaṃ saṃharitvā, aññatarassa pāvārikassa ghare parikkhāraṃ nikkhipitvā, bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ
catur'āsītisahassadhammakkhandh'ānubhāvena piṭakattay'ānubhavena jinasāvak'ānubhāvena
sambahulā bhikkhū santhatāni ujjhitvā āraññik'aṅgaṃ piṇḍapātik'aṅgaṃ paṃsukūlik'aṅgaṃ samādiyiṃsu

yassa pāpaṃ kataṃ kammaṃ, kusalena pithīyati
so'maṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā mutto'va candimā.

piyato jāyatī soko, piyato jāyatī bhayaṃ,
piyato vippamuttassa, n'atthi soko kuto bhayaṃ.

tasmā piyaṃ na kayirātha, piy'āpāyo hi pāpako,
ganthā tesaṃ na vijjanti, yesaṃ n'atthi piy'āppiya.
evaṃ svākkhāto, bhikkhave, mayā dhammo uttāno vivaṭo pakāsito chinnapilotiko.
yathā, mahārāja, rañño bhaṇḍ'āgāriko bhaṇḍ'āgāraṃ pavisitvā nīlapītalohit'odātamañjiṭṭhāni rājabhogāni rūpāni passitvā sañjānāti. evaṃ kho, mahārāja, sañjānanalakkhaṇā saññā'ti
paṇḍito, bhikkhave, pukkusāti kulaputto paccapādi dhammass'ānudhammaṃ, na ca maṃ dhamm'ādhikaraṇaṃ vihesesi.
seyyathā'pi, bhante, rajoharaṇaṃ sucim'pi puñchati asucim'pi puñchati gūthagatam'pi
iminā puññakammena mā me bālasamāgamo. sataṃ samāgamo hotu, yāva nibbānapattiyā.
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, puriso kāḷakaṃ vatthaṃ paridhāya kese pakiritvā bhasmapuṭaṃ khandhe āropetvā mahājanakāyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
dve jāyam'patikā taṃ ekaputtakaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ vadhitvā vallūrañ'ca soṇḍikañ'ca karitvā puttamaṃsāni khādantā
te puttamaṃsāni c'eva khādeyyuṃ, ure ca paṭipiseyyuṃ, kahaṃ, ekaputtaka, kahaṃ, ekaputtakā'ti
yaṅ kiñci ratanaṃ loke vijjati vividhaṃ puthu, ratanaṃ buddhasamaṃ n'atthi. tasmā sotthī bhavantu te.
indriyesu guttadvārā bhavissāma, bhojane mattaññuno, jāgariyaṁ anuyuttā, vipassakā kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ, pubbaratta-apararattaṁ bodhipakkhiyānaṁ dhammānaṁ, bhāvan'ānuyogam'anuyuttā viharissāmā’ti.
indriyesu guttadvārā bhavissāma, bhojane mattaññuno, jāgariyaṁ anuyuttā, vipassakā kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ, pubbaratt'āpararattaṁ bodhipakkhiyānaṁ dhammānaṁ, bhāvan'ānuyogam'anuyuttā viharissāmā’ti.

manopubbaṅ'gamā dhammā, manoseṭṭhā manomayā.
manasā ce pasannena, bhāsati vā karoti vā.
tato naṃ sukham'anveti, chāyā'va anapāyinī
so tehi yācitakehi bhogehi purakkhato parivuto antar'āpaṇaṃ paṭipajjeyya.

so puratthimena nagarassa navaṃ santh'āgāraṃ kārāpetvā kesamassuṃ ohāretvā khar'ājinaṃ nivāsetvā sappitelena kāyaṃ abbhañjitvā magavisāṇena piṭṭhiṃ kaṇḍuvamāno navaṃ santh'āgāraṃ pavisati, saddhiṃ mah'esiyā brāhmaṇena ca purohitena.

asevanā ca bālānaṃ, paṇḍitānañ'ca sevanā.
pūjā ca pūjanīyānaṃ, etaṃ maṅgalam'uttamaṃ.
api ca kho mātugāmassa cakkhunā cakkhuṃ upanijjhāyati pekkhati
yathā vārivahā pūrā paripūrenti sāgaraṃ, evam'eva ito dinnaṃ petānaṃ upakappati.
idaṃ te, tāta sudinna, mātu mattikaṃ, itthikāya itthidhanaṃ, aññaṃ pettikaṃ aññaṃ pitāmahaṃ.
tathāgate c'assa saddhāmattaṃ hoti pemamattaṃ, api c'assa ime dhammā honti
tassa rūpaṃ samanvesato yāvatā rūpassa gati, vedanaṃ samanvesato ... pe ... saññaṃ... saṅkhāre... viññāṇaṃ samanvesato yāvatā viññāṇassa gati.
ayaṃ vasabhasaṃvacchare vassānautu. asmiṃ utumhi poṭṭhapādamāsassa kāḷapakkhe catutthaṃ, ravivāram'idan'ti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
imesaṃ kho, potaliya, catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ katamo te puggalo khamati abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā'ti?
yo c'āyaṃ kāmesu kāmasukh'allik'ānuyogo hīno gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasañhito
yāvakīvañ'ca bhikkhave bhikkhū uppannāya taṇhāya ponobhavikāya na vasaṃ gacchissanti, vuddhi'y'eva pāṭikaṅkhā no parihāni
seyyathā'pi vadhukā yaññad'eva rattiṃ vā divaṃ vā ānītā hoti, tāva'd'ev'assā tibbaṃ hir'ottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hoti sassuyā'pi sasure'pi sāmike'pi antamaso dāsakammakaraporisesu
so pana vassāno utu sāvaṇapoṭṭhapādamāsā, assayujakattikamāsā sarado, māgasiraphussamāsā hemanto, māghaphaggunamāsā sisiro, cittavesākhamāsā vasanto, jeṭṭh'āsaḷhamāsā gimho utū'ti veditabbo.
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, saradasamaye thullaphusitake deve vassante udake udakabubbuḷaṃ uppajjati c'eva nirujjhati ca.
so pana vassāno utu sāvaṇapoṭṭhapādamāsā, assayujakattikamāsā sarado, māgasiraphussamāsā hemanto, māghaphaggunamāsā sisiro, cittavesākhamāsā vasanto, jeṭṭh'āsaḷhamāsā gimho utū'ti veditabbo.
kiñ'hi siyā, bhikkhave, pheṇapiṇḍe sāro?
evaṃ sante kho, uttara, andho bhāvit'indriyo bhavissati, badhiro bhāvit'indriyo bhavissati.
sabbe buddhā balappattā, paccekānañ'ca yaṃ balaṃ, arahantānañ'ca tejena, rakkhaṃ bandhāmi sabbaso.
yesaṃ me manussānaṃ vadhena vā bandhena vā jāniyā vā garahāya vā uppajjeyyuṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanass'upāyāsā, atthi me tesu chandarāgo.
yaṃnūn'āhaṃ tiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāsaṃ saṃkaḍḍhitvā, kullaṃ bandhitvā, taṃ kullaṃ nissāya hatthehi ca pādehi ca vāyamamāno sotthinā pāraṃ uttareyyan'ti.
seyyathā'pi rañño paccantime nagare bahubalakāyo paṭivasati, evam'evaṃ kho ariyasāvako āraddhavīriyo viharati, thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
seyyath'īdaṃ, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā cattāro iddhipādā pañc'indriyāni pañca balāni satta bojjh'aṅgā ariyo aṭṭh'aṅgiko maggo.
bhikkhave, ye te mayā dhammā abhiññā desitā, te vo sādhukaṃ uggahetvā āsevitabbā bhāvetabbā bahulīkātabbā
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, bāḷisiko āmisagataṃ baḷisaṃ gambhīre udakarahade pakkhipeyya. tam'enaṃ aññataro āmisacakkhu maccho gileyya.
tato tvaṃ bāhiya na tena. yato tvaṃ bāhiya na tena, tato tvaṃ bāhiya na tattha. yato tvaṃ bāhiya na tattha, tato tvaṃ bāhiya n'ev'idha na huraṃ na ubhayam'antarena es'ev'anto dukkhassā'ti

jīvitānaṃ parikkhāre, bhesajje atha paccaye.
na bāḷhaṃ ussukā āsuṃ, yathā te āsavakkhaye
so bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā paṭivirato hoti, ekabhattiko hoti ratt'ūparato virato vikālabhojanā

anūpavādo anūpaghāto, pātimokkhe ca saṃvaro,
mattaññutā ca bhattasmiṃ, pantañ'ca sayan'āsanaṃ,
adhicitte ca āyogo, etaṃ buddhāna sāsanaṃ.

sabbapāpassa akaraṇaṃ, kusalass'ūpasampadā.
sacittapariyodapanaṃ, etaṃ buddhāna'sāsanaṃ.

pheṇapiṇḍ'ūpamaṃ rūpaṃ, vedanā bubbuḷ'ūpamā.
marīcik'ūpamā saññā, saṅkhārā kadal'ūpamā.
māy'ūpamañ'ca viññāṇaṃ, desit'ādicca'bandhunā.
handa mayaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammapāṭhaṃ bhaṇāmase
cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā sattabojjhi-aṅge paripūrenti
jayanto bodhiyā mūle, sakyānaṃ nandivaḍḍhano. evaṃ tvaṃ vijayo hohi, jayassu jayamaṅgale.
atthi bhikkhave pañho ek'aṃsabyākaraṇīyo, atthi pañho vibhajjabyākaraṇīyo, atthi pañho paṭipucchābyākaraṇīyo, atthi pañho ṭhapanīyo.
taṃ kiṃ maññasi, gāmaṇi, idh'assa puriso pāṇ'ātipātī adinn'ādāyī kāmesumicchācārī musāvādī pisuṇavāco pharusavāco samphappalāpī abhijjhālu byāpannacitto micchādiṭṭhiko.

yodha puññañ'ca pāpañ'ca, bāhetvā brahmacariyavā.
saṅkhāya loke carati, sa ve bhikkhū'ti vuccati.
idha ekacco dussīlo hoti pāpadhammo asucisaṅkassarasamācāro paṭicchannakamm'anto assamaṇo samaṇapaṭiñño abrahmacārī brahmacāripaṭiñño antopūti avassuto kasambujāto – antopūtibhāvo'ti.
handa mayaṁ caturabrahmavihārā obhāsanaṁ karomase

tiṭṭhañ'caraṃ, nisinno vā, sayāno vā, yāvat'assa vigatamiddho,
etaṃ satiṃ adhiṭṭheyya, brahmam'etaṃ vihāraṃ idha'm'āhu.

vinicchayā yāni pakappitāni,
te ve munī brūsi anuggahāya,
ajjhattasantī'ti yam'etam'atthaṃ,
kathaṃ nu dhīrehi paveditaṃ taṃ.
yena bhaggavo kumbhakāro tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhaggavaṃ kumbhakāraṃ etad'avoca
sevitabbe dhamme na jānāti asevitabbe dhamme na jānāti, bhajitabbe dhamme na jānāti abhajitabbe dhamme na jānāti.

tasmā hi dhīrañ'ca paññañ'ca bahussutañ'ca,
dhorayhasīlaṃ vatavantam'ariyaṃ,
taṃ tādisaṃ sappurisaṃ sumedhaṃ,
bhajetha nakkhattapathaṃ'va candimā.
imasmiñ'ca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne pañcavaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsū'ti.
api ca kho mātugāmassa saddaṃ suṇāti tirokuṭṭaṃ vā tiropākāraṃ vā hasantiyā vā bhaṇantiyā vā gāyantiyā vā rodantiyā vā
so pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā, ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya, parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā.
handa mayaṁ bhadd'ekarattagāthāyo bhaṇāmase
evam'evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā evaṃ tibbā bhayasaññā paccupaṭṭhitā hoti pārājikesu dhammesu.
na kamm'ārāmatā, na bhass'ārāmatā, na nidd'ārāmatā, na saṅgaṇik'ārāmatā, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, asaṃsagg'ārāmatā, nippapañc'ārāmatā.
na kamm'ārāmatā, na bhass'ārāmatā, na nidd'ārāmatā, na saṅgaṇik'ārāmatā, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, asaṃsagg'ārāmatā, nippapañc'ārāmatā.
es'āhaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañ'ca bhikkhusaṅghañ'ca.
es'ev'anto vicikicch'ānusayānaṃ, es'ev'anto mān'ānusayānaṃ, es'ev'anto bhavarāg'ānusayānaṃ, es'ev'anto avijj'ānusayānaṃ
avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa asmī'ti'pi'ssa hoti, ayam'aham'asmī'ti'pi'ssa hoti, bhavissan'ti'pi'ssa hoti
na kho ahaṃ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmi, yaṃ taṃ sukhaṃ aññatr'eva kāmehi aññatra akusalehi dhammehī'ti.
bhārā have pañcakkhandhā, bhārahāro ca puggalo. bhār'ādānaṃ dukhaṃ loke, bhāranikkhepanaṃ sukhaṃ.
bhārā have pañcakkhandhā, bhārahāro ca puggalo. bhār'ādānaṃ dukhaṃ loke, bhāranikkhepanaṃ sukhaṃ.
indriyesu guttadvārā bhavissāma, bhojane mattaññuno, jāgariyaṁ anuyuttā, vipassakā kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ, pubbaratt'āpararattaṁ bodhipakkhiyānaṁ dhammānaṁ, bhāvan'ānuyogam'anuyuttā viharissāmā’ti.
indriyesu guttadvārā bhavissāma, bhojane mattaññuno, jāgariyaṁ anuyuttā, vipassakā kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ, pubbaratt'āpararattaṁ bodhipakkhiyānaṁ dhammānaṁ, bhāvan'ānuyogam'anuyuttā viharissāmā’ti.
ariyo hoti bhāvit'indriyo – sace ākaṅkhati, paṭikūlañ'ca appaṭikūlañ'ca tad'ubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako vihareyyaṃ sato sampajāno'ti, upekkhako tattha viharati sato sampajāno.
pahātabbaṃ pajahanto sikkheyya, bhāvetabbaṃ bhāvento sikkheyya, sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikaronto sikkheyya
yāvatā akatakalyāṇānaṃ akatakusalānaṃ akatabhīruttāṇānaṃ katapāpānaṃ kataluddānaṃ katakibbisānaṃ gati taṃ gatiṃ pecca gacchāmī'ti.
yāvatā akatakalyāṇānaṃ akatakusalānaṃ akatabhīruttāṇānaṃ katapāpānaṃ kataluddānaṃ katakibbisānaṃ gati taṃ gatiṃ pecca gacchāmī'ti.
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, āṇaṇyaṃ yathā ārogyaṃ yathā bandhanāmokkhaṃ yathā bhujissaṃ yathā khem'antabhūmiṃ

udar'āvadehakaṃ bhutvā, sayant'uttānaseyyakā.
kathaṃ vattenti paṭibuddhā, yā kathā satthugarahitā.
bhūtapubb'āhaṃ, bhante, rohitasso nāma isi ahosiṃ bhojaputto iddhimā vehāsaṅ'gamo.

diṭṭhā vā ye ca adiṭṭhā, ye сa dūre vasanti avidūre
bhūtā vā sambhav'esī vā, sabbe sattā bhavantu sukhit'attā.
ñātibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, bhogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, rogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, sīlabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, diṭṭhibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa
atha kho so bhikkhu vihāraṃ pavisissāmī'ti kavāṭaṃ paṇāmento addasa sabbaṃ vihāraṃ ahinā puṇṇaṃ, vātapānehi bhoge nikkhante, disvāna bhīto vissaram'akāsi.
bhikkhu ye te lābhā dhammikā dhammaladdhā antamaso pattapariyāpannamattam'pi, tathārūpehi lābhehi appaṭivibhattabhogī hoti sīlavantehi sabrahmacārīhi sādhāraṇabhogī.
tattha cakkhumā puriso tīre ṭhito passeyya sippisambukam'pi sakkharakathalam'pi macchagumbam'pi, carantam'pi tiṭṭhantam'pi.
kāle dadanti sappaññā, vadaññū vītamaccharā. kālena dinnaṃ ariyesu, ujubhūtesu tādisu. vippasannamanā tassa, vipulā hoti dakkhiṇā.

yaṃ pubbe taṃ visosehi, pacchā te m'āhu kiñcanaṃ,
majjhe ce no gahessasi, upasanto carissasi.
yathā, mahārāja, rañño bhaṇḍ'āgāriko bhaṇḍ'āgāraṃ pavisitvā nīlapītalohit'odātamañjiṭṭhāni rājabhogāni rūpāni passitvā sañjānāti. evaṃ kho, mahārāja, sañjānanalakkhaṇā saññā'ti.
taṃ kiṃ maññasi, rāhula, cakkhu niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā'ti? aniccaṃ, bhante.
asmī'ti, bhikkhave, maññitam'etaṃ, ayam'aham'asmī'ti maññitam'etaṃ, bhavissan'ti maññitam'etaṃ, na bhavissan'ti maññitam'etaṃ, rūpī bhavissan'ti maññitam'etaṃ

jīno rath'assaṃ maṇikuṇḍale ca, putte ca dāre ca that'eva jīno.
sabbesu bhogesu asesitesu, kasmā na santappasi sokakāle.
maṇḍapeyyam'idaṃ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṃ, satthā sammukhībhūto.
evarūpassa puggalassa tādisaṃy'eva appamattakaṃ pāpakammaṃ kataṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ hoti, n'āṇu'pi khāyati, kiṃ bahud'eva.
na kamm'ārāmatā, na bhass'ārāmatā, na nidd'ārāmatā, na saṅgaṇik'ārāmatā, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, asaṃsagg'ārāmatā, nippapañc'ārāmatā.
savitakkasavicārā dhammā. avitakkavicāramattā dhammā. avitakk'āvicārā dhammā.
tathāgate c'assa saddhāmattaṃ hoti pemamattaṃ, api c'assa ime dhammā honti

kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā, virūparūpena mathenti cittaṃ.
ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, tasmā ahaṃ pabbajito'mhi rāja.
tassa taṃ ṭhānaṃ abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhato yo yobbane yobbanamado so sabbaso vā pahīyati tanu vā pana hoti. idaṃ kho, bhikkhave, atthavasaṃ paṭicca jarādhammo'mhi, jaraṃ anatīto'ti
tassa amanasikaraṇīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ amanasikārā manasikaraṇīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ manasikārā anuppannā c'eva āsavā na uppajjanti, uppannā ca āsavā pahīyanti.
pañca bhavasātāni, manāpikā rūpā, manāpikā saddā, manāpikā gandhā, manāpikā rasā, manāpikā phoṭṭhabbā.
atthi nu kho me uttarimanussadhammā alam'ariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato, so'haṃ pacchime kāle sabrahmacārīhi puṭṭho na maṅku bhavissāmī'ti
tattha katamo kāyasaṅkhāro? kāyasañcetanā kāyasaṅkhāro, vacīsañcetanā vacīsaṅkhāro, manosañcetanā cittasaṅkhāro.

middhī yadā hoti mahagghaso ca, niddāyitā samparivattasāyī,
mahāvarāho'va nivāpapuṭṭho, punappunaṃ gabbham'upeti mando.
mataṃ me jīvitā seyyaṃ, tasmā araññaṃ pavisitvā ubbandhitvā marissāmī'ti araññaṃ gato maraṇabhayatajjito paṭinivatti.
atha puriso āgaccheyya jīvitu'kāmo amaritu'kāmo sukhakāmo dukkhappaṭikūlo.
eta'r'ahi jiṇṇo vuḍḍho mah'allako addhagato vayoanuppatto āsītiko me vayo vattati. app'ekad'āhaṃ, bho raṭṭhapāla, idha pādaṃ karissāmī'ti aññen'eva pādaṃ karomīti.
n'eso, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye samuddo. mahā eso, bhikkhave, udakarāsi mahāudak'aṇṇavo.
mahākāruṇiko nātho hitāya sabbapāṇinaṃ, pūretvā pāramī sabbā, patto sambodhim'uttamaṃ.
kathañ'ca, bhikkhave, mahācoro balavanissito hoti? idha, bhikkhave, mahācoro rājānaṃ vā rājamahāmattānaṃ vā nissito hoti.
aṅgārakās'ūpamā kāmā mahāpariḷāh'aṭṭhenā'ti passanto vikkhambhanato kāme parivajjeti
dvīsu mahāpurisalakkhaṇesu kaṅkhati vicikicchati n'ādhimuccati na sampasīdati, kos'ohite ca vatthaguyhe, pahūtajivhatāya ca.

idaṃ vadāmī'ti na tassa hoti,
dhammesu niccheyya samuggahītaṃ,
passañ'ca diṭṭhīsu anuggahāya,
ajjhattasantiṃ pacinaṃ adassaṃ.
so pana vassāno utu sāvaṇapoṭṭhapādamāsā, assayujakattikamāsā sarado, māgasiraphussamāsā hemanto, māghaphaggunamāsā sisiro, cittavesākhamāsā vasanto, jeṭṭh'āsaḷhamāsā gimho utū'ti veditabbo.
so pana vassāno utu sāvaṇapoṭṭhapādamāsā, assayujakattikamāsā sarado, māgasiraphussamāsā hemanto, māghaphaggunamāsā sisiro, cittavesākhamāsā vasanto, jeṭṭh'āsaḷhamāsā gimho utū'ti veditabbo.

mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hantvā,
rājāno dve ca sotthiye,
veyagghapañcamaṃ hantvā,
anīgho yāti brāhmaṇo.
mātari pitari c'āpi, atho jeṭṭhamhi bhātari. ācariye catutthamhi, tesu na mānaṃ kayirātha.
suddhodanamahārājānaṃ nissāya mahāmāyādeviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā, dasamās'accayena mātu kucchito nikkhamitvā
dūteyyapahiṇagamanaanuyogā paṭivirato hoti, kayavikkayā paṭivirato hoti, tulākūṭakaṃsakūṭamānakūṭā paṭivirato hoti
parivutthaparivāsena bhikkhunā uttariṃ chārattaṃ bhikkhumānattāya paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
māyāvissa purisapuggalassa amāyā hoti parinibbānāya. thaddhassa purisapuggalassa atthaddhiyaṃ hoti parinibbānāya.
bhikkhu baddho cakkhuviññeyyesu rūpesu, āvāsagato mārassa, mārassa vasaṃ gato, paṭimukkassa mārapāso.
ayaṃ vuccati ariyasāvako akaraṇīyo mārassa akaraṇīyo pāpimato'ti
seyyathā'pi bhikkhave ubhatomukhā putoḷi pūrā nānāvihitassa dhaññassa seyyath'idaṃ sālīnaṃ vīhīnaṃ muggānaṃ māsānaṃ tilānaṃ taṇḍulānaṃ
mā maṃ āyasmanto kiñci avacuttha kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā, ahaṃ'p'āyasmante na kiñci vakkhāmi kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā
idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako micchāājīvaṃ pahāya sammāājīvena jīvitaṃ kappeti, ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave sammāājīvo.
taṃ kiṃ maññasi, gāmaṇi, idh'assa puriso pāṇ'ātipātī adinn'ādāyī kāmesumicchācārī musāvādī pisuṇavāco pharusavāco samphappalāpī abhijjhālu byāpannacitto micchādiṭṭhiko.
atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā lomā nakhā dantā taco maṃsaṃ nhāru aṭṭhi aṭṭhimiñjaṃ vakkaṃ hadayaṃ yakanaṃ kilomakaṃ

porāṇam'etaṃ atula, n'etaṃ ajjatanām'iva,
nindanti tuṇhim'āsīnaṃ, nindanti bahubhāṇinaṃ,
mitabhāṇim'pi nindanti, n'atthi loke anindito.
honti h'ete, sāriputta, channassa bhikkhuno mittakulāni suhajjakulāni upavajjakulāni.

kalyāṇamittatā muninā, lokaṃ ādissa vaṇṇitā.
kalyāṇamitte bhajamāno, api bālo paṇḍito assa.
kathañ'c'ānanda, satthāraṃ sāvakā mittavatāya samudācaranti, no sapattavatāya?
tañ'hi'ssa, bhikkhu, n'atthi yena jāyetha, ajāyamāno kiṃ jīyissati, ajīyamāno kiṃ mīyissati, amīyamāno kiṃ kuppissati, akuppamāno kissa pihessati?
yaṃ kho, bhikkhave, ime pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ idaṃ vuccati kāmasukhaṃ mīḷhasukhaṃ puthujjanasukhaṃ anariyasukhaṃ.
ehi tvaṃ, bhadramukha, saṅghāṭiko hohi, saṅghāṭikassa te sato saṅghāṭidhāraṇamattena abhijjhālussa abhijjhā pahīyissati

evam'eva kho, ye hi keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā kāyena c'eva cittena ca kāmehi avūpakaṭṭhā viharanti, yo ca n'esaṃ kāmesu kāmacchando kāmasneho kāmamucchā kāmapipāsā kāmapariḷāho so ca ajjhattaṃ na suppahīno hoti
so an'upārambhacitto samāno bhabbo muṭṭhassaccaṃ pahātuṃ asampajaññaṃ pahātuṃ cetaso vikkhepaṃ pahātuṃ.

na muṇḍakena samaṇo, abbato alikaṃ bhaṇaṃ.
icchālobhasamāpanno, samaṇo kiṃ bhavissati.
na ca tassa bhikkhuno aññāṇakena mutti atthi, yañ'ca tattha āpattiṃ āpanno tañ'ca yathādhammo kāretabbo, uttari c'assa moho āropetabbo
mudutalunahatthapādo kho pana so bhavaṃ gotamo, idam'pi tassa bhoto gotamassa mahāpurisassa mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ bhavati.
atha kho so, bhikkhave, mudumūsi gocarāya pakkāmi. tam'enaṃ biḷāro gahetvā sahasā asaṅkhāditvā ajjhohari.
yathā āpāthagate rūpe cakkhuviññāṇaṃ na rajjati, na dussati, na muyhati
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, puriso kāḷakaṃ vatthaṃ paridhāya kese pakiritvā musalaṃ khandhe āropetvā mahājanakāyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā

saccan'ti so brāhmaṇo kiṃ vadeyya,
musā'ti vā so vivadetha kena,
yasmiṃ samaṃ visamaṃ vā'pi n'atthi,
sa kena vādaṃ paṭisaṃyujeyya.
yo hi, gahapati, imaṃ kāyaṃ pariharanto muhuttam'pi ārogyaṃ paṭijāneyya, kimaññatra bālyā?
atha kho so, bhikkhave, mudumūsi gocarāya pakkāmi. tam'enaṃ biḷāro gahetvā sahasā asaṅkhāditvā ajjhohari.
sabbaṃ rūpaṃ, n'etaṃ mama, n'eso'ham'asmi, na m'eso attā'ti evam'etaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tato tvaṃ, moggallāna, uṭṭhāy'āsanā udakena akkhīni anumajjitvā disā anuvilokeyyāsi, nakkhattāni tārakarūpāni ullokeyyāsi
kathañ'hi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocessasi!

māno hi te brāhmaṇa khāribhāro, kodho dhūmo bhasmani mosavajjaṃ.
jivhā sujā hadayaṃ jotiṭhānaṃ, attā sudanto purisassa joti.

dunniggahassa lahuno, yatthakāma'nipātino,
cittassa damatho sādhu, cittaṃ dantaṃ sukh'āvahaṃ.
āyudo balado dhīro, vaṇṇado paṭibhāṇado. sukhassa dātā medhāvī, sukhaṃ so adhigacchati. āyuṃ datvā balaṃ vaṇṇaṃ, sukhañ'ca paṭibhānakaṃ, dīgh'āyu yasavā hoti, yattha yatth'ūpapajjatī'ti.
atha kho aññe imaṃ bhogaṃ paṭipajjissanti, ahaṃ pana yathākammaṃ gamissāmī'ti.
tam'mayaṃ bhagavantaṃ sadhammaṃ sasaṅghaṃ, imehi sakkārehi yath'ārahaṃ āropitehi abhipūjayāma

aṭṭha dhut'aṅgāni, āraññik'aṅgaṃ, piṇḍapātik'aṅgaṃ, paṃsukūlik'aṅgaṃ, tecīvarik'aṅgaṃ, sapadānacārik'aṅgaṃ, khalupacchābhattik'aṅgaṃ, nesajjik'aṅgaṃ, yathāsanthatik'aṅgaṃ, idaṃ vuccati vataṃ, na sīlaṃ.
yathā paccayaṃ pavattamānaṃ dhātumattam'ev'etaṃ, yad idaṃ piṇḍapāto tad upabhuñjako ca puggalo, dhātumattako nissatto nijjīvo suñño,
sabbaphāliphullā kho, ānanda, yamakasālā akālapupphehi. te tathāgatassa sarīraṃ okiranti ajjhokiranti abhippakiranti tathāgatassa pūjāya.

vinicchayā yāni pakappitāni,
te ve munī brūsi anuggahāya,
ajjhattasantī'ti yam'etam'atthaṃ,
kathaṃ nu dhīrehi paveditaṃ taṃ.
appiyehi sampayogo dukkho, piyehi vippayogo dukkho, yam'p'icchaṃ na labhati tam'pi dukkhaṃ

yaṃkiñci sithilaṃ kammaṃ, saṅkiliṭṭhañ'ca yaṃ vataṃ,
saṅkassaraṃ brahmacariyaṃ, na taṃ hoti mahapphalan'ti
idha, gahapati, ariyasāvako vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato. ayaṃ vuccati, gahapati, cāgasampadā.

yācako appiyo hoti, yācaṃ adadam'appiyo.
tasm'āhaṃ taṃ na yācāmi, mā me videssanā ahū'ti.
yācitak'ūpamā kāmā tāvakālik'aṭṭhenā'ti passanto vikkhambhanato kāme parivajjeti
rattiyā paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhehi
yāvañ'c'idaṃ, bhikkhave, alam'eva sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindituṃ alaṃ virajjituṃ alaṃ vimuccitun'ti.
te yogayuttā mārassa, ayogakkhemino janā. sattā gacchanti saṃsāraṃ, jātimaraṇagāmino.
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhu, purisassa kiṃsuko adiṭṭhapubbo assa. so yen'aññataro puriso kiṃsukassa dassāvī ten'upasaṅkameyya.
ye santāne hīnā dhammā, yāva nibbānato mamaṃ nassantu sabbadā y'eva.
seyyathā'pi, sunakkhatta, paṇḍupalāso bandhanā pavutto abhabbo haritattāya. evam'eva kho, sunakkhatta, āneñj'ādhimuttassa purisapuggalassa ye lok'āmisasaṃyojane se pavutte.
tayo satipaṭṭhānā yad'ariyo sevati yad'ariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇam'anusāsitum'arahati, so vuccati yogg'ācariyānaṃ anuttaro purisadammasārathī'ti
yonisomanasikāram'p'āhaṃ, bhikkhave, sāhāraṃ vadāmi, no anāhāraṃ. ko c'āhāro yonisomanasikārassa? saddhā'ti'ssa vacanīyaṃ.
kammassako'mhi kammadāy'ādo kammayoni kammabandhu kammapaṭisaraṇo. yaṃ kammaṃ karissāmi kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā tassa dāy'ādo bhavissāmi.
atthi āsavā nirayagamanīyā, atthi āsavā tiracchānayonigamanīyā, atthi āsavā pettivisayagamanīyā, atthi āsavā manussalokagamanīyā, atthi āsavā devalokagamanīyā.
tassa taṃ ṭhānaṃ abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhato yo yobbane yobbanamado so sabbaso vā pahīyati tanu vā pana hoti. idaṃ kho, bhikkhave, atthavasaṃ paṭicca jarādhammo'mhi, jaraṃ anatīto'ti

disvāna taṇhaṃ aratiṃ ragañ'ca,
n'āhosi chando api methunasmiṃ,
kim'ev'idaṃ muttakarīsapuṇṇaṃ,
pādā'pi naṃ samphusituṃ na icche.

taṃ kiṃ maññasi, aggivessana, vatteyya rañño khattiyassa muddh'āvasittassa sakasmiṃ vijite vaso, ghātetāyaṃ vā ghātetuṃ, jāpetāyaṃ vā jāpetuṃ, pabbājetāyaṃ vā pabbājetuṃ, seyyathā'pi rañño pasenadissa kosalassa, seyyathā'pi vā pana rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassā'ti?
handa mayaṃ raṭṭhapālattheragāthāyo bhaṇāmase
handa mayaṃ ratanattayapaṇāmagāthāyo c'eva saṃvegaparikittanapāṭhañca bhaṇāmase
yāvakīvañca bhikkhave bhikkhū ye te bhikkhū therā rattaññū cirapabbajitā saṅghapitaro saṅghapariṇāyakā te sakkarissanti garuṃ karissanti mānessanti pūjessanti tesañ'ca sotabbaṃ maññissanti

tasmā hi bhūtā nisāmetha sabbe, mettaṃ karotha mānusiyā pajāya.
divā ca ratto ca haranti ye baliṃ, tasmā hi ne rakkhatha appamattā.
kharassarena paṇavena rathikāya rathikaṃ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṃ parinetvā dakkhiṇena dvārena nikkhāmetvā dakkhiṇato nagarassa sīsaṃ chindathā'ti.
seyyathā'pi dakkho bhamakāro vā bhamakār'antevāsī vā dīghaṃ vā añchanto dīghaṃ añchāmī'ti pajānāti, rassaṃ vā añchanto rassaṃ añchāmī'ti pajānāti

n'atthi loke raho nāma, pāpakammaṃ pakubbato,
attā te purisa jānāti, saccaṃ vā yadi vā musā.
nanu mayā, moghapurisa, anekapariyāyena rāgavirāgāya dhammo desito
abhijānāsi no tvaṃ, rājañña, divā seyyaṃ upagato supinakaṃ passitā ārāmarāmaṇeyyakaṃ vanarāmaṇeyyakaṃ bhūmirāmaṇeyyakaṃ pokkharaṇīrāmaṇeyyakan'ti?

gāme vā yadi v'āraññe, ninne vā yadi vā thale.
yattha arahanto viharanti, taṃ bhūmirāmaṇeyyakan'ti.
n'eso, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye samuddo. mahā eso, bhikkhave, udakarāsi mahāudak'aṇṇavo.
idam'avoca bhagavā. attamano āyasmā rāhulo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandi.
rukkhaphal'ūpamā kāmā sambhañjanaparibhañjan'aṭṭhenā'ti passanto vikkhambhanato kāme parivajjeti
mā āyasmantānam'pi saṅghabhedo ruccittha. samet'āyasmantānaṃ saṅghena, samaggo hi saṅgho, sammodamāno avivadamāno ek'uddeso, phāsu viharatī'ti.
na hi ruṇṇaṃ vā soko vā, yā v'aññā paridevanā. na taṃ petānam'atthāya, evaṃ tiṭṭhanti ñātayo.
tattha diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattan'ti rūp'āyatane cakkhuviññāṇena diṭṭhamattaṃ.
rūp'ūpādānakkhandhassa, vedan'ūpādānakkhandhassa, saññ'ūpādānakkhandhassa, saṅkhār'ūpādānakkhandhassa, viññāṇ'ūpādānakkhandhassa.

ye'pi hi keci, bhikkhave, anāgatam'addhānaṃ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā yaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ taṃ aniccato dakkhissanti dukkhato dakkhissanti anattato dakkhissanti rogato dakkhissanti bhayato dakkhissanti, te taṇhaṃ pajahissanti.
ñātibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, bhogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, rogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, sīlabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, diṭṭhibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa
puna caparaṃ, brāhmaṇa, idh'ekacco akatakalyāṇo hoti akatakusalo akatabhīruttāṇo katapāpo kataluddo katakibbiso. tam'enaṃ aññataro gāḷho rog'ātaṅko phusati.
api ca kho mātugāmassa saddaṃ suṇāti tirokuṭṭaṃ vā tiropākāraṃ vā hasantiyā vā bhaṇantiyā vā gāyantiyā vā rodantiyā vā
dvīsu mahāpurisalakkhaṇesu kaṅkhati vicikicchati n'ādhimuccati na sampasīdati, kos'ohite ca vatthaguyhe, pahūtajivhatāya ca.

saṅghalābhassa bhaṇḍanti, saṅghato paribāhirā.
paralābhopajīvantā, ahirīkā na lajjare.
mahāvanaṃ ajjhogāhetvā beluvalaṭṭhikāya mūle divāvihāraṃ nisīdi
tiṭṭhantu tāva manussabhūtā, acetanānaṃ rukkhānam'pi sāmaggiṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati.
na'y'idaṃ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṃ vussati janakuhan'atthaṃ, na janalapan'atthaṃ, na lābhasakkārasilok'ānisaṃs'atthaṃ
api ca kho yāni'ssa tāni pubbe mātugāmena saddhiṃ hasitalapitakīḷitāni tāni anussarati
yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ anattā, tasmā rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvattati, na ca labbhati rūpe, evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu, evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī'ti.
padakkhiṇaṃ kāyakammaṃ, vācākammaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ, padakkhiṇaṃ manokammaṃ paṇīdhi te padakkhiṇe. padakkhiṇāni katvāna, labhant'atthe padakkhiṇe.
ariyasāvakassa āraddhavīriyassa upaṭṭhitassatino etaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ yaṃ vossagg'ārammaṇaṃ karitvā labhissati samādhiṃ

kusalānañ'ca dhammānaṃ, paññāya ca parikkhayā.
sabb'ākāravar'ūpetaṃ, lujjate jinasāsanaṃ.
yāvatā akatakalyāṇānaṃ akatakusalānaṃ akatabhīruttāṇānaṃ katapāpānaṃ kataluddānaṃ katakibbisānaṃ gati taṃ gatiṃ pecca gacchāmī'ti.

luddho pan'āyaṃ purisapuggalo lobhena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto pāṇam'pi hanati, adinnam'pi ādiyati, paradāram'pi gacchati, musā'pi bhaṇati, param'pi tathattāya samādapeti, yaṃ sa hoti dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāyā'ti.

lesakappe pariyāye, parikappe'nudhāvitā.
jīvik'atthā upāyena, saṅkaḍḍhanti bahuṃ dhanaṃ.

aññathā lokanāthamhi, tiṭṭhante puris'uttame.
iriyaṃ āsi bhikkhūnaṃ, aññathā dāni dissati.
api c'āhaṃ imasmiṃ'y'eva byāmamatte kaḷebare sasaññimhi samanake lokañ'ca paññāpemi lokasamudayañ'ca lokanirodhañ'ca lokanirodhagāminiñ'ca paṭipadan'ti.
buddho susuddho karuṇāmah'aṇṇavo, yo'ccantasuddhabbarañāṇalocano, lokassa pāp'ūpakilesaghātako
asu hi, bhante, gaṅgāya nadiyā mahā udakakkhandho so amunā loṇakapallena loṇo na assa apeyyo

seyyathā'pi mahāsamuddo ekaraso loṇaraso,
evam'eva kho ayaṃ dhammavinayo ekaraso vimuttiraso.
ambil'aggehi'pi, tittak'aggehi'pi, kaṭuk'aggehi'pi, madhur'aggehi'pi, khārikehi'pi, akhārikehi'pi, loṇikehi'pi, aloṇikehi'pi.
puna caparaṃ bhikkhu seyyathā'pi passeyya sarīraṃ sivathikāya chaḍḍitaṃ aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṃ nimaṃsalohitamakkhitaṃ nhārusambandhaṃ
yathā, mahārāja, rañño bhaṇḍ'āgāriko bhaṇḍ'āgāraṃ pavisitvā nīlapītalohit'odātamañjiṭṭhāni rājabhogāni rūpāni passitvā sañjānāti. evaṃ kho, mahārāja, sañjānanalakkhaṇā saññā'ti
evaṃ no ayaṃ amhākaṃ pabbajjā avaṅkatā avañjhā bhavissati saphalā saudrayā.
sabbe te sadukkhā saupaghātā saupāyāsā sapariḷāhā micchāpaṭipannā'ti, iti vadaṃ itth'eke apasādeti.
santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmino saki'd'eva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhass'antaṃ karissanti
sakkāyo kho, āvuso, eko anto, sakkāyasamudayo dutiyo anto, sakkāyanirodho majjhe, taṇhā sibbinī, taṇhā hi naṃ sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyā.
sakkāyo kho, āvuso, eko anto, sakkāyasamudayo dutiyo anto, sakkāyanirodho majjhe, taṇhā sibbinī, taṇhā hi naṃ sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyā.
seyyathā'pi puriso sappikumbhaṃ vā telakumbhaṃ vā gambhīraṃ udakarahadaṃ ogāhitvā bhindeyya. tatra yā assa sakkharā vā kaṭhalā vā sā adhogāmī assa

nekatikā vañcanikā, kūṭasakkhī apāṭukā.
bahūhi parikappehi, āmisaṃ paribhuñjare.
bhagavā pana, bhante, arahaṃ sammāsambuddho pahoti tathā kātuṃ yathā sabbo loko kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjeyyā'ti?
varaṃ, bhikkhave, tiṇhena ayosaṅkunā ādittena sampajjalitena sajotibhūtena sot'indriyaṃ sampalimaṭṭhaṃ, na tv'eva sotaviññeyyesu saddesu anubyañjanaso nimittaggāho.
saṅkhāre saṅkhārattāya saṅkhatam'abhisaṅkharonti, viññāṇaṃ viññāṇattāya saṅkhatam'abhisaṅkharonti. saṅkhatam'abhisaṅkharontī'ti kho, bhikkhave, tasmā saṅkhārā'ti vuccati.
handa mayaṃ saṅkhittasuttapāṭhaṃ bhaṇāmase
pavivittass'āyaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo saṅgaṇik'ārāmassā'ti
evan'taṃ uposathakammaṃ imehi catūhi lakkhaṇehi saṅgahitaṃ pattakallaṃ nāma hoti, kātuṃ yuttarūpaṃ.
yāvakīvañ'ca bhikkhave bhikkhū ye te bhikkhū therā rattaññū cirapabbajitā saṅghapitaro saṅghapariṇāyakā te sakkarissanti garuṃ karissanti mānessanti pūjessanti tesañ'ca sotabbaṃ maññissanti
yāvakīvañ'ca bhikkhave bhikkhū ye te bhikkhū therā rattaññū cirapabbajitā saṅghapitaro saṅghapariṇāyakā te sakkarissanti garuṃ karissanti mānessanti pūjessanti tesañ'ca sotabbaṃ maññissanti
ehi tvaṃ, bhadramukha, saṅghāṭiko hohi, saṅghāṭikassa te sato saṅghāṭidhāraṇamattena abhijjhālussa abhijjhā pahīyissati
ehi tvaṃ, bhadramukha, saṅghāṭiko hohi, saṅghāṭikassa te sato saṅghāṭidhāraṇamattena abhijjhālussa abhijjhā pahīyissati
ehi tvaṃ, bhadramukha, saṅghāṭiko hohi, saṅghāṭikassa te sato saṅghāṭidhāraṇamattena abhijjhālussa abhijjhā pahīyissati
samiñjite pasārite sampajānakārī, saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇe sampajānakārī, asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajānakārī
handa mayaṃ saccakiriyāgāthāyo bhaṇāmase

n'atthi me saraṇaṃ aññaṃ – buddho me saraṇaṃ varaṃ
etena saccavajjena – sotthi me hotu sabbadā.
taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ sacchikātabban'ti
pahātabbaṃ pajahanto sikkheyya, bhāvetabbaṃ bhāvento sikkheyya, sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikaronto sikkheyya
taṃ kho pan'idaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ sacchikātabban'ti
varaṃ, bhikkhave, tattāya ayosalākāya ādittāya sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya cakkhu'ndriyaṃ sampalimaṭṭhaṃ, na tv'eva cakkhuviññeyyesu rūpesu anubyañjanaso nimittaggāho.
yathā, mahārāja, rañño bhaṇḍ'āgāriko bhaṇḍ'āgāraṃ pavisitvā nīlapītalohit'odātamañjiṭṭhāni rājabhogāni rūpāni passitvā sañjānāti. evaṃ kho, mahārāja, sañjānanalakkhaṇā saññā'ti
tassa taṃ ṭhānaṃ abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhato maggo sañjāyati. so taṃ maggaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.

attā have jitaṃ seyyo, yā c'āyaṃ itarā pajā.
attadantassa posassa, niccaṃ saññatacārino.

āratī viratī pāpā, majjapānā ca saññamo.
appamādo ca dhammesu, etaṃ maṅgalam'uttamaṃ.
sārambhe ce bhikkhu vatthusmiṃ aparikkamane saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kāreyya bhikkhū vā anabhineyya vatthudesanāya pamāṇaṃ vā atikkāmeyya, saṅghādiseso.
yo c'āyaṃ attakilamath'ānuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasañhito.
tesaṃ vitakkānaṃ vitakkasaṅkhārasaṇṭhānaṃ manasikaroto ye pāpakā akusalā vitakkā chand'ūpasaṃhitā'pi dos'ūpasaṃhitā'pi moh'ūpasaṃhitā'pi te pahīyanti
anekehi sambhārehi samāraddhā vadatī'ti. so taṃ vīṇaṃ dasadhā vā satadhā vā phāleyya, dasadhā vā satadhā vā taṃ phāletvā sakalikaṃ sakalikaṃ kareyya.
yā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tamhi tamhi sattanikāye jāti sañjāti okkanti abhinibbatti khandhānaṃ pātubhāvo āyatanānaṃ paṭilābho, ayaṃ vuccati jāti.
seyyath'īdaṃ, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā cattāro iddhipādā pañc'indriyāni pañca balāni satta bojjh'aṅgā ariyo aṭṭh'aṅgiko maggo.

tad'ahu pabbajito santo, jātiyā sattavassiko.
so pi maṃ anusāseyya, sampaṭicchāmi muddhanā
ratanattay'ānubhāvena ratanattayatejasā, dukkharogabhayāverā sokā sattu c'upaddavā anekā antarāyā pi vinassantu asesato.
es'ev'anto daṇḍ'ādānasatth'ādānakalahaviggahavivādatuvaṃtuvaṃpesuññamusāvādānaṃ. etth'ete pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantī'ti.

sahā'v'assa dassanasampadāya, taya'ssu dhammā jahitā bhavanti.
sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchitañ'ca, sīlabbataṃ vā pi yad'atthi kiñci.
idh'āvuso bhikkhu saddho hoti saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṃ
dukkhaṃ, bhikkhave, kusīto viharati vokiṇṇo pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi, mahantañ'ca sadatthaṃ parihāpeti.
sabbe te sadukkhā saupaghātā saupāyāsā sapariḷāhā micchāpaṭipannā'ti, iti vadaṃ itth'eke apasādeti.
tāvatiṃsānaṃ devānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā yāmā devā saddam'anussāvesum
kiṃ pana tvaṃ, āvuso, yen'eva hatthena saddhādeyyaṃ bhuñjasi ten'eva hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocesī'ti?
so taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā tathāgate saddhaṃ paṭilabhati. so tena saddhāpaṭilābhena samannāgato iti paṭisañcikkhati
tathāgate c'assa saddhāmattaṃ hoti pemamattaṃ, api c'assa ime dhammā honti
alam'eva saddhāpabbajitena kulaputtena vīriyaṃ ārabhituṃ
ye santāne hīnā dhammā, yāva nibbānato mamaṃ nassantu sabbadā y'eva.
sabbasantāpānaṃ samitattā santo, sabb'ākusal'ābhisaṅkhārānaṃ santattā samitattā
santi idh'ekacce khattiyā, brāhmaṇā'ti bhaṇati
ajja't'agge'ti ajjataṃ ādiṃ katvā, ajja'd'agge'ti vā pāṭho, dakāro padasandhikaro, ajja aggaṃ katvā'ti vuttaṃ hoti.

assaddho akataññū ca, sandhicchedo ca yo naro,
hat'āvakāso vant'āso, sa ve uttamaporiso.
seyyathā'pi rañño paccantime nagare bahuṃ āvudhaṃ sannicitaṃ hoti, evam'evaṃ kho, ariyasāvako bahussuto hoti
yāvakīvañ'ca bhikkhave bhikkhū abhiṇhaṃ sannipātā bhavissanti sannipātabahulā, vuddhi'y'eva pāṭikaṅkhā no parihāni

aṭṭha dhut'aṅgāni, āraññik'aṅgaṃ, piṇḍapātik'aṅgaṃ, paṃsukūlik'aṅgaṃ, tecīvarik'aṅgaṃ, sapadānacārik'aṅgaṃ, khalupacchābhattik'aṅgaṃ, nesajjik'aṅgaṃ, yathāsanthatik'aṅgaṃ, idaṃ vuccati vataṃ, na sīlaṃ.
sabbe te sadukkhā saupaghātā saupāyāsā sapariḷāhā micchāpaṭipannā'ti, iti vadaṃ itth'eke apasādeti.
yathā divā tathā rattiṃ yathā rattiṃ tathā divā. iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveyyāsi.
sappasir'ūpamā kāmā sappaṭibhay'aṭṭhenā'ti passanto vikkhambhanato kāme parivajjeti
pamādassa samitattā santo, sabbakilesānaṃ samitattā santo, sabbaduccaritānaṃ samitattā santo
byāpādapadosaṃ pahāya abyāpannacitto viharati sabbapāṇabhūtahit'ānukampī, byāpādapadosā cittaṃ parisodheti
sabbamaññitasamugghātasāruppaṃ vo, bhikkhave, paṭipadaṃ desessāmi.
idh'ānanda, bhikkhu ye loke upādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhān'ābhinives'ānusayā, te pajahanto viharati anupādiyanto. ayaṃ vuccat'ānanda, sabbaloke anabhiratasaññā.
sabb'upādānapariññāya dhammo cakkhuñ'ca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso.
tesañ'ca vikālabhojan'ādivasena vatthusabhāgaāpattiyo ce na vijjanti.
uposatho, yāvatikā ca bhikkhū kammappattā, sabhāg'āpattiyo ca na vijjanti, vajjanīyā ca puggalā tasmiṃ na honti pattakallan'ti vuccati.

ovadeyy'ānusāseyya, asabbhā ca nivāraye,
satañ'hi so piyo hoti, asataṃ hoti appiyo.
api ca kho passati gahapatiṃ vā gahapatiputtaṃ vā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitaṃ samaṅgībhūtaṃ paricārayamānaṃ
yadā tumhe attanā'va jāneyyātha, ime dhammā kusalā, ime dhammā anavajjā, ime dhammā viññuppasatthā, ime dhammā samattā samādinnā hitāya sukhāya saṃvattantī'ti, atha tumhe upasampajja vihareyyātha.

sakañ'hi diṭṭhiṃ katham'accayeyya, chand'ānunīto ruciyā niviṭṭho,
sayaṃ samattāni pakubbamāno, yathā hi jāneyya tathā vadeyya.

atisāradiṭṭhiyā'va so samatto, mānena matto paripuṇṇamānī,
sayam'eva sāmaṃ manas'ābhisitto, diṭṭhī hi sā tassa tathā samattā.
ime kho pan'āyasmanto, satta adhikaraṇasamathā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
iti ayañ'c'eva samanupassanā asmī'ti c'assa avigataṃ hoti. asmī'ti kho pana, bhikkhave, avigate pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ avakkanti hoti
so kho pana me ayaṃ attā nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo sassatisamaṃ tath'eva ṭhassatī'ti.
samaṃ pādaṃ bhūmiyaṃ nikkhipati, samaṃ uddharati, samaṃ sabbāvantehi pādatalehi bhūmiṃ phusati.
cittaṃ samādahanto sikkheyya, paññāya pajānanto sikkheyya, abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānanto sikkheyya
anekehi sambhārehi samāraddhā vadatī'ti. so taṃ vīṇaṃ dasadhā vā satadhā vā phāleyya, dasadhā vā satadhā vā taṃ phāletvā sakalikaṃ sakalikaṃ kareyya.
bhikkhunīnam'ovādo pana samīpe tāsaṃ n'atthitāya n'atthi.
yāvakīvañ'ca bhikkhave bhikkhū apaññattaṃ na paññāpessanti, paññattaṃ na samucchindissanti, yathāpaññattesu sikkhāpadesu samādāya vattissanti
pittasamuṭṭhānā ābādhā semhasamuṭṭhānā ābādhā vātasamuṭṭhānā ābādhā sannipātikā ābādhā utupariṇāmajā ābādhā visamaparihārajā ābādhā
aham'etaṃ dassukhīlaṃ vadhena vā bandhena vā jāniyā vā garahāya vā pabbājanāya vā samūhanissāmī'ti
na saññasaññī na visaññasaññī, no'pi asaññī na vibhūtasaññī. evaṃ sametassa vibhoti rūpaṃ, saññānidānā hi papañcasaṅkhā.
nanu evaṃ sante tesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ appāṭihīrakataṃ bhāsitaṃ sampajjatī'ti?
varaṃ, bhikkhave, tattāya ayosalākāya ādittāya sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya cakkhu'ndriyaṃ sampalimaṭṭhaṃ, na tv'eva cakkhuviññeyyesu rūpesu anubyañjanaso nimittaggāho.
sabbe sattā sabbadukkhā pamuccantu sabbe sattā laddhasampattito mā vigacchantu
musāvādā veramaṇī, pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī, pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī, samphappalāpā veramaṇī, ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave sammāvācā
tattha katamaṃ domanassaṃ? yaṃ cetasikaṃ asātaṃ, cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ, cetosamphassajaṃ asātaṃ dukkhaṃ vedayitaṃ, cetosamphassajā asātā dukkhā vedanā.
puna caparaṃ bhikkhu seyyathā'pi passeyya sarīraṃ sivathikāya chaḍḍitaṃ aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṃ sa'maṃsalohitaṃ nhārusambandhaṃ
dhammo ca desito niyyāniko upasamiko parinibbāniko sambodhagāmī sugatappavedito

diṭṭhā vā ye ca adiṭṭhā, ye сa dūre vasanti avidūre
bhūtā vā sambhav'esī vā, sabbe sattā bhavantu sukhit'attā.

n'ānuyuttā tathā eke, muṇḍā saṅghāṭipārutā.
sambhāvanaṃyev'icchanti, lābhasakkāramucchitā.
taṇ'ṭhānasammajjanañ'ca, tattha padīp'ujjalanañ'ca, āsanapaññapanañ'ca
yena anuppannaṃ vā thīnamiddhaṃ uppajjati uppannaṃ vā thinamiddhaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattati yatha'y'idaṃ arati tandī vijambhitā bhattasammado cetaso ca līnattaṃ.
ananuyogo ca kho adukkho eso dhammo anupaghāto anupāyāso apariḷāho, sammāpaṭipadā'ti—iti vadaṃ dhammam'eva deseti.
cakkhuṃ kho, māgaṇḍiya, rūp'ārāmaṃ rūparataṃ rūpasammuditaṃ. taṃ tathāgatassa dantaṃ guttaṃ rakkhitaṃ saṃvutaṃ, tassa ca saṃvarāya dhammaṃ deseti.

udar'āvadehakaṃ bhutvā, sayant'uttānaseyyakā.
kathaṃ vattenti paṭibuddhā, yā kathā satthugarahitā.

tiṭṭhañ'caraṃ, nisinno vā, sayāno vā, yāvat'assa vigatamiddho,
etaṃ satiṃ adhiṭṭheyya, brahmam'etaṃ vihāraṃ idha'm'āhu.
saraṇañ'ca dhammaṃ ñatvā araṇañ'ca dhammaṃ ñatvā araṇapaṭipadaṃ paṭipajjissāmā'ti evañ'hi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabbaṃ.
asītivassasahass'āyukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu ayaṃ jambudīpo avīci maññe phuṭo bhavissati manussehi, seyyathā'pi naḷavanaṃ vā saravanaṃ vā.
tassa kusakaṇṭakā c'eva pāde vijjheyyuṃ, sarapattāni ca gattāni vilekheyyuṃ.
assosi kho bhagavā dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya bhāradvājagottassa brāhmaṇassa māgaṇḍiyena paribbājakena saddhiṃ imaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ.
yattha jāto bhave bhave ujucitto satipañño sallekho viriyavā'minā.
tam'mayaṃ bhagavantaṃ sadhammaṃ sasaṅghaṃ, imehi sakkārehi yath'ārahaṃ āropitehi abhipūjayāma
bāhuṃ sahassam'abhinimmita sāvudhan'taṃ, grīmekhalaṃ uditaghorasasenamāraṃ, dān'ādidhammavidhinā jitavā mun'indo, tan'tejasā bhavatu te jayamaṅgalāni

na munī gāmam'āgamma,
kulesu sahasā care,
ghās'esanaṃ chinnakatho,
na vācaṃ payutaṃ bhaṇe.
yāvatā, bhikkhave, sahassī lokadhātu, mahābrahmā tattha aggam'akkhāyati.
saḷ'āyatanavibhaṅgaṃ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi. taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī'ti.
ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṃkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajeyyā'ti?

yamhi saccañ'ca dhammo ca, ahiṃsā saṃyamo damo.
sa ve vantamalo dhīro, thero iti pavuccatī'ti.
seyyathā'pi, brāhmaṇa, udapatto saṃsaṭṭho lākhāya vā haliddiyā vā nīliyā vā mañjiṭṭhāya vā.
catunnaṃ dhammānaṃ ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evam'idaṃ dīgham'addhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ mamañ'c'eva tumhākañ'ca
cattālīsam'pi jātiyo paññāsam'pi jātiyo jātisatam'pi jātisahassam'pi jātisatasahassam'pi aneke'pi saṃvaṭṭakappe aneke'pi vivaṭṭakappe aneke'pi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe
cattālīsam'pi jātiyo paññāsam'pi jātiyo jātisatam'pi jātisahassam'pi jātisatasahassam'pi aneke'pi saṃvaṭṭakappe aneke'pi vivaṭṭakappe aneke'pi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe
cattālīsam'pi jātiyo paññāsam'pi jātiyo jātisatam'pi jātisahassam'pi jātisatasahassam'pi aneke'pi saṃvaṭṭakappe aneke'pi vivaṭṭakappe aneke'pi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe
bhikkhu yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni samādhisaṃvattanikāni
tena vattabbo, passasī'ti. āma passāmī'ti. āyatiṃ saṃvareyyāsī'ti
ehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, sīlavā hohi, pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharāhi ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhassu sikkhāpadesū'ti
saṃvijjati kho, āvuso, bhagavato cakkhu. passati bhagavā cakkhunā rūpaṃ. chandarāgo bhagavato n'atthi. suvimuttacitto bhagavā.
upāsakā bhikkhunisaṅghassa cīvar'atthāya chandakaṃ saṃharitvā, aññatarassa pāvārikassa ghare parikkhāraṃ nikkhipitvā, bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ
sādhu me bhante bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu
sa kho so, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati, na kho ahaññ'ev'eko jarādhammo jaraṃ anatīto
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, uparipabbate thullaphusitake deve vassante taṃ udakaṃ yathāninnaṃ pavattamānaṃ pabbatakandarapadarasākhā paripūreti.

ye'pi hi keci, bhikkhave, anāgatam'addhānaṃ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā yaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ taṃ aniccato dakkhissanti dukkhato dakkhissanti anattato dakkhissanti rogato dakkhissanti bhayato dakkhissanti, te taṇhaṃ pajahissanti.
dhammo dhajo yo viya tassa satthu dassesi lokassa visuddhimaggaṃ, niyyāniko dhammadharassa dhārī sāt'āvaho santikaro suciṇṇo
api ca kho mātugāmassa ucchādanaparimaddananhāpanasambāhanaṃ sādiyati.
bhikkhu ye te lābhā dhammikā dhammaladdhā antamaso pattapariyāpannamattam'pi, tathārūpehi lābhehi appaṭivibhattabhogī hoti sīlavantehi sabrahmacārīhi sādhāraṇabhogī.
niṭṭhite ca pubbakicce, sace so divaso cātuddasīpaṇṇarasīsāmaggīnam'aññataro, yath'ājja uposatho paṇṇaraso.
bhikkhu y'āyaṃ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharati sabrahmacārīsu āvi c'eva raho ca
tath'ūpam'āhaṃ, bhikkhave, imaṃ puggalaṃ vadāmi gihibhogā ca parihīno, sāmaññ'atthañ'ca na paripūreti.
bhikkhu y'āyaṃ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharati sabrahmacārīsu āvi c'eva raho ca
so h'āvuso, bhagavā jānaṃ jānāti, passaṃ passati, cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto, vattā pavattā, atthassa ninnetā, amatassa dātā, dhammassāmī tathāgato.
no ce aggiṃ paricareyyāsi, pañjaliko ādiccaṃ namasseyyāsi. no ce pañjaliko ādiccaṃ namasseyyāsi, sāyatatiyakaṃ udakaṃ oroheyyāsī'ti
tesaṃ rasapathaviṃ aṅguliyā sāyataṃ acchādesi, taṇhā ca tesaṃ okkami.
atha rājā sāyanhasamayaṃ evaṃ vadeyya, ambho, kathaṃ so puriso'ti? tath'eva, deva, jīvatī'ti.
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, puriso sār'atthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṃ caramāno tiṇhaṃ kuṭhāriṃ ādāya vanaṃ paviseyya.
labheyya nu kho so coro coraghātesu, āgamentu tāva bhavanto coraghātā, amukasmiṃ me gāme vā nigame vā mitt'āmaccā ñātisālohitā,

ye suppayuttā manasā daḷhena, nikkāmino gotamasāsanamhi.
te pattipattā amataṃ vigayha, laddhā mudhā nibbutiṃ bhuñjamānā.
sagge kāme ca rūpe, girisikharataṭe c'antalikkhe vimāne, dīpe raṭṭhe ca gāme, taruvanagahane, gehavatthumhi khette
tha kho bhagavā sitaṃ pātvākāsi.

appamāṇo buddho, appamāṇo dhammo.
appamāṇo saṅgho, pamāṇavantāni siriṃsapāni
ahivicchikā satapadī, uṇṇanābhī sarabū mūsikā.

na tena thero so hoti, yen'assa palitaṃ siro,
paripakko vayo tassa, moghajiṇṇo'ti vuccati.

tasmā hi dhīrañ'ca paññañ'ca bahussutañ'ca,
dhorayhasīlaṃ vatavantam'ariyaṃ, taṃ tādisaṃ sappurisaṃ sumedhaṃ, bhajetha nakkhattapathaṃ'va candimā.
sammādiṭṭhiko kho pana hoti aviparītadassano, atthi dinnaṃ atthi yiṭṭhaṃ atthi hutaṃ, atthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko, atthi ayaṃ loko atthi paro loko, atthi mātā atthi pitā, …

kaṇhaṃ dhammaṃ vippahāya, sukkaṃ bhāvetha paṇḍito,
okā anokam'āgamma, viveke yattha dūramaṃ.
atthi, bhikkhave, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya saṃvattati
saṅgho sukhett'ābhyatikhettasaññito, yo diṭṭhasanto sugat'ānubodhako, lolappahīno ariyo sumedhaso
tatr'idaṃ sugatassa sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ, dīghaso nava vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā, tiriyaṃ cha vidatthiyo.
kacci nu kho'haṃ suññ'āgāre abhiramāmī'ti, pabbajitena abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ.

yān'īdha bhūtāni samāgatāni, bhummāni vā yāni va antalikkhe.
sabb'eva bhūtā sumanā bhavantu, atho'pi sakkacca suṇantu bhāsitaṃ.
idān'eva kho ahaṃ ājānāmi, ayam'pi kira dhammo, sutt'āgato suttapariyāpanno, anvaddhamāsaṃ uddesaṃ āgacchatī'ti
asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajānakārī, uccārapassāvakamme sampajānakārī, gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī
taṃ kiṃ maññasi, sunakkhatta, api nu tassa purisassa tasmiṃ vante puna bhottu'kamyatā assā'ti?
so ca ajjhattaṃ na suppahīno hoti, na suppaṭippassaddho, opakkamikā c'epi te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā vedayanti, abhabbāva te ñāṇāya dassanāya anuttarāya sambodhāya.

evam'eva kho, ye hi keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā kāyena c'eva cittena ca kāmehi avūpakaṭṭhā viharanti, yo ca n'esaṃ kāmesu kāmacchando kāmasneho kāmamucchā kāmapipāsā kāmapariḷāho so ca ajjhattaṃ na suppahīno hoti
vīriy'ārambhāya saṃvattanti, no kosajjāya, subharatāya saṃvattanti, no dubbharatāyā'
saṅgho sukhett'ābhyatikhettasaññito, yo diṭṭhasanto sugat'ānubodhako, lolappahīno ariyo sumedhaso
surāpānavaggo chaṭṭho.
iminā puññakammena upajjhāyā guṇ'uttarā, ācariy'ūpakārā ca mātāpitā ca ñātakā, suriyo candimā rājā, guṇavantā narā'pi ca
alābhā vata me, na vata me lābhā, dulladdhaṃ vata me, na vata me suladdhaṃ, yassa me anabhirati uppannā, rāgo cittaṃ anuddhaṃseti,
na so satto sulabharūpo, yo na mātābhūtapubbo, yo na pitābhūtapubbo, yo na bhātā, yo na bhaginī, yo na putto, yo na dhītābhūtapubbā'ti
yāvakīvañ'ca me, bhikkhave, imesu catūsu ariyasaccesu evaṃ tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādas'ākāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ na suvisuddhaṃ ahosi,
honti h'ete, sāriputta, channassa bhikkhuno mittakulāni suhajjakulāni upavajjakulāni.
evañ'hi sā yavakalāpī suhatā assa chahi byābhaṅgīhi haññamānā. atha sattamo puriso āgaccheyya byābhaṅgihattho.

santussako ca subharo ca,
appakicco ca sallahukavutti,
sant'indriyo ca nipako ca,
appagabbho kulesu ananugiddho.
bālo abyatto akusalo sūdo sakassa bhattu nimittaṃ na uggaṇhāti.
gāmakathaṃ nigamakathaṃ nagarakathaṃ janapadakathaṃ itthikathaṃ sūrakathaṃ visikhākathaṃ
seyyath'īdaṃ rūp'ūpādānakkhandho vedan'ūpādānakkhandho saññ'ūpādānakkhandho saṅkhār'ūpādānakkhandho viññāṇ'ūpādānakkhandho

pāpakānañ'ca dhammānaṃ, kilesānañ'ca yo utu.
upaṭṭhitā vivekāya, ye ca saddhammasesakā.
so avikkhittacitto samāno bhabbo ayonisomanasikāraṃ pahātuṃ kummaggasevanaṃ pahātuṃ cetaso līnattaṃ pahātuṃ.
brāhmaṇā, bhante, pacchābhūmakā kamaṇḍalukā sevālamālikā aggiparicārikā udak'orohakā soceyyāni paññapenti, tes'āhaṃ soceyyāni rocemī'ti
dve'me, bhikkhave, antā pabbajitena na sevitabbā.
idha gihīhi saṃsaṭṭho viharati, sahanandī sahasokī, sukhitesu sukhito, dukkhitesu dukkhito, uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu attanā tesu yogaṃ āpajjati. ayaṃ vuccati manussaggāho.
yāvakīvañ'ca bhikkhave bhikkhū ye te bhikkhū therā rattaññū cirapabbajitā saṅghapitaro saṅghapariṇāyakā te sakkarissanti garuṃ karissanti mānessanti pūjessanti tesañ'ca sotabbaṃ maññissanti
yam'p'idaṃ sotasamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkham'asukhaṃ vā tam'pi ādittaṃ.
abhabbo'va tāva kālaṃ kātuṃ yāva na sot'āpattiphalaṃ sacchikaroti.

bhavatu sabbamaṅgalaṃ, rakkhantu sabbadevatā,
sabbadhamm'ānubhāvena, sadā sotthi bhavantu te

yo ca sameti pāpāni, aṇuṃ thūlāni sabbaso.
samitattā hi pāpānaṃ, samaṇo'ti pavuccati.
evam'eva kho, ye hi keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā kāyena c'eva cittena ca kāmehi avūpakaṭṭhā viharanti, yo ca n'esaṃ kāmesu kāmacchando kāmasneho kāmamucchā kāmapipāsā kāmapariḷāho
musāvādavaggo paṭhamo.
mā maṃ, āyasmanto, kiñci avacuttha kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā, aham'p'āyasmante na kiñci vakkhāmi kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā. viramath'āyasmanto, mama vacanāyā'ti
idha bhikkhave bhikkhuno mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi c'eva raho ca
uposatho, yāvatikā ca bhikkhū kammappattā, sabhāg'āpattiyo ca na vijjanti, vajjanīyā ca puggalā tasmiṃ na honti pattakallan'ti vuccati.
varaṃ, bhikkhave, sottaṃ. sottaṃ kho pan'āhaṃ, bhikkhave, vañjhaṃ jīvitānaṃ vadāmi, aphalaṃ jīvitānaṃ vadāmi, momūhaṃ jīvitānaṃ vadāmi
tath'ev'ime catubbaṇṇā, pabbajitvā tav'antike. jahanti purimaṃ nāmaṃ, buddhaputtā'ti ñāyare.

kiṃ'sū asissāmi kuvaṃ vā asissaṃ,
dukkhaṃ vata settha kv'ajja sessaṃ,
ete vitakke paridevaneyye,
vinayetha sekho aniketacārī.
tattha purimesu catūsu kiccesu idāni suriy'ālokassa atthitāya n'atthi, aparāni tīṇi bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ jānantehi bhikkhūhi katāni pariniṭṭhitāni honti.
iṅgha tāva āyasmā kāyikaṃ sikkhassū'ti, iti'ssa bhavanti vattāro.
eso hi, bhikkhu, brahmā mahābrahmā abhibhū anabhibhūto añña'd'atthudaso vasavattī issaro kattā nimmātā seṭṭho sajitā vasī pitā bhūtabhabyānaṃ.
cattāro'me, bhikkhave, acchariyā abbhutā dhammā raññe cakkavattimhi. katame cattāro?
sārambhe ce bhikkhu vatthusmiṃ aparikkamane saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kāreyya bhikkhū vā anabhineyya vatthudesanāya pamāṇaṃ vā atikkāmeyya, saṅghādiseso.
mettāya cetovimuttiyā āsevitāya bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya susamāraddhāya ekādas'ānisaṃsā pāṭikaṅkhā.
namo omak'ātītassa tassa vatthuttayassa'pi. namokārappabhāvena vigacchantu upaddavā.
seyyathā'pi saha bhaṇḍena gahitacoraṃ, vadhetha nan'ti rañño āṇāya rājapurisā bandhitvā catukke catukke pahārasatāni dentā āghātanaṃ nenti.
evam'eva kho, sunakkhatta, n'evasaññān'āsaññ'āyatan'ādhimuttassa purisapuggalassa ye ākiñcaññ'āyatanasaṃyojane se vante.
samudayadhamm'ānupassī vā kāyasmiṃ viharati, vayadhamm'ānupassī vā kāyasmiṃ viharati, samudayavayadhamm'ānupassī vā kāyasmiṃ viharati.
seyyathā'pi, āvuso, balavā puriso daḷhena varattakkhaṇḍena sīse sīsaveṭhaṃ dadeyya, evam'eva kho, āvuso, adhimattā sīse sīsavedanā.
daṇḍaparāyaṇaṃ pavedhamānaṃ gacchantaṃ āturaṃ gatayobbanaṃ khaṇḍadantaṃ palitakesaṃ vilūnaṃ khalitasiraṃ valitaṃ tilak'āhatagattan'ti?

ekajaṃ vā dvijaṃ vā'pi, yo'dha pāṇaṃ vihiṃsati,
yassa pāṇe dayā n'atthi, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
na tve'va tathārūpe vitakke vitakkeyya yathārūpānaṃ vitakkānaṃ vasaṃ gato saṅghaṃ bhindeyya.

nīcā niviṭṭhā subharā, mudū atthaddhamānasā.
abyāsekā amukharā, atthacintā vas'ānugā.

patirūpe vase dese, ariyamittakaro siyā.
sammāpaṇidhisampanno, pubbe puññakato naro.
dhaññaṃ dhanaṃ yaso kitti, sukhaṃcetaṃadhivattatī.
n'āhaṃ taṃ pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā rajjan'ādivasena uppajjituṃ dassāmī'ti evam'ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
diyaḍḍho māso seso gimhānan'ti vassānassa paṭhamo māso – icc'ete aḍḍhateyyamāsā uṇhasamayo, pariḷāhasamayo, gilānasamayo, kammasamayo, addhānagamanasamayo, vātavuṭṭhisamayo.
na itivādappamokkhaānisaṃs'atthaṃ, na iti maṃ jano jānātū'ti.
atha kho aparā devatā bhagavato santike imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi, passa samādhiṃ subhāvitaṃ cittañ'ca suvimuttaṃ, na c'ābhinataṃ na c'āpanataṃ na ca sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagataṃ.
seyyathā'pi, bhagini, puriso hatthiṃ datvā kacche sajjeyya, evam'eva kho tvaṃ, bhagini, bhagavato maṃsaṃ datvā mayi antaravāsake sajjasī'ti
satto'ti laggo. guhāyan'ti kāye. kāyo hi rāg'ādīnaṃ vāḷānaṃ vasan'okāsato guhā'ti vuccati.
sabbe sattā sabbadukkhā pamuccantu sabbe sattā laddhasampattito mā vigacchantu
bojjh'aṅgo satisaṅkhāto dhammānaṃ vicayo tathā viriyam'pītipassaddhi bojjh'aṅgā ca tathā'pare samādh'upekkhabojjh'aṅgā.
vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
es'ev'anto paṭigh'ānusayānaṃ, es'ev'anto diṭṭh'ānusayānaṃ, es'ev'anto vicikicch'ānusayānaṃ
bhante nāgasena, kiṃlakkhaṇaṃ viññāṇan'ti? vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ, mahārāja, viññāṇan'ti.
saṅkhāre saṅkhārattāya saṅkhatam'abhisaṅkharonti, viññāṇaṃ viññāṇattāya saṅkhatam'abhisaṅkharonti. saṅkhatam'abhisaṅkharontī'ti kho, bhikkhave, tasmā saṅkhārā'ti vuccati.
tesaṃ vitakkānaṃ vitakkasaṅkhārasaṇṭhānaṃ manasikaroto ye pāpakā akusalā vitakkā chand'ūpasaṃhitā'pi dos'ūpasaṃhitā'pi moh'ūpasaṃhitā'pi te pahīyanti
tayo vitakke kusale vitakkaye, tayo pana akusale nirākare, sa ve vitakkāni vicāritāni, sameti vuṭṭhī'va rajaṃ samūhataṃ sa ve vitakk'ūpasamena cetasā, idh'eva so santipadaṃ samajjhagā'ti.
api ca kho mātugāmassa ucchādanaparimaddananhāpanasambāhanaṃ sādiyati. so taṃ assādeti, taṃ nikāmeti, tena ca vittiṃ āpajjati.
seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, puriso jar'udapānaṃ vā olokeyya pabbatavisamaṃ vā nadīviduggaṃ vā, apakass'eva kāyaṃ, apakassa cittaṃ
yaṃ kho tumhe, āyasmanto, bhikkhuṃ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ pahiṇittha na taṃ tassa bhikkhuno kiñci atthaṃ anubhoti, yuñjant'āyasmanto sakaṃ, mā vo sakaṃ vinassā'ti.
buddhaṃ varan'taṃ sirasā namāmi. lokassa nāthañ'ca vināyakañ'ca. tan'tejasā te jayasiddhi hotu. sabb'antarāyā ca vināsamentu.
so kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, uppann'uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ pajaham'eva vinodam'eva byantam'eva naṃ akāsiṃ.
yaṃ pan'āniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ, etaṃ mama, eso'ham'asmi, eso me attā'ti? no h'etaṃ, bhante.
indriyesu guttadvārā bhavissāma, bhojane mattaññuno, jāgariyaṁ anuyuttā, vipassakā kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ, pubbaratt'āpararattaṁ bodhipakkhiyānaṁ dhammānaṁ, bhāvan'ānuyogam'anuyuttā viharissāmā’ti.

icc'evaṃ vippalapantiṃ, phandamānaṃ tato tato.
khipiṃsu niraye ghore, uddhapādaṃ avaṃsiraṃ
atthi bhikkhave pañho ek'aṃsabyākaraṇīyo, atthi pañho vibhajjabyākaraṇīyo, atthi pañho paṭipucchābyākaraṇīyo, atthi pañho ṭhapanīyo.
atthi bhikkhave pañho ek'aṃsabyākaraṇīyo, atthi pañho vibhajjabyākaraṇīyo, atthi pañho paṭipucchābyākaraṇīyo, atthi pañho ṭhapanīyo.

bhesajjesu yathā vejjā, kicc'ākicce yathā gihī.
gaṇikā'va vibhūsāyaṃ, issare khattiyā yathā.
na saññasaññī na visaññasaññī, no'pi asaññī na vibhūtasaññī. evaṃ sametassa vibhoti rūpaṃ, saññānidānā hi papañcasaṅkhā.
yañ'ca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vuccati cittaṃ iti'pi, mano iti'pi, viññāṇaṃ iti'pi, tatr'āssutavā puthujjano n'ālaṃ nibbindituṃ n'ālaṃ virajjituṃ n'ālaṃ vimuccituṃ.

aniccā hi calā saddhā, evaṃ diṭṭhā hi sā mayā.
rajjanti'pi virajjanti, tattha kiṃ jiyyate muni.
yañ'ca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vuccati cittaṃ iti'pi, mano iti'pi, viññāṇaṃ iti'pi, tatr'āssutavā puthujjano n'ālaṃ nibbindituṃ n'ālaṃ virajjituṃ n'ālaṃ vimuccituṃ.
yāvakīvañ'ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhū virāgasaññaṃ bhāvessanti
atthi dukkhaṃ adhimattaṃ, atthi parittaṃ, atthi dandhavirāgi, atthi khippavirāgi. ayaṃ vuccati dukkhassa vemattatā.
catutthaṃ paññāpārami, pañcamaṃ viriyapārami, chaṭṭhamaṃ khantipārami, sattamaṃ saccapārami
ariyasāvako abhijjhāvisamalobho cittassa upakkileso'ti, iti viditvā abhijjhāvisamalobhaṃ cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahati.

coro ahaṃ pure āsiṃ, aṅgulimālo'ti vissuto.
vuyhamāno mah'oghena, buddhaṃ saraṇam'āgamaṃ.
cattālīsam'pi jātiyo paññāsam'pi jātiyo jātisatam'pi jātisahassam'pi jātisatasahassam'pi aneke'pi saṃvaṭṭakappe aneke'pi vivaṭṭakappe aneke'pi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe
sace kho pana agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajati, arahaṃ hoti sammāsambuddho loke vivaṭṭacchado.
cattālīsam'pi jātiyo paññāsam'pi jātiyo jātisatam'pi jātisahassam'pi jātisatasahassam'pi aneke'pi saṃvaṭṭakappe aneke'pi vivaṭṭakappe aneke'pi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe

yo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye, appamatto vihassati.
pahāya jātisaṃsāraṃ, dukkhass'antaṃ karissati.

araññe rukkhamūlesu, kandarāsu guhāsu ca.
vivekam'anubrūhantā, vihaṃsu tap'parāyanā
n'atthi me pāpakā akusalā dhammā appahīnā ye me assu rattiṃ kālaṃ karontassa antarāyāyā'ti, tena bhikkhunā ten'eva pītipāmojjena vihātabbaṃ ahoratt'ānusikkhinā kusalesu dhammesu.
saccaṃ vihāya matisaccakavādaketuṃ, vād'ābhiropitamanaṃ atiandhabhūtaṃ, paññāpadīpajalito jitavā mun'indo
so sace ākaṅkhati, anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhaveyyaṃ, eko'pi hutvā bahudhā assaṃ, bahudhā'pi hutvā eko assaṃ, āvibhāvaṃ tirobhāvaṃ
evam'eva kho, cunda, vihiṃsakassa purisapuggalassa avihiṃsā hoti parinibbānāya, pāṇ'ātipātissa purisapuggalassa pāṇ'ātipātā veramaṇī hoti parinibbānāya.

tiṭṭhañ'caraṃ, nisinno vā, sayāno vā, yāvat'assa vigatamiddho,
etaṃ satiṃ adhiṭṭheyya, brahmam'etaṃ vihāraṃ idha'm'āhu

sa vītivatto maññataṃ sumedho,
ahaṃ vadāmī'ti'pi so vadeyya.
seyyathā'pi bhikkhave ubhatomukhā putoḷi pūrā nānāvihitassa dhaññassa seyyath'idaṃ sālīnaṃ vīhīnaṃ muggānaṃ māsānaṃ tilānaṃ taṇḍulānaṃ
yāvakīvañ'ca bhikkhave bhikkhū samaggā sannipatissanti, samaggā vuṭṭhahissanti, samaggā saṅghakaraṇīyāni karissanti
sabbalokā ca me mano vuṭṭhahissati, nibbāne ca santadassāvī bhavissāmi, anusayā ca me samugghātaṃ gacchissanti
ekadā dhammarājā pi gelaññen'ābhipīḷito cundattherena taññ'eva bhaṇāpetvāna sādaraṃ sammoditvā ca ābādhā tamhā vuṭṭhāsi ṭhānaso.
cakkhu, bhikkhave, purisassa samuddo, tassa rūpamayo vego.
attā me uppajjati ca veti cā'ti icc'assa evam'āgataṃ hoti. tasmā taṃ na upapajjati, cakkhu attā'ti yo vadeyya. iti cakkhu anattā.
idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye desiyamāne na labhati atthavedaṃ, na labhati dhammavedaṃ, na labhati dhamm'ūpasaṃhitaṃ pāmojjaṃ.

na vedagū diṭṭhiyā na mutiyā,
sa mānam'eti na hi tammayo so,
na kammunā no'pi sutena neyyo,
anūpanīto sa nivesanesu.
tesaṃ rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto na labhati otāraṃ na labhati ārammaṇaṃ.
yaṃ kho, bhante, āyasmā veyyāvaccakaraṃ niddisi, saññatto so mayā, upasaṅkamat'āyasmā kālena, cīvarena taṃ acchādessatī'ti.
so pana vassāno utu sāvaṇapoṭṭhapādamāsā, assayujakattikamāsā sarado, māgasiraphussamāsā hemanto, māghaphaggunamāsā sisiro, cittavesākhamāsā vasanto, jeṭṭh'āsaḷhamāsā gimho utū'ti veditabbo.
vehapphale vehapphalato sañjānāti, vehapphale vehapphalato saññatvā vehapphale maññati, vehapphalesu maññati, vehapphalato maññati, vehapphale me'ti maññati, vehapphale abhinandati.
tattha katamo upapattibhavo? kāmabhavo, rūpabhavo, arūpabhavo, saññābhavo, asaññābhavo, n'evasaññān'āsaññābhavo, ekavokārabhavo, catuvokārabhavo, pañcavokārabhavo
dukkhaṃ, bhikkhave, kusīto viharati vokiṇṇo pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi, mahantañ'ca sadatthaṃ parihāpeti.

tasmā hi paññā'va dhanena seyyā, yāya vosānam'idh'ādhigacchati.
abyositattā hi bhav'ābhavesu, pāpāni kammāni karoti mohā.
na oramattakena vises'ādhigamena antarāvosānaṃ āpajjissanti
ārocayāmi vo, bhikkhave, paṭivedayāmi vo, bhikkhave, mā vo sāmaññ'atthikānaṃ sataṃ sāmaññ'attho parihāyi, sati uttariṃ karaṇīye'.
taṃ kiṃ maññatha api nu so puriso divasaṃ tīhi sattisatehi haññamāno tatonidānaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvediyethā'ti?
anicce niccasaññino, dukkhe ca sukhasaññino. anattani ca attā'ti, asubhe subhasaññino. micchādiṭṭhihatā sattā, khittacittā visaññino.

seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, rajako vā cittakārako vā rajanāya vā lākhāya vā haliddiyā vā nīliyā vā mañjiṭṭhāya vā
yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā nisīdanaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ vā kāyabandhanaṃ vā apanidheyya vā apanidhāpeyya vā, antamaso has'āpekkho'pi, pācittiyaṃ.
api ca kho mātugāmassa saddaṃ suṇāti tirokuṭṭaṃ vā tiropākāraṃ vā hasantiyā vā bhaṇantiyā vā gāyantiyā vā rodantiyā vā
api ca kho yāni'ssa tāni pubbe mātugāmena saddhiṃ hasitalapitakīḷitāni tāni anussarati
bhārā have pañcakkhandhā, bhārahāro ca puggalo. bhār'ādānaṃ dukhaṃ loke, bhāranikkhepanaṃ sukhaṃ.

vitakk'ūpasame ca yo rato, asubhaṃ bhāvayate sadā sato,
esa kho byanti kāhiti, esa checchati mārabandhanaṃ.
tena hi tvaṃ mahante mahante sāṇipasibbake kārāpetvā hiraññasuvaṇṇassa pūrāpetvā sakaṭehi nibbāhāpetvā majjhe gaṅgāya sote osādehi.

seyyathā'pi rañño paccantime nagare parikkhā hoti gambhīrā c'eva vitthatā ca evam'evaṃ kho ariyasāvako hirīmā hoti, hirīyati kāyaduccaritena vacīduccaritena manoduccaritena

attanā coday'attānaṃ, paṭimaṃsetha attanā,
so attagutto satimā, sukhaṃ bhikkhu vihāhisi.

na tena ariyo hoti, yena pāṇāni hiṃsati,
ahiṃsā sabbapāṇānaṃ, ariyo'ti pavuccati.
